GSP33brsvbh1u:13: śāśvatāya namaskurmo vedāya ca bhavāya ca //3//
GSP33brsvbh1u:27: 1-yatra jijñāsyatvaṃ tatraiva saṃdigdhatvaṃ saprayojanatvaṃ ceti jijñāsyatvavyāpake saṃdigdhatvasaprayojanatve /
GSP33brsvbh1u:30: atraivaṃ prayagoḥ-brahma mumukṣvavicāryaṃ taṃ pratyasaṃdigdhatvāt, niṣprayojanatvācca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:40_0: sa cāyam ākīṭapataṅgebhya ā ca devarṣibhyaḥ prāṇabhṛnmātrasyedaṅkārāspadebhyo dehendriyamanobuddhiviṣayebhyo
GSP33brsvbh1u:41: na hi jātu kaścidatra saṃdigdhe 'ahaṃ vā nāhaṃ vā'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:48: tadālambanatve hi 'yo 'haṃ bālye pitarāvanvabhavaṃ sa eva sthāvire praṇaptṝnanubhavāmi'iti pratisaṃdhānaṃ na bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:49: na hi bālasthavirayoḥ śarīrayorasti manāgapi pratyabhijñāna
GSP33brsvbh1u:54: tasmādyeṣu vyāvartamāneṣu yadanuvartate tattebhyo bhinnaṃ yathā ca kusumebhyaḥ sūtram /
GSP33brsvbh1u:55: tathā bālādiśarīreṣu vyāvartamāneṣvapi paramahaṅkārāspadamanuvartamānaṃ tebhyo bhidyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:56_0: api ca svapnānte divyaśarīrabhedamāsthāya taducitānbhogānbhuñjāna eva pratibuddho
GSP33brsvbh1u:56_1: manuṣyaśarīramātmānaṃ paśyan 'nāhaṃ devo manuṣya eva'iti devaśarīre bādhyamāne 'pyahamāspadamabādhyamānaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:60: 2-aṇimādisiddhilābhāllīlādyarthaṃ yogamahimnā vyāghraśarīraṃ kṛtvā tadābhimānītyarthaḥ atredaṃ bodhyam avayavopacayāpacayātmake bālye sthāvire vā na śarīrabhedaḥ siddhyati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:62: svāpnabhramavādināṃ mate tadasiddhyā yogavyāghradṛṣṭāntaḥ, jāgratyapi darśayituṃ veti bodhyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:79: tasmādidaṅkārāspadebhyo dehendriyamanobuddhiviṣayebhyo vyāvṛttaḥ sphuṭatarāhamanubhavagamya ātmā saṃśayābhāvādajijñāsya iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:87: sa cedayamanādiranādinā ātmayāthātmyajñānena sahānuvartate, kuto 'sya nivṛttiḥ avirodhāt?
GSP33brsvbh1u:90: na ca 'aham'iti sarvajanīnasphuṭatarānubhavasamarthita ātmā dehendriyādivyatiriktaḥ śakya upaniṣadāṃ sahasrairapyanyathayitum, anubhavavirodhāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:92: tasmādanubhavavirodhādupacaritārthā evopaniṣada iti yuktamutpaśyāma ityāśayavānāśaṅkya pariharati-yuṣmadasmatpratyayagocarayoḥ iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:97: yathā hyahaṅkārapratiyogī tvaṅkāro naivamidaṅkāraḥ, 'ete vayam, ime vayamāsmahe'iti bahulaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:100: 2-idaṃśabdasya parākpratipādakatvāviśeṣe 'pi ete vayamityādi pracuraprayogavaśānmukhyavadbhānaṃ bhavatīti tattatra nirūḍhamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:103: citsvabhāva ātmā viṣayī, jaḍasvabhāvā buddhīndriyadehaviṣayā viṣayāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:104: ete hi cidātmānaṃ visinvanti avabadhnanti;svena rūpeṇa nirūpaṇīyaṃ kurvantīti yāvat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:108: FN: 3-samudācarantyau bhedena jñāyamāne vṛttī vartane yayoste tathā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:109: adhyāso hi vivekāgraheṇa vyāptaḥ, atra vivekagrahasattvādadhyāso nopapanna ityāśayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:116: 4-itarasyetaratra bhāva iti yojane siddhasya saṃsargādhyāsaniṣedhasya sādhanaṃ bhavettadanenāpahṛtaṃ boddhavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:123: yathā kusumādbhedena gṛhyamāṇe 'pi sphaṭikamaṇāvatisvacchatayā japākusumapratibimbodgrāhiṇyaruṇaḥ sphaṭikaityāruṇyavibhrama ityata uktam-taddharmāṇāmapīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:125: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-rūpavaddhi dravyamatisvacchatayā rūpavato dravyāntarasya tadvivekena gṛhyamāṇasyāpi cchāyāṃ gṛhṇīyāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:139: mithyeti bhavituṃ yuktaṃ yadyapi tathāpīti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:146: parāmarśo madhye nirdeśaḥ upasaṃhāraśca sāmānyena kathitasya viśeṣe niyamanam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:149: annena śuṅgena sanmūlamanvicchetyādi nirdiśya 'sa ya eṣo 'ṇimaitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo'ityupasaṃhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:154: ekamadvitīyaṃ brahmaiveha pratipipādayiṣitam, yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa eva tadartho 'nyathātiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:155: tasmāt brahmaṇo 'vatārāya yatkiñcidvyāhartavyamiti tadvyāhṛtamiti suvacamato niṣprapañcātmatattvapratipādakānyevaitānīti dik /
GSP33brsvbh1u:157: parāmarśopasaṃhāraiḥ kriyāsamabhihāreṇedṛgātmatattvamabhidadhati tatparāṇi santi śakyāni śakreṇāpyupacaritārthāni kartum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:158: abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati yathāho darśanīyāho darśanīyeti na nyūnatvaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:180: na hyāgamajñānaṃ sāṃvyavahārikaṃ pratyakṣasya prāmāṇyamupahanti yena kāraṇābhāvānna bhavedapi tu tāttvikam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:183: tathā ca varṇe hrasvatvadīrghatvādayo 'nyadharmā api samāropitāḥ tattvapratipattihetavaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:184: na hi laukikāḥ 'nāgaḥ'iti vā“nagaḥ“iti vā padātkuñcaraṃ vā taruṃ vā pratipadyamānā bhavanti bhrāntāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:192: FN: 2-vidhāyake śabde, paro lakṣyaḥ śabdārtho na bhavatīti śābarabhāṣye siddhāntitam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:194: 'tattvamasi'ityādau ca jīvabrahmaṇoraikyaṃ bruvatāṃ mate bhāgalakṣaṇāṅgīkārānnaitadyuktamiti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:196: tattulyaṃ vā tātparyavadvākyaṃ yatkiñcudanugrahārthamanyaparaṃ na netuṃ śakyamityarthe tātparyāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:200: jyeṣṭhatvaṃ ca anapekṣitasya bādhyatve hetuḥ na tu bādhakatve,
GSP33brsvbh1u:204: FN: 3-śuktijñānaṃ rajatajñānāpabādhātmakaṃ, ato yadi nābādhiṣyata tarhi nodapatsyatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:211: 4-jyotiṣṭome 'nyonyaṃ saṃbadhya yajñaśālāto nirgacchatāmṛtvijāṃ vicchedanimittaṃ prāyaścittaṃ śrūyate 'yadyudgātāpacchidyetādakṣiṇena yajeta,
GSP33brsvbh1u:212_1: viruddhaprāyaścittayoḥ samuccayāsaṃbhavāt kiṃ pūrvaṃ kāryamuta paramiti saṃdehe rāddhāntaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:219: api ca ye 'pyahaṅkārāspadamātmānamāsthiṣata tairapyasya na tāttvikatvamabhyupetavyam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:222: na cedaṃ dehasya prādeśikatvamanubhūyate na tvātmana iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:223: na hi tadaivaṃ bhavati 'aham' iti;gauṇatve vā na 'jānānaḥ'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:224: api ca paraśabdaḥ paratra lakṣyamāṇaguṇayogena vartata iti yatra prayoktṛpratipatroḥ saṃpratipattiḥ sa gauṇaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:229: 6-'yadagnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyaṃ juhoti'ityagnerheme devatāprakhyāpanādatra agnihotrakarmanāmadheyamagnihotrapadamityarthaḥ)
GSP33brsvbh1u:231: prakaraṇāntarāvadhṛtabhede kauṇḍapāyināmayanagate karmaṇi 'māsamagmihotraṃ juhoti'(ā. 7 pā. 3 sū. 1)
GSP33brsvbh1u:235: 1-prakaraṇabhedena karmabhede siddhe 'nekatra śaktyaṅgīkāre gauravādagnihotravajjuhotīti sādhyasādṛśyena gauṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:240: FN: 2-niṣkṛṣya luṭhitaḥ pratibhāsito garbho 'sādhāraṇākāro yasya sa tathā tattathā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:243: garbhatayā dehādibhyo bhinno 'nubhūyate, yena paraśabdaḥ śarīrādau gauṇo bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:248: nirūṭhatayā gauṇe 'pi na gauṇatvābhimānaḥ sārṣapādiṣu tailaśabdavaditi veditavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:249: tatrāpi snehāttilabhavādbhede siddha eva sārṣapādīnāṃ tailaśabdavācyatvābhimāno,
GSP33brsvbh1u:251: tatsiddhaṃ gauṇatvamubhayadarśino gauṇamukhyavivekavijñānena vyāptam tadidaṃ vyāpakaṃ vivekajñānaṃ nivartamānaṃ gauṇatāmapi nivartayatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:252: na ca bālasthaviraśarīrabhede 'pi so 'hamityekasyātmanaḥ pratisaṃdhānadehādibhyo bhede
GSP33brsvbh1u:258: parīkṣakā api hi vyavahārasamaye na lokasāmāmyamativartante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:260: bāhyā apyāhuḥ -'śāstracintakāḥ khalvevaṃ vivecayanti na pratipattāraḥ'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:261: tatpāriśeṣyāccidātmagocaramahaṅkāram 'ahamihāsmi sadanā'iti prayuñjāno laukikaḥ śarīrādyabhedagrahādātmanaḥ prādeśikatvamabhimanyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:263: na cāhaṅkāraprāmāṇyāya dehādivadātmāpi prādeśika iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:268: kiñca asminpakṣe avayavasamudāyo vā cetayet pratyekaṃ vāvayavāḥ?
GSP33brsvbh1u:269: pratyekaṃ cetanatvapakṣe bahūnāṃ cetanānāṃ svatantrāṇāmekavākyatābhāvādaparyāyaṃ viruddhādikkriyatayā śarīramunmathyeta,
GSP33brsvbh1u:271: samudāyasya tu caitanyayoge vṛkṇa ekasminnavayave cidātmano 'pyavayavo vṛkṇa iti na cetayet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:273: ya evāvayavo viśīrṇastadā tadabhāve na cetayet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:281: tadevamuktena krameṇāhaṃpratyaye pūtikūṣmāṇḍīkṛte bhagavatī śrutirapratyūhaṃ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvaduḥkhaśokādyātmatvamahamanubhavaprasañjitamātmano niṣeddhumarhatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:285: lokavyavahāro lokānāṃ vyavahāraḥ, sa cāyamahamiti vyapadeśaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:286: itiśabdasūcitaśca śarīrādyanukūlaṃ pratikūlaṃ ca prameyajātaṃ pramāya pramāṇena tadupādānaparivarjanādiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:291: atra ca adhyāsavyavahārakriyābhyāṃ yaḥ kartonnītaḥ sa samāna iti samānakartṛkatvenādhyasya vyavahāra ityupapannam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:295: tadevamadhyāsasvarūpaṃ phalaṃ ca vyavahāramuktvā tasya nimittamāha-itaretarāvivekena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:297: athāviveka eva kasmānna bhavati, tathā ca nādhyāsa ityata āha-atyantaviviktayordharmadharmiṇoḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:298: paramārthato dharmiṇoratādātmyaṃ viveko dharmāṇāṃ cāsaṃkīrṇatā vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:302: iha tu paramārthasataścidātmano 'tyantabhinnaṃ na dehādyasti vastusat,
GSP33brsvbh1u:303: tatkutaścidātmano bhedāgrahaḥ kutaśca tādātmyavibhramaḥ ityata āha-satyānṛte mithunīkṛtya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:305: satyaṃ cidātmā, anṛtaṃ buddhīndriyadehādi,te dve dharmiṇī mithunīkṛtya
GSP33brsvbh1u:310: na ca saṃvṛtiparamārthasatoḥ pāramārthakaṃ mithunamastītyabhūtatadbhāvārthasya cveḥ prayogaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:311: etaduktaṃ bhavati - apratītasyāropāyogādāropyasya pratītirupayujyate na vastusatteti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:313: āropyasya pratītau satyāṃ pūrvadṛṣṭasya samāropaḥ samāropanibandhanā ca pratītiriti durvāraṃ parasparāśrayatvamityata āha-naisargika iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:318: addhā pūrvapratītimātramupayujyata ārope, na tu pratīyamānasya paramārthasattā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:320: prakāśamānatvameva hi cidātmano 'pi sattvaṃ na tu tadatiriktaṃ sattāsāmānyasamavāyor'thakriyākāritā vā, dvaitāpatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:328: samādhātā lokasiddhamadhyāsalakṣaṇamācakṣāṇa evākṣepaṃ pratikṣipati-ucyate-smṛtirūpaḥ paratra pūrvadṛṣṭāvabhāsa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:335: tasya ca dṛṣṭatvamātramupayujyate na vastusatteti dṛṣṭagrahaṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:336: tathāpi vartamānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ darśanaṃ nāropopayogīti pūrvetyuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:342: asti hi svastimatyāṃ gavi pūrvadṛṣṭasya gotvasya, paratra kālākṣyāmavabhāsaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:346: pūrvaṃ tu pūrvadṛṣṭasya paratra dharmyadhyāsamabhipretyeti jñeyam
GSP33brsvbh1u:348: ca pāṭaliputre pūrvadṛṣṭasya devadattasya paratra māhiṣmatyāmavabhāsaḥ samīcīnaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:352: 2-nanu avamato bhāso 'vabhāsa iti vyutpādayam kathamudāhṛtasthalādāvativyāptimāheti vadantaṃ pratyāha-avabhāsapadaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:354: na ca pūrvadṛṣṭapadenānirvācyānṛtamuktamityuktatvānna tatrātivyāptikathanaṃ saṃgacchata iti vācyam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:358: yathā nīlasyāvabhāsaḥ pītasyāvabhāsa ityata āha-smṛtirūpa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:374: asaṃbandhāgrahaṇasārūpyeṇapītaṃ tapanīyapiṇḍaṃpītaṃ bilvaphalamityādau pūrvadṛṣṭaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ pītatvaśaṅkhatvayorāropyāhapītaḥ śaṅkhaiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:376: evaṃ vijñātṛpuruṣābhimukheṣvādarśodakādiṣu svaccheṣu cākṣuṣaṃ tejo lagnamapi balīyasā sauryeṇa tejasā pratisrotaḥ pravartitaṃ mukhasaṃyuktaṃ mukhaṃ grāhayat,
GSP33brsvbh1u:379: FN: 2-pūrvadṛṣṭayorabhimukhayoḥ ādarthodakayordeśa eva deśo yasya tasya bhāvastattā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:382: darśodakadeśatāmābhimukhyaṃ ca mukhasyāropayatīti pratibimbavibhramo 'pi lakṣito bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:386: na hi sarpādibhāvena rajjvādayo vā sphaṭikādayo vā raktādiguṇayogino na pratibhāsante,
GSP33brsvbh1u:392: na ca marīcirūpeṇa salilamavastusatsvarūpeṇa tu paramārthasadeva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:393: dehendriyādayastu svarūpeṇāpyasanta ityanubhavāgocaratvātkathamāropyanta iti sāṃpratamyato yadyasan nānubhavagocarāḥ kathaṃ tarhi marīcyādīnāmasatāṃ toyatayānubhavagocaratvam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:394: na ca svarūpasattvena toyādyātmanāpi santo bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:396: api tu bhāva eva bhāvāntarātmanā abhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa tu bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:399: FN: 3-yathā iha ghaṭo nāstītyādau kevalabhūtalādhikaraṇasvarūpatvaṃ ghaṭābhāvasya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:401: tathā jalarūpeṇa marīcīnāmasattvaṃ yat tanmarīcaya eva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:421: viṣayasya samastasāmarthyavirahe 'pi jñānameva tattādṛśaṃ svapratyayasāmarthyāsāditādṛṣṭāntasiddhasvabhāvabhedamupajātamasataḥ prakāśanaṃ, tasmāda
GSP33brsvbh1u:424: 6-bauddhānāṃ mate 'vidyayāsatprakāśakamiti cet vā hi asatprakāśanaśaktirjñānasya saivā vadyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:435: śaktijñāpyaṃ punaḥ kasmānnabhavediti cet śaktijñāpyatvaṃ śaktiniṣṭhajñāpakatānirūpitajñāpyatāśālitvaṃ vaktavyam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:441: 8-atha vaktavyaṃ jñānāntaramupalabhata iti tathāpi tasyāpi jñāpakatvena jñānāntarāpekṣāyāmanavasthāpāta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:444: vijñānasvarūpameva asataḥ prakāśa iti cet, kaḥ punareṣa sadasatoḥ saṃbandhaḥ?
GSP33brsvbh1u:445: asadadhīnanirūpaṇatvaṃ sato jñānasyāsatā saṃbandha iti cet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:449: asadantareṇa pratyayo na prathata iti pratyayasyaivaiṣa svabhāvo na tvasadadhīnamasya kiñciditi cet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:452: FN: 1-avinābhāvamūlaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvo vā tatsvabhāvatvaṃ vā vaktavyam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:459: FN: 2-evaṃ sarvatra vastu sadeva bhātīti sadvādinākṣipte siddhāntyāha-atra brūma iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:462: tatkimidānīṃ marīcayo 'pi toyātmanā satattvā yadanubhavagocarāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:465: FN: 3-nanu sadvādinā toyātmanā marīcīnāmasattvaṃ cedaṅgīkriyeta tarhi siddhāntahāniriti cenna,
GSP33brsvbh1u:470: dvividhaṃ ca vastūnāṃ tattvaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:471: tatra pūrvaṃ svataḥ, paraṃ tu parataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:473: vastuni jñāyate kiñcidrūpaṃ kaiścitkadā ca na //
GSP33brsvbh1u:480: marīciṣu toyanirbhāsapratyayastattvagocaraḥ, tathā ca samīcīna iti na bhrānto nāpi bādhyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:487: addhā na bādhyeta yadi marīcīnatoyātmatattvānatoyātmanā gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:488: toyātmanā tu gṛhṇan kathamabhrāntaḥ, kathaṃ vābādhyaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:499: FN: 7-na satkiṃ tu asadeveti cettātkiṃ tucchaṃ vā sadbhinnaṃ veti vaktavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:504: vastvantarameva hi vastvantarasyāsattvamāsthīyate 'bhāvāntaramabhāvo 'nyo na kaścidanirūpaṇāt'iti vadadbhiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:508: pūrvasminkalpe marīcayaḥ iti pratyayaḥ syāt, na toyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:509: uttarasmiṃstu gaṅgāyāṃ toyamiti syāt, na punariheti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:524: tattvatastu na toyaṃ na ca pūrvadṛṣṭaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:527: apūrvo 'pi pūrvamithyāpratyayopadarśita iva paratra cidātmanyadhyasyata iti upapannam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:533: na tu tadatiriktaṃ sattāsāmānyasamavāyor'thakriyākāritā veti sarvamavadātam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:535: tadbhede paraṃ vipratipattirityanirvacanīyatāṃ draḍhayitumāha-taṃ kecidanyatrānyadharmādhyāsa iti vadanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:539: sautrāntikanaye tāvadbāhyamasti vastu sat, tatra jñānākārasyāropaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:540: vijñānavādināmapi yadyapi na bāhyaṃ vastu sat,
GSP33brsvbh1u:546: FN: 1-ayaṃ bhāvaḥ-idaṃ rajatamityatra rajatānuyogikaṃ idantvapratiyogikaṃ tādātmyaṃ bhāsate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:547: nedaṃ rajatamityukte tadeva bādhitaṃ bhavati, 'pratiyogyabhāvānvayau tulyayogakṣenau'iti niyamāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:549: tasmānnedaṃ rajatamityatra raḍate bhāsamānā idantaiva bādhitā bhavenna punā rajatamapīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:550: tathā caitanmate ahaṃ rajatamiti pratyayaḥ prameti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:552: nedaṃ rajatamiti ca bādhakasyedantāmātrabādhenopapattau na rajatagocaratocitā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:553: rajatasya dharmiṇo bhādhe hi rajataṃ ca tasya ca dharma idantā bādhite bhavetām,
GSP33brsvbh1u:554: tadvaramidantaivāsya dharmo bādhyatām na punā rajatamapi dharmi,
GSP33brsvbh1u:555: tathā ca rajataṃ bahirbādhitamarthādāntare jñāne vyavatiṣṭhata iti jñānākārasya bahiradhyāsaḥ sidhyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:565: anubhavo 'pi rajatapratyayo vā syāt, bādhakapratyayo vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:568: ahamiti hi tadā syāt, pratipattuḥ pratyayādavyatirekāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:573: kiṃ purovarti dravyaṃ rajatādvidhecayatyāhosmin jñānākāratāmapyasya darśayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:574: tatra jñānākāratopadarśanavyāpāraṃ bādhakapratyayasya bruvāṇaḥ ślāghanīyaprajño devānāṃ priyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:593: na caiṣa rajatasya niṣedhaḥ, na cedantāyāḥ, kiṃ tu vivekāgrahaprasañjitasya rajatavyavahārasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:594: na ca rajatameva śuktikāyāṃ prasañjitaṃ rajatajñānena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:618: FN: 10-idaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ na mithyetyāha-api ceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:620: api cendriyādīnāṃ samīcīnajñānopajanane sāmarthyamupalabdhamiti kathamebhyo mithyājñānasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:628: 11-sarvajñānānāṃ samīcīnatve udāhṛtasthale bhrama eva na syāditi cettatra svamatamāha-tathā ceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:631: idam iti ca dve vijñāne smṛtyanubhavarūpe,
GSP33brsvbh1u:634: tanmātraṃ ca gṛhītaṃ sadṛśatayā saṃskārodbodhakrameṇa rajate smṛtiṃ janayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:640: tathā ca rajatasamṛteḥ purovartidravyamātragrahaṇasya ca mithaḥ svarūpato viṣayataśca bhedāgrahāt, saṃnihita
GSP33brsvbh1u:643: 13-saṃnihitarajatagocarajñānasārūpyeṇeti / atraivaṃ tajjñānasārūpyaṃ-yathedaṃ rajatamitijñānaṃ idamo rajatasya cāsaṃsargaṃ na gṛhṇāti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:644: tayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭatvāt / evamete api smaraṇagrahaṇe svagatabhedaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:648: idaṃ rajatamiti bhinne api smaraṇagrahaṇe abhedavyavahāraṃ ca sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaṃ ca pravartayataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:649: kvacitpunargrahaṇe eva mitho 'nugṛhītabhede, yathā pītaḥ śaṅkhaḥiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:650: atra hi bahirvinirgacchannayanaraśmivartinaḥ pittadravyasya kācasyeva svacchasya pītatvaṃ gṛhyate pittaṃ tu na gṛhyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:654: tadupapattau ca prācīnasya pratyayasya bhrāntatvamapi lokasiddhaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:661: yasminśuktikādau yasya rajatāderadhyāsa iti lokaprasiddhiḥ nāsāvanyathākhyātinibandhanā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:662: kintu gṛhītasya rajatādestatsmaraṇasya ca gṛhītatāṃśapramoṣeṇa gṛhītamātrasya ca yaḥ idamiti puro 'vasthitāddravyamātrāttatjñānācca vivekaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:666: atredamākūtam-asti tāvadrajatārthinorajatamidamiti pratyayātpurovartini dravye pravṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaśceti sarvajanīnam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:670: kiṃ tu grahaṇasmaraṇe eva mithaḥ svarūpato viṣayataścāgṛhītabhede,
GSP33brsvbh1u:672: atha 'samīcīnajñānasārūpyamanayorgṛhyamāṇaṃ vā vyavahārapravṛttihetuḥ, agṛhyamāṇaṃ vā sattāmātreṇa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:675: tatra na tāvatsamīcīnajñānasadṛśī iti jñānaṃ samīcīnajñānavadvyavahārapravartakam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:676: na higosadṛśo gavayaḥiti jñānaṃ gavārthinaṃ gavaye pravartayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:681: tatra kimayamāropotpādakrameṇa vyavahāraheturāstvāho 'nutpāditāropa eva svata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:683: nanu satyaṃ cetanavyavahāro nājñānapūrvakaḥ kiṃ tvaviditavivekagrahaṇasmaraṇapūrvaka iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:687: kathaṃ cāyamidaṅkārāspade pravarteta yadi na tadicchet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:689: na cedidaṅkārāspadaṃ rajatamiti jānīyātkathaṃ rajatārthī tadicchet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:691: so 'yamupādānopekṣābhyāmabhita ākṛṣyamāṇaścedano 'vyavasthitaḥ itīdaṅkārāspade rajatasamāropeṇopādāna eva vyavasthāpyate iti bhedāgrahaḥ samāropotpādakrameṇa cetanapravṛttihetuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:702: 2-sādhyasādhanajñātasaṃbandhasya puṃso liṅgaviśiṣṭadharmyekadeśadarśanāt liṅge viśiṣṭadharmyekadeśe buddhiranumānamiti śabarasvāminaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:709: yadyadarthinaṃ yatra niyamena pravartayati tajjñānantadviṣayaṃ yathobhayasiddhasamīcīnarajatajñānam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:713: kiṃ śuktikātvasyaidaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ pratyanālambanatvamāhosvitdravyamātrasya puraḥsthitasya sitabhāsvarasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:722: tat bodhakatvena svataḥprāmāṇyaṃ nāvyabhicāreṇeti vyutpādayadbhirasmābhiḥ parihṛtaṃ nyāya
GSP33brsvbh1u:724: FN: 3-vyabhicāriṇāmapi sitanīlādiṣu cakṣurādīnāṃ bodhakatvena prāmāṇyamityā de tatroktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:729: tadidamuktam-'anye tu yatra yadadhyāsastasyaiva viparītadharmatvakalpanāmācakṣate iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:730: 'yatra śuktikādau yasya rajatāderadhyāsastasyaiva śuktikāderviparītadharmakalpanāṃ rajatatvadharmakalpanāmiti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:732: prakṛte tu kimāyātamityatāha-sarvathāpi tvanyasyānyadharmakalpanāṃ na vyabhicarati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:738: tena sarveṣāmeva parīkṣakāṇāṃ mato 'nyasyānyadharmakalpanānirvacanīyāvaśyaṃbhāvinītyanirvacanīyatā sarvatantrasiddhānta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:741: api tu laukikānāmapītyāha-tathā ca loke 'nubhavaḥ--śuktikā hi rajatavadavabhāsata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:745: ekasya tvabhinnasya bhedabhramo na dṛṣṭa iti kutaścidātmano 'bhinnānāṃ jīvānāṃ bhedavibhrama ityatāha-ekaścandraḥ sadvitīyavaditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:747: ayamarthaḥ-cidātmā prakāśate na vāna cetprakāśate, kathamasminnadhyāso viṣayataddharmāṇā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:748: na khalvapratibhāsamāne purovartini dravye rajatasya vā taddharmāṇāṃ vā samāropaḥ saṃbhavatiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:749: pratibhāse vā (na) tāvadayamātmā jaḍo ghaṭādivatparādhīnaprakāśa iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:750: na khalu sa eva kartā ca karma ca bhavati, virodhāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:753: 2-dhātvarthatāvacchedakaphalaśālitvaṃ karmatvamityukte gacchatītyādau saṃyogaphalasya grāma iva caitre 'pi samavetatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:758: na ca jñānakriyā parasamavāyinīti kathamasyāṃ karma,
GSP33brsvbh1u:759: na ca tadeva svaṃ ca paraṃ ca, virodhāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:763: ātmā jaḍo 'pi sarvārthajñāneṣu bhāsamāno 'pi kartaiva na karma,
GSP33brsvbh1u:765: yathā hi caitrasamavetakriyayā caitranagaraprāptāvubhayasamavetāyāmapi kriyamāṇāyāṃ nagarasyaiva karmatā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:770: śrūyate hi 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma'iti upapadyate ca,
GSP33brsvbh1u:771: tathā hi-yo 'yamarthaprakāśaḥ phalaṃ yasminnarthaśca ātmā ca prathete sa kiṃ jaḍaḥ svayaṃprakāśo vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:772: jaḍaścetviṣayātmānāvapi jaḍāviti kasminkiṃ prakāśetāviśeṣāt, iti prāptamāndhyamaśeṣasya jagataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:775: na ca nilīnameva vijñānamarthātmānau jñāpayati, cakṣurādivaditi vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:776: jñāpanaṃ hi jñānajananam, janitaṃ ca jñānaṃ jaḍaṃ sannoktadūṣaṇamativarteteti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:781: ātmā jaḍaḥ kiṃ na syāditivādinaṃ ātmasvaprakāśavādyāha---tathāpīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:787: 1-arthātmasaṃbandhinyāṃ saṃvidyajaḍāyāmapi nārthātmanoḥ prakāśamānatāsiddhiḥ paṇḍite 'pi putre piturapāṇḍityavadityāha---tatkimiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:789: tatkiṃ putraḥ paṇḍita iti pitāpi paṇḍito 'stu /
GSP33brsvbh1u:790: svabhāva eṣa saṃvidaḥ svayaṃprakāśāyā yadarthātmasaṃbandhiteti cet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:791: hanta putrasyāpi paṇḍitasya svabhāva eṣa yatpitṛsaṃbandhiteti
GSP33brsvbh1u:794: 2-yathā svabhāvasaṃbaddhā saṃvit tathā pitṛgatajanakatvasaṃbaddhaṃ putragatajanyatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:797: sahārthātmaprakāśena saṃvitprakāśo na tvarthātmaprakāśaṃ vineti tasyāḥ svabhāva iti cet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:799: tathā ca na svayaṃprakāśā saṃvit, na ca saṃvidarthātmaprakāśa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:804: prakāśo na saṃvido bhidyete', saṃvideva tau /
GSP33brsvbh1u:805: evaṃ cet yāvaduktaṃ bhavati saṃvitātmārthau saheti tāvaduktaṃ bhavati saṃvidarthātmaprakāśau saheti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:808: 4-saṃvidatiriktaprakāśānaṅgīkāre saṃvidarthātmānau saha prakāśata ityuktaṃ syāt tathā coktaputrapāṇḍityanyāyaprasaraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:823: na ca prakāśasyātmāno viṣayāḥte hi vicchinnadīrghasthūlatayānubhūyante,
GSP33brsvbh1u:828: tasmāccandre 'nubhūyamāne iva dvitīyaścandramāḥ svaprakāśādanyor'thaḥ anirvacanīya eveti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:837: na ca anirvācyārthabhedaḥ prakāśaṃ nirvācyaṃ bhettumarhati, atiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:838: na ca arthānāmapi parasparaṃ bhedaḥ samīcīnajñānapaddhatimadhyāste ityupariṣṭādupapādayiṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:839_0: tadayaṃ prakāśa eva svayaṃprakāśa ekaḥ kūṭasthanityo niraṃśaḥ pratyagātmāśakyanirvacanīyebhyo
GSP33brsvbh1u:839_1: dehendriyādibhya ātmānaṃ pratīpaṃ nirvacanīyamañcati jānātīti pratyaṅ sa cātmeti pratyagātmā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:846: kasmādayamayukta ityata āha-sarvo hi puro 'vasthite viṣaye viṣayāntaramadhyasyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:847: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yatparādhīnaprakāśamaṃśavacca tatsāmānyāṃśagrahe kāraṇadoṣavaśācca viśeṣāgrahe 'nyathā prakāśate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:848: pratyagātmā tvaparādhīnaprakāśatayā na svajñāne kāraṇānyapekṣate, yena tadāśrayairdeṣairduṣyet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:849: na cāṃśavān, yena kaścidasyāṃśo gṛhyeta, kaścinna gṛhyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:850: nahi tadeva tadānīmeva tenaiva gṛhītamagṛhītaṃ ca saṃbhavatīti na svayaṃprakāśapakṣe 'dhyāsaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:854: 9-śukteriva ekasyaiva vastunaḥ grahaṇāgrahaṇe siddhe kimityaupādhikaṃ viṣayatvaṃ sādhyata iti cet sāṃśasya tathā syāt ātmanastu niraṃśatvānna tathetyāha----nahīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:856: na hi śuktau apuraḥsthitāyāṃ rajatamadhyasyatīdaṃ rajatamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:857: tasmādatyantagrahe atyantāgrahe ca nādhyāsa iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:861: tatkathaṃ nādhyāsa ityata āha-yuṣmatpratyayāpetasya ca pratyagātmano 'viṣayatvaṃ bravīṣi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:863: tathā ca yo viṣayī sa eva cidātmā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:870: tathāpi anirvacanīyānādyavidyāparikalpitabuddhimanaḥ sūkṣmasthūlaśarīrendriyāvacchedakabhedenānavacchinno 'pi vastuto 'vacchinna iva abhinno 'pi bhinna iva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:871: akartāpi karteva abhoktāpi bhokteva aviṣayo 'pyasmatpratyayaviṣaya iva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:874: na hi cidekarasasyātmanaḥ cidaṃśe gṛhīte agṛhītaṃ kiñcidasti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:875: na khalvānandanityatvavibhutvādayo 'sya cidrūpādvastuto bhidyante, yena tadgrahe na gṛhyeran /
GSP33brsvbh1u:876: gṛhītā eva tu kalpitena bhedena na vivecitā ityagṛhītā ivābhānti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:878: yena cidātmani gṛhyamāṇe so 'pi gṛhīto bhavet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:880: tasmāccidātmanaḥ svayaṃprakāśasyaiva anavacchinnasya avacchinnebhyo buddhyādibhyo bhedāgrahāt tadadhyāsena jīvabhāva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:882: tathā hi-kartā bhoktā cidātmā ahaṃpratyaye pratyavabhāsate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:884: yasya ca buddhyādeḥ kāryakāraṇasaṃghātasya kriyābhogaśaktī na tasya caitanyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:885_2: ca janturiti ca kṣetrajña iti ca ākhyāyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:890: FN: 1-yatpūrvaṃ karmakartṛtvavirodha uktaḥ so 'pyanena parāsto veditavyaḥ, aupādhikaviṣayatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:893: na ca adhyāse sati viṣayatvaṃ viṣayatve ca adhyāsaḥ ityanyonyāśrayatvamiti sāṃpratam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:897: jīvo hi cidātmatayā svayaṃprakāśatayāviṣayo 'pyaupādhikena rūpeṇa viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:900: kintu pratyagātmā na svato nāpi parataḥ prathata ityaviṣayaḥ iti brūmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:901: tathā ca sarvathāprathamāne pratyagātmani kuto 'dhyāsa ityata āha-aparokṣatvācca pratyagātmaprasiddheḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:902: pratīca ātmanaḥ prasiddhiḥ prathā, tasyā aparokṣatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:903: yadyapi pratyagātmani nānyā prathāsti, tathāpi bhedopacāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:905: etaduktaṃ bhavati-avaśyaṃ cidātmāparokṣo 'bhyupetavyaḥ tadaprathāyāṃ sarvasyāprathanena jagadāndhyaprasaṅgādityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:906: śrutiścātra bhavati-'tameva bhāntamanu bhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:907: tadevaṃ paramārthaparihāramuktvābhyupetyāpi cidātmanaḥ parokṣatāṃ prauḍhavāditayā parihārāntaramāha-na cāyamasti niyamaḥ puro 'vasthita eva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:910: kasmādayaṃ na niyama ityata āha-apratyakṣe 'pi hyākāśe bālāstalamalinatādyadhyasanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:912: nabho hi dravyaṃ sat rūpasparśavirahānna bāhyendriyapratyakṣam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:914: atha ca tatra bālā avivekinaḥ paradarśitadarśinaḥ kadācitpārthivacchāyāṃ śyāmatāmāropya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:917: tatrāpi pūrvadṛṣṭasya taijasasya vā tāmasasya rūpasya paratra nabhasi smṛtirūpo 'vabhāsata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:922: tatkimarthamayamevādhyāsa ākṣepasamādhānābhyāṃ vyutpāditaḥ nādhyāsamātramityata āha-tametamevaṃlakṣaṇamadhyāsaṃ paṇḍitā avidyeti manyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:925: pratyagātmanyanātmādhyāsa eva sarvānarthahetuḥ na punā rajatādivibhramā iti sa evāvidyā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:926: tatsvarūpaṃ cāvijñātaṃ na śakyamucchettumiti tadeva vyutpādyaṃ nādhyāsamātram /
GSP33brsvbh1u:930: na caivaṃ pṛthagjanā api manyante 'dhyāsam, yena na vyutpādyetetyata uktam-paṇḍitā manyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:932: upāyābhāvāditi yo manyate taṃ prati tannirodhopāyamāha-tadvivekena ca vastusvarūpāvadhāraṇam-nirvicikitsaṃ jñānamvidyāmāhuḥ,paṇḍitāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:934: tatra śravaṇamananādibhiryadvivekavijñānaṃ tena vivekāgrahe nivartite, adhyāsāpabādhātmakaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:938: vastusvarūpāvadhāraṇaṃ vidyā cidātmarūpaṃ svarūpe vyavatiṣṭhata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:940: atinirūḍhanibiḍhavāsanānuvidvāvidyā vidyayāpabādhitāpi svavāsanāvaśātpunarudbhaviṣyati pravartayiṣyati ca vāsanādikāryaṃ svocitamityata āha-tatraivaṃ sati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:942: yatra yadadhyāsastatkṛtena doṣeṇa guṇena vā aṇumātreṇāpi sa na saṃbadhyate-antaḥkaraṇādidoṣeṇāśanāyādinā cidātmā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:944: etaduktaṃ bhavati-tattvāvadhāraṇābhyāsasya hi svabhāva eva sa tādṛśaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:950: viśeṣatastu cidātmasvabhāvasya tattvajñānasyātyantāntaraṅgasya kuto 'nirvācyayāvidyayā bādha iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:953: vivekāgrahādadhyasyāhamidaṃmamedamiti lokavyavahāraiti tatra vyapadeśalakṣaṇo vyavahāraḥ kaṇṭhoktaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:957: tattvaparicchedo hi pramā vidyā,tatsādhanāni pramāṇāni kathamavidyāvadviṣayāṇi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:958: nāvidyāvantaṃ pramāṇānyāśrayanti, tatkāryasya vidyāyā avidyāvirodhitvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:959: santu vā pratyakṣādīni saṃvṛtyāpi yathā tathā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:963: ayamarthaḥ-pramātṛtvaṃ hi pramāṃ prati kartṛtvam tacca svātantryam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:970: atha mā pravartiṣata pramāṇāni kiṃ naśchinnamityata āha-na hīndriyāṇyanupādāya pratyakṣādivyavahāraḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:971: vyavahriyate aneneti vyavahāraḥ phalam, pratyakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇānāṃ phalamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:977: atha svayameva kasmānna pravartata ityata āha-na cādhiṣṭhānamantareṇendriyāṇāṃ vyāpāraḥ-pramāṇānāṃ vyāpāraḥsaṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:978: na jātu karaṇānyanadhiṣṭhitāni kartrā svakārye vyāpriyante,
GSP33brsvbh1u:985: evamanadhyastātmabhāvaṃ dehendriyāditi vyāpārayan bhaviṣyati tadabhijñaḥ pramātotyata āha-na caitasminsarvasmin-itaretarātmādhyāse itaretarātmādhyāse ca,
GSP33brsvbh1u:995: pramāyāṃ khalu phale svatantraḥ pramātā bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:997: kathaṃ ca jaḍasyāntaḥkaraṇasya pariṇāmaścidrūpo bhavet, yadi cidātmā tatra nādhyasyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:998: kathaṃ caiṣa cidātmakartṛko bhavet, yadyantaḥkaraṇaṃ vyāpāravaccidātmani nādhyasyet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1008: āgamopapattipratipannapratyagātmatattvānāṃ vyutpannānāmapi puṃsāṃ pramāṇaprameyavyavahārā dṛśyanta iti kathamavidyāvadviṣayāṇyeva pramāṇānītyata āha-paśvādibhiścāviśeṣāditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1011: yādṛśo hi paśuśakuntādīnāmavipratipannamugdhabhāvānāṃ vyavahārastādṛśo vyutpannānāmapi puṃsāṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1016: atra caśabdādibhiḥ śrotrādīnāṃ saṃbandhe satiiti pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ darśitam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1019: tathā hi-śabdādisvarūpamupalabhya tajjātīyasya pratikūlatāmanusmṛtya tajjātīyatayopalabhyamānasya pratikūlatāmanumimīta iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1024: śāstraṃ tu 'jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta'ityādi na dehātmādhyāsena pravartitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1029: śāstraphalaṃ śāstragamyaṃ phalaṃ prayoktari pratīyate tasmāt prayoge 'nuṣṭhāne yajamānaḥ svayaṃ kartā syāditi sūtrārthāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1031: phalaṃ prayoktari tallakṣaṇatvāttasmātsvayaṃ prayoge syāt'(ā. 3 pā. 7 sū. 18)iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1032: na ca dehādi bhasmībhūtaṃ pāralaukikāya phalāya kalpata iti dehādyatiriktaṃ kañcidātmānamadhikāriṇamākṣipati śāstram,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1035: adhikāraśāstraṃ hi svargakāmasya puṃsaḥ paralokasaṃbandhaṃ vinā na nirvahatīti tāvanmātramākṣipet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1039: prayoktā hi karmaṇaḥ karmajanitaphalabhogabhāgī karmaṇyadhikārī svāmī bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1044: te tvavidyāvantamanuśāsanto nirmṛṣṭanikhilāvidyamanuśiṣṭaṃ svarūpe vyavasthāpayantītyetāvāneṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1049: tathā ca parasparāpahatārthatvena kṛtsna eva vedaḥ prāmāṇyamapajahyādityata āha-prāk ca tathābhūtātmeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1051: tasmāttu purastātkarmavidhayaḥ svocitaṃ vyavahāranirvartayanto nānupajātena brahmajñānena śakyā niroddhum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1053: yathā-'na hiṃsyātsarvā bhūtāni'iti sādhyāṃśaniṣedhe 'pi 'śyenenābhicaran yajeta'iti śāstraṃ pravartamānaṃ na hiṃsyādityanena na virudhyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1055: avajitakrodhārātayaḥ puruṣā niṣedhe 'dhikriyante, krodhārātivaśīkṛtāstu śyenādiśāstra iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1056: avidyāvatpuruṣaviṣayatvaṃ nātivartata iti yaduktaṃ tadeva sphorayati-tathāhiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1066: dehatādātmyamātmanyadhyasya dehadharmaṃ putrakalatrādisvāmyaṃ ca kṛśatvādivadāropya āha-ahameva vikalaḥ, sakalaḥ iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1067: svasya khalu sākalyena svābhyasākalyāt svāmīśvaraḥ sakalaḥ saṃpūrṇo bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1068: tathā svasya vaikalyena svāmyavaikalyāt, svāmīśvaro vikalo 'saṃpūrṇo bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1069: bāhyadharmā ye vaikalyādayaḥ svāmyapraṇālikayā saṃcaritāḥ śarīre tānātmanyadhyasyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1070: yadā ca paropādhyapekṣe dehadharme svāmye iyaṃ gatiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1071: tadā kaiva kathā anaupādhikeṣu dehadharmeṣu kṛśatvādiṣvatyāśayavānāha-tathā dehadharmāniti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1073: tato 'pyantaraṅgasyāntaḥkaraṇasya adhyastātmabhāvasya dharmān kāmasaṃkalpādīn ātmanyadhyasyatīti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1074: tadanena prapañcena dharmādhyāsamuktvā tasya mūlaṃ dharmyadhyāsamāha-evamahaṃpratyayinam-ahaṃpratyayo vṛttiryasmin antaḥkaraṇādau,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1091: virodhipratyayaṃ vinā kuto 'sya prahāṇamityaya uktam-ātmaikatvavidyāpratipattaye iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1097: etaduktaṃ bhavati-asmatpratyayasyātmaviṣayasya samīcīnatve sati brahmaṇo jñātvānniṣprayojanatvācca na jijñāsā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1098: tadabhāve ca na brahmajñānāya vedāntāḥ paṭhyeran /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1102: āropitaṃ hi rūpaṃ tattvajñānenāpodyate, na tu vāstavamatattvajñānena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1103: na hi rajjvā rajjutvaṃ sahasramapi sarpadhārāpratyayā apavadituṃ samutsahante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1108: tatkathaṃ sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāmātmaikatvapratipādanamartha ityata āha-yathā cāyamarthaḥ sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāṃ tathā vayamasyāṃ śārīrakamīmāṃsāyāṃ pradarśayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1110: tasya tvaṃpadābhidheyasya tatpadābhidheyaparamātmarūpatāmīmāṃsā yā sā tathoktā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1115: 1-nanu sarvasya vedasya kāryāvabodhaparatvāt siddhe brahmaṇi vedāntānāmaprāmāṇyaṃ syāditicettatrāha---aviśiṣṭastviti / lokavedayorvākyārthasyāviśeṣāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1116: mantrāṇāmiva devatādau vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi prāmāṇyaṃ syādityarthaḥ / yatpunaruktaṃ kāryaparatvaṃ vedasya taddharmaviṣayamunneyamiti vakṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1119: yadyapi ca vedāntebhyaścaitanyānandaghanaḥ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvarahito niṣprapañca ekaḥ pratyagātmā avagamyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1120_1: virudhyamānā vedāntāḥ svārthātpracyutā upacaritārthā vā japamātropayogino vetyavivakṣitasvārthāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1121: tathā ca tadarthavicārātmikā caturlakṣaṇī śārīrakamīmāṃsā nārabdhavyā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1122: na ca sarvajanīnāhamanubhavasiddha ātmā saṃdigdho vā saprayojano vā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1123: yena jijñāsyaḥ san vicāraṃ prayuñjīteḥiti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1127: evaṃ ca vedāntā nāvivakṣitārthāḥ, nāpyupacaritārthāḥ, kiṃ tūktakṣaṇāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1129: tasya ca vakṣyamāṇena krameṇa saṃdigdhatvāt prayojanavatvācca yuktā jijñāsā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1137: kintu brahmamīmāṃsākhyatarketikartavyatānujñātaviṣayairvedāntairāhitaṃ nirvicikitsaṃ brahmajñānameva samastaduḥkhopaśamarūpamānandaikarasaṃ paramaṃ naḥ prayojanam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1140: yathā svagrīvāgatamapi graiveyakaṃ kutaścidbhramānnāstīti manyamānaḥ pareṇa pratipāditamaprāptamiva prāpnoti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1141: jijñāsā tu saṃśayasya kāryamiti svakāraṇaṃ saṃśayaṃ sūcayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1146: tasyā mīmāṃsāyāḥ śāstram, sā hyanena śiṣyate śiṣyebhyo yathāvatpratipādyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1150: FN: 1-laghutvaṃ ca asaṃdigdhārthatvaṃ / sāṃśayikaṃ hi nānārthasphoravatvena guru bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1155: tadevaṃ sūtratātparyaṃ vyākhyāya tasya prathamapadaṃ atheti vyācaṣṭe-tatrāthaśabda ānantaryārthaḥ parigṛhyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1156: teṣu sūtrapadeṣu madhye yo 'yaṃ athaśabdaḥ sa ānantaryārtha iti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1161: jijñāsā tāvadiha sūtre brahmaṇaśca tatprajjñānācca śabdataḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1164_1: brahmatajjñānaprārambhārthastu syāditi cenna / pradhānaṃ pradhānenānveti / atra hi
GSP33brsvbh1u:1170_1: apradhānadaṇḍaḥ vivakṣyata iticenna / tatrahi 'maitrāvaruṇaḥ praiṣyeti cānvāha'iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:1170_2: mantreṇa prāpte praiṣānuvacane na vidhyanvayitvena vivakṣā kintu aprāpte 'pradhāne
GSP33brsvbh1u:1175: tadavivakṣāyāṃ tadasūcanena kākadantaparīkṣāyāmiva brahmamīmāṃsāyāṃ na prekṣāvantaḥ pravarteran /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1176: na hi tadānīṃ brahma vā tajjñānaṃ vābhidheyaprayojane bhavitumarhataḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1178: karmapravṛttyupayogitayā upacaritārthānāṃ vā japopayogināṃ vā 'hum phaḍ'ityevamādīnāmivāvivakṣitārthānāmapi svādhyāyādhyayanavidhyadhīnagrahaṇatvasya saṃbhavāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1179: tasmātsaṃdehaprayojanasūcanī jijñāsā iha padato vākyataśca pradhānaṃ vivakṣitavyā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1189: nāntatvaṃ nipātya 'māṅ māne'ityasmādvā 'mānapūjāyām'ityasmādvā dhātoḥ 'mānbadha-'ityādinānicchārthe sani vyutpāditasya mīmāṃsāśabdasya pūjitavicāra
GSP33brsvbh1u:1200: na ca svārthaparatvasyopapattau satyāṃ anyārthaparatvakalpanā yuktā, atiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1203: tathā ca maṅgalahetutvāt pratyahaṃ brahmajijñāsā kartavyeti sūtrārthaḥ saṃpadyata ityata āha-maṅgalasya ca vākyārthe samanvayābhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1204: padārtha eva hi vākyārthe samanvīyate, sa ca vācyo vā lakṣyo vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1205: na ceha maṅgalamathaśabdasya vācyaṃ vā lakṣyaṃ vā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1207: na ca kāryajñāpyayorvākyārthe samanvayaḥ śabdavyavahāre dṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1208: tatkimidānīṃ maṅgalārtho 'thaśabdaḥ teṣu teṣu na prayoktavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1211: 'iti smṛtivyākopa ityata āha-arthāntaraprayukta eva hyathaśabdaḥ śrutyā maṅgalaprayojano bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1212: arthāntareṣvānantaryādiṣu prayukto 'thaśabdaḥ śrutyā śravaṇamātreṇa veṇuvīṇādhvanivanmaṅgalaṃ kurvan,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1216: na cehānantaryārthasya sato na śravaṇamātreṇa maṅgalārthatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1219: tadyathemamevāthaśabdaṃ prakṛtya vimṛśyate kimayamathaśabda ānantarye athādhikāreḥiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1222: na ca prakṛtānapekṣā, tadanapekṣasya tadviṣayatvābhāvena asamānaviṣayatayā vikalpānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1223: na hi jātu bhavati kiṃ nitya ātmā, atha anityā buddhiriti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1224: tasmādānantaryaṃ vinā pūrvaprakṛtāpekṣa ihāthaśabdaḥ kasmānna bhavatītyata āhapūrvaprakṛtāpekṣāyāśca phalata ānantaryāvyatirekāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1227: sā ca pūrvaprakṛtārthāpekṣatve 'pyathaśabdasya sidhyatīti vyarthaṃ ānantaryārthatvāvadhāraṇāgraho 'smākamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1230: na ceha kalpāntaropanyāsa iti pāriśeṣyādānantaryārthaṃ eveti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1231: bhavatvānantaryārthaḥ, kimevaṃ satītyata āha-sati cānantaryārthatva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1232: na tāvadyasya kasyacidatrānantaryamiti vaktavyam, tasyābhidhānamantareṇāpi prāptatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1234: na cānantaryamātrasya dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā prayojanaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1235: tasmāttasyātrānantaryaṃ vaktavyaṃ yadvinā brahmajijñāsā na bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1239: dharmajijñāsāyā iva brahmajijñāsāyā api yogyatvāt svādhyāyā
GSP33brsvbh1u:1246: tasmādvedādhyayanānantaryameva brahmajijñāsāyā apyathaśabdārtha ityata āha-svādhyāyānantaryaṃ tu samānaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1248: atra ca svādhyāyena viṣayeṇa tadviṣayamadhyayanaṃ lakṣayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1249: tathā ca 'athāto dharmajijñāsā'ityanenaiva gatamiti nedaṃ sūtramārabdhavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1256: asyārthaḥ-'vividiṣanti yajñena'iti tṛtīyāśrutyā yajñādīnāmaṅgatvena brahmajñāne viniyogāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1259: tatrāpi ca na vākyārthajñānotpattāvaṅgabhāvo yajñādīnām, vākyārthajñānasya vākyādevotpatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1260: na ca vākyaṃ sahakāritayā karmāṇyapekṣata iti yuktam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1264: tasmin sati tadarthānuṣṭhānaparivarjanaṃ tataśca tadbodha iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1265: na ca vedāntavākyānāmeva svārthapratyāyane karmāpekṣā na vākyāntarāṇāmiti sāṃpratam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1268: kartṛbhoktṛrūpasya jīvātmano nityaśuddhabuddhodāsīnasvabhāvena tatpadārthena paramātmanaikyamaśakyaṃ drāgityeva pratipattuṃ āpātato 'śuddhasattvairyogyatāvirahaviniścayāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1273: tasmāt 'tattvamasi'ityādeḥ śrutamayena jñānena jīvātmanaḥ paramātmabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1283: ata eva śrutiḥ-'tameva dhīro vijñāya prajñāṃ kurvīta brāhmaṇaḥ' /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1285: vijñāya tarkopakaraṇena śabdena prajñāṃ bhāvanāṃ kurvītetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1288: yajñādisaṃskṛto hi puruṣaḥ ādaranairantaryadīrghakālairāsevamāno brahmabhāvanāmanādyavidyāvāsanāṃ samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1290: ata eva smṛtiḥ-'mahāyajñaiśca yajñaiśca brāhmīyaṃ kriyate tanuḥ' /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1293: asti hi smṛtiḥ-'ṛṇāni trīṇyapākṛtya mano mokṣe niveśayet' /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1295: anye tu 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena'ityādiśrutibhyastattatphalāya coditānāmapi karmaṇāṃ saṃyogapṛthaktvena brahmabhāvanāṃ pratyaṅgabhāvamācakṣate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1299: 2-'khādire paśuṃ badhnāti' 'khādiraṃ vīryakāmasya yūpaṃ kurvīta'iti ekasyaiva khādiratvasya kratvarthatvaṃ puruṣārthatvaṃ ca yathā tathā karmaṇāmapi ubhayārthatvaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1302: atra ca pāramarṣaṃ sūtram-'sarvāpekṣā ca yajñādiśruteraśvavat' (bra. a. 3. pā. 4 sū. 26) iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1304: tasmādyadi śrutyādayaḥ pramāṇaṃ yadi vā pāramarṣaṃ sūtraṃ sarvathā yajñādikarmasamuccitā brahmopāsanā viśeṣaṇa
GSP33brsvbh1u:1308: trayavatī anādyavidyātadvāsanāsamucchedakrameṇa brahmasākṣātkārāya mokṣāparanāmne kalpata iti tadarthaṃ karmāṇyanuṣṭheyāni /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1314_1: teṣāṃ grāmaḥ samūhastatsahitaṃ parasparavibhinnaṃ karmasvarūpaṃ tadapekṣitādhikārīviśeṣaśca
GSP33brsvbh1u:1314_2: tayorjñānaṃ vinā karmāṇyanuṣṭhātuṃ na śakyānītyanvayaḥ / atra dṛṣṭādṛṣṭeti dvitīyādhyāyagatā cintā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1321: tasmātsādhūktam 'karmāvabodhānantaryaṃ viśeṣaḥ'iti karmāvabodhena hi karmānuṣṭhānasāhityaṃ bhavati brahmopāsanāyā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1326: kiṃ kārye yathāgneyādīnāṃ paramāpūrve cirabhāviphalānukūle janayitavye samidādyapekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1331: FN: 1-bhāvanāsādhye sākṣātkāre yadi karmāpekṣā tarhi sa brahmasvarūpo na syāt tasyotpatsyamānatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1334: sākṣātkāraḥ kāryamabhyupeyaḥ, sa cotpādyo vā syāt, yathā saṃyavanasya piṇḍaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1336: FN: 2-'piṣṭaṃ saṃyauti'iti vihitasya saṃyavanasya piṇḍa utpādyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1342: na khalu ghaṭādisākṣātkāra iva jaḍasvabhāvebhyo ghaṭādibhyo bhinna indriyādyādheyo brahmasākṣātkāro bhāvanādheyaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1343: brahmaṇo 'parādhīnaprakāśatayā tatsākṣātkārasya tatsvabhāvyena nityatayotpādyatvānupapatteḥ, tato bhinnasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:1346: 3-sākṣātkārasya brahmaṇo bhinnatve brahma jaḍaṃ syāt śabdaśca parokṣapramāheturiti kevalabhāvanādheyaḥ sākṣātkāro 'pramā syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1350: na khalvanumānāvibuddhaṃ vahniṃ bhāvayataḥ śītāturasya śiśirabharamantharatarakāyakāṇḍasya sphurajjvālājaṭilānalasākṣātkāraḥ pramāṇāntareṇa saṃvādyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1365: mā bhūdbrahmasākṣātkāra utpādyādirūpa upāsanāyāḥ, saṃskāryastu anirvacanīyā
GSP33brsvbh1u:1370: vidyādvayapidhānāpanayanena bhaviṣyati, pratisīrāpihitā nartakīva pratisīrāpanayadvārā raṅga
GSP33brsvbh1u:1376: etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ-pratisīrāpanaye pāriṣadānāṃ nartakīviṣayaḥ sākṣātkāro bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1385: na hi sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti vā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1386: ārohapariṇāhavat dravyamiti vā śataśo 'pi jñānamabhyasyamānaṃ puruṣa eveti niścayāya paryāptam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1388: nanūktaṃ śrutamayena jñānena jīvātmanaḥ paramātmabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā yuktimayena ca vyavasthāpyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1400_1: antaḥkaraṇaṃ ca sopādhike ātmani janayatyahaṃvṛttimiti tasya siddhamaparokṣadhīhetutvam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1400_2: tacca śābdabrahmaikyadhīsaṃtativāsitaṃ jīvasya tatpadalakṣaṇabrahmātmatāṃ sākṣātkārayatītyāśayavānāha-na caiṣa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1402: na caiṣa sākṣātkāro mīmāṃsāsahitasyāpi śabdapramāṇasya phalam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1407: na cāyamanubhavo brahmasvabhāvo yena na janyeta, api tu antaḥkaraṇasyaiva vṛttibhedo brahmaviṣayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1409: na hi śābdajñānaprakāśyaṃ brahma svayaṃ prakāśaṃ na bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1410: sarvopādhirahitaṃ hi svayañjyotiriti gīyate, na tūpahitamapi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1415: 9-na cāntaḥkaraṇeti / nirupādhi brahmeti viṣayīkurvāṇā vṛttiḥ svasvetaropādhinivṛttiheturudayate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1416: svasyā apyupādhitvāt / evaṃ ca anupahitasya viṣayatvaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1421: anyathā caitanyacchāyāpattiṃ vināntaḥkaraṇavṛtteḥ svayamacetanāyāḥ svaprakāśatvānupapattau sākṣātkāratvāyogāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1428: 10-jīvasya prāgaparokṣatve 'pi śuddhabuddhatvādeḥ pārokṣyānna tatsākṣātkāro yathārthaṃ ityāśaṅkyāha-nahīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1431: jīva eva tu tattadupādhirahitaḥ śuddhabuddhatvādisvabhāvo brahmeti gīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1438: antaḥkaraṇavṛttau brahmasākṣātkāre janayitavye asti tadupāsanāyāḥ karmāpekṣeti cet
GSP33brsvbh1u:1444: FN: 3-kiṃ upāsanākārye sākṣātkāre karmaṇāmupayogaḥ uta, upāsanāsvarūpe / na kārye ityāha-tasyā iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1449: yadyucyeta niścite 'pi tattve viparyāsanibandhano vyavahāro 'nuvartamāno dṛśyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1450: yathā guḍasya mādhuryaviniścaye api pittopahatendriyāṇāṃ tiktatāvabhāsānuvṛttiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1452: tasmādavidyāsaṃskārānuvṛttyā karmānuṣṭhānam, tena ca vidyāsahakāriṇā tatsamuccheda upapatsyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1454: karmaṇo vā taducchedakasya kuta ucchedaḥ iti vācyam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1460: yathā vā katakarajo rajo 'ntarāvile pāthasi prakṣiptaṃ rajo 'ntarāṇi bhindat svayamapi bhidyamānamanāvilaṃ pāthaḥ karoti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1466: pittopahatendriya iva guḍaṃ thūtkṛtya tyajannapi tasya tiktatām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1470: kriyākartrādisvarūpavibhāgaṃ ca vidvasyamāna iha vidvānabhimataḥ karmakāṇḍe /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1471: ata eva bhagavān vidvadviṣayatvaṃ śāstrasya varṇayāṃbabhūva bhāṣyakāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1474: na cānadhikṛtena samarthenāpi kṛtaṃ vaidika karma phalāya kalpate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1476: tena dṛṣṭārtheṣu karmasu śaktaḥ pravartamānaḥ prāpnotu phalam, dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1477: adṛṣṭārtheṣu tu śāstraikasamadhigamyaṃ phalamanadhikāriṇi na yujyata iti nopāsanākārye karmāpekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1480: evaṃ niṣedhavidhayo 'pi manuṣyādhikārā iti tadabhimānarahitasteṣvapi nādhikriyeta paśvādivat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1481: tathā cāyaṃ niṣiddhamanutiṣṭhan na pratyaveyāt, tiryagādivaditi bhinnakarmatāpātaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1483: na khalvayaṃ sarvathā manuṣyābhimānarahitaḥ kiṃ tvavidyāsaṃskārānuvṛttyāsya mātrayā tadabhimāno 'nuvartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1484: anuvartamānaṃ ca mithyeti manyamāno na śraddhatta ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1489: api tu niṣidhyamānakriyonmukho nara ityeva pravartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1490: tathā ca sāṃsārika iva śabdāvagatabrahmatattvo 'pi niṣedhamatikramya pravartamānaḥ pratyavaitīti na bhinnakarmadarśanābhyupagamaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1496: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'nakarmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgenaike amṛtatvamānaśuḥ' /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1501: FN: 5-iha janmāntare karma sattvaśuddhidvāreṇa jñānotpattiheturiti siddhāntamāha ārāditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1506: vastutaḥ pradhānasyāpi vedanasya prakṛtyarthatayā śabdato guṇatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1509: nahi rājapuruṣamānayetyukte vastutaḥ pradhānamapi rājā puruṣaviśeṣaṇatayā śabdata upasarjana ānīyate 'pi tu puruṣa eva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1521: upadhīyate-puṇyenopacīyate iti viditvā yaḥ karma carati sa ātmaśuddhyarthaṃ yajannātmayājī sa ca devayājitaḥ kāmyakartuḥ śreyāniti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1523: vā ātmāyājī yo veda idaṃ me 'nenāṅgaṃ saṃskriyata idaṃ me 'nenāṅgamupadhīyate'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1526_1: jñānottapattiṃ darśayatyātharvaṇī śrutiḥ-'viśuddhasattvastatastu taṃ paśyati niṣkalaṃ dhyāyamānaḥ'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1528: kḷptenaiva ca nityānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nityehitenopāttaduritanibarhaṇadvāreṇa puruṣasaṃskāreṇa jñānotpattāvaṅgabhāvopapattau na saṃyoga
GSP33brsvbh1u:1531: 2-idamatra bodhyam-saṃyogapṛthaktvenāṅgabhāve siddhe 'pi na samuccayavādyabhimataḥ sākṣādaṅgabhāvo yuktaḥ api tu paraṃparayā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1532_0: kalpanāgauravāt / yathā prakṛtau kḷptopakārāṇāṃ vikṛtau tadatiriktopakārakalpane
GSP33brsvbh1u:1532_1: gauravaṃ tathā jñāne viniyuktayajñādīnāṃ kḷptapāpakṣayātiriktakalpane gauravāpatterna
GSP33brsvbh1u:1537: sa hi anityāśuciduḥkharūpe saṃsāre nityaśucisukhakhyātilakṣaṇena viparyāsena cittasattvaṃ malinayati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1538: tataḥ pāpanivṛttau pratyakṣopapattipravṛttidvārāpāvaraṇe sati pratyakṣopapattibhyāṃ saṃsārasya anityāśuciduḥkharūpatāmapratyūhamavabudhyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1543: tataḥ śravaṇādikrameṇa tajjñānātītyārādupakārakatvaṃ tattvajñānotpādaṃ prati cittasattvaśuddhyā karmaṇāṃ yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1546: evaṃ cānanuṣṭhitakarmāpi prāgbhavīyakarmavaśāt yo viśuddhasattvaḥ saṃsārāsāratādarśanena niṣpannavairāgyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1549: imameva ca puruṣadhaureyabhedamadhikṛtya pravavṛte śrutiḥ-'yadi vetarathā brahmacaryādeva pravrajet'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1551: ata eva na brahmacāriṇa ṛṇāni santi, yena tadapākaraṇārthaṃ karmānutiṣṭhet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1552: etadanurodhācca 'jāyamāno vai brāhmaṇastribhirṛṇavā jāyate'iti gṛhasthaḥ saṃpadyamāna iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1555: jarāmaryavādo bhasmāntatāvādo 'ntyeṣṭayaśca karmajaḍānaviduṣaḥ prati, na tvātmatattvapaṇḍitān /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1557: yadvinā brahmajijñāsā na bhavati yasmiṃstu sati bhavantī bhavatyeva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1558: na cetthaṃ karmāvabodhaḥ tasmānna karmāvabodhānantaryamātrāthaśabdārtha iti sarvamavadātam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1563: 3-'agnihotraṃ juhoti yavāgūṃ pacati'ityāmnāyate / tatra kramasaṃśaye dravyamantarā yāgāniṣpatteḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1564: anyadravyānayane śrutavaiyarthyāt dṛṣṭaprayojane ārādupakārakatvasyānyāyyatvāt 'arthācca'yavāgūṃ paktvā juhotīti kramaḥ / tatheha na saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1568: 'gṛhī bhūtvā vanī bhavet vanī bhūtvā pravrajet'iti jābālaśrutirgārhasthyena hi yajñādyanuṣṭhānaṃ sūcayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1570: iṣṭā ca śaktito yajñairmano mokṣe niveśayet //
GSP33brsvbh1u:1575: 'hṛdayasyāgre 'vadyati atha jihvāyā atha vakṣasaḥ'ityathāgraśabdābhyāṃ kramasya vivakṣitatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1587: 1-'samidho yajati'ityādayaḥ pañca prayājā darśapaurṇamāsāṅgatayāmnātāḥ / teṣāṃ pāṭhataḥ kramaḥ / jyotiṣṭomavikāre sādyaskrayāge 'tideśaprāptāstrayaḥ paśavaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ savanīyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1588_0: anubandhaśca / vikṛtau 'saha paśūnālabheta'iti śravaṇātprākṛtaḥ kramo nivartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1588_1: sahatvaṃ cedaṃ savanīyasthāne / tathāsati itarayostulyaṃ sthānacalanaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1588_3: sthānakramaḥ / 'sārasvatau bhavata etadvai daivyaṃ mithunaṃ yatsarasvatī sarasvāṃśca'iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:1588_4: yugapatkarmadvayaṃ śrūyate / atra prathamaṃ sarasvatīdaivatasya yājyānuvākyāyugalaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1588_5: paṭhyato tato sarasvaddaivatasya / tasmādetatkrameṇa karmadvayakrama iti jñāyate
GSP33brsvbh1u:1588_7: krama iti niyamyate soyaṃ mukhyakramaḥ / idaṃ ca pravṛttikramasyāpyudāharaṇaṃ veditavyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1589: yājyānuvākyāpravṛttikrameṇa nirvāpādīnāṃ kramasya siddhatvāditi vistarabhayāddiṅmātraṃ darśitam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1595: 2-eko yaḥ phalavato darśapaurṇamāsāderupakārastasminsādhanatvenopanibaddhāḥ śeṣāḥ śeṣiṇaśca / anena ekaprayogavacanopagṛhītatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1604: 4-anena yugapadanuṣṭhānamityuktaṃ tacca na kramamantarā siddhyediti sarvatra kramāpekṣā prakṛte tu pṛthaktvānna kramāpekṣeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1609: yatra tu na śeṣaśeṣibhāvaḥ nāpyekādhikārāvacchedaḥ yathā sauryāryamṇa
GSP33brsvbh1u:1612: 5-'sauryaṃ caruṃ nirvapedbrahmavarcasakāmaḥ' 'āryamaṇaṃ caruṃ nirvapet svargakāmaḥ' 'prājāpatyaṃ caruṃ nirvapecchatakṛṣṇalakāmaḥ'ityādi bhinnaphalakayagānāṃ na kramaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1618: na ceha dharmabrahmajijñāsayoḥ śeṣaśeṣibhāve śrutyādīnāmanyatamaṃ pramāṇamastīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1625: yathā vā 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāmiṣṭvā somena yajeta'iti darśapūrṇamāsasomayoraśeṣaśeṣiṇorityata āha-adhikṛtādhikāre vā pramāṇābhāvāt-iti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1626: svargakāmasya hi darśapūrṇamāsādhikṛtasya paśukāmasya sato darśapūrṇamāsakratvarthāppraṇayanāśrite godohane adhikāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1635: yathāgneyādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāmekasvargaphalāvacchinnānāmyadi vā jijñāsyabrahmaṇo 'śo dharmaḥ syāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1636: yathā caturlakṣaṇīvyutpādyaṃ brahma kenacitkenacidaṃśenaikaikena lakṣaṇena vyutpādyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1637: tatra caturṇāṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ jijñāsyābhedena parasparasaṃbandhe sati kramo vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1640: jijñāsāyā vastuto jñānatantratvāt jñānaphalaṃ jijñāsāphalamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1641: na kevalaṃ svarūpataḥ phalabhedaḥ, tadutpādanaprakārabhedādapi tadbheda ityāha-taccānuṣṭhānāpekṣam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1647: bhavitā ca bhāvakavyāpāranirvartyatayā tattantra iti tataḥ prāgjñānakāle nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1652: codaneti vaidikaṃ śabdamāha, viśeṣeṇa sāmānyasya lakṣaṇāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1670: bhāvanāyāstaddvāreṇa ca yāgāderapekṣitopāyatāmavagamayantī tatrecchopahāramukhena puruṣaṃ niyuñjānaiva yāgādidharmamavabodhayati nānyathā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1671: brahmacodanā tu puruṣamavabodhayatyeva kevalaṃ na tu pravartayantyavabodhayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1673_1: puruṣo brahmāvabodhyata iti samānatvaṃ dharmacodanābhirbrahmacodanānāmityata āha-na
GSP33brsvbh1u:1682: api cātmajñānavidhipareṣu vedānteṣu nātmatattvaviniścayaḥ śābdaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1683: na hi tadātmatattvaparāste, kintu tajjñānavidhiparāḥ, yatparāśca te ta eva teṣāmarthāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1684: na ca bodhasya bodhyaniṣṭhatvādapekṣitatvāt, anyaparebhyo 'pi bodhyatattvaviniścayaḥ, samāropeṇā
GSP33brsvbh1u:1691: yasminnasati brahmajijñāsā na bhavati sati tu bhavantī bhavatyevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1697: tathā sati eṣa viparyāsādanyaḥ saṃśayaḥ syāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1706: nityatvaṃ satyatvaṃ tadyasyāsti tannityaṃ satyam,tathā cāsthāgocaraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1708: tadeteṣvanubhūyamāneṣu yuṣmadasmatpratyayagocareṣu viṣayaviṣayiṣu yadṛtaṃ nityaṃ sukhaṃ vyavasthāsyate tadāsthāgocaro bhaviṣyati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1710: so 'yaṃ nityānityavastuvivekaḥ prāgbhavīyādaihikādvā vaidikātkarmaṇo viśuddhasattvasya bhavatyanubhavopapattibhyām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1711: na khalu satyaṃ nāma na kiñcidastīti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1712: tadabhāve tadadhiṣṭhānasyānṛtasyāpyanupapatteḥ, śūnyavādināmapi śūnyatāyā eva satyatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1713_0: athāsya puruṣadhaureyasyānubhavopapattibhyāmevaṃ sunipuṇaṃ nirūpayataḥ ā ca satyalokāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:1713_1: ā cāvīceḥ jāyasva mriyasva iti viparivartamānaṃ kṣaṇamuhūrtayāmāhorātrārdhamāsamāsartvayanavatsarayugacaturyugamanvantarapralayamahāpralayamahāsargāvāntarasargasaṃsārasāgarormibh iraniśamuhyamānaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1714: tāpatrayaparītamātmānaṃ ca jīvalokaṃ cāvalokya asminsaṃsāramaṇḍale anityāśuciduḥkhātmakaṃ prasaṃkhyānamu
GSP33brsvbh1u:1726: rāgādikaṣāyamadirāmattaṃ hi manasteṣu teṣu viṣayeṣūccāvacamindriyāṇi pravartayat,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1730: so 'yamasya vairāgyahetuko manovijayaḥ śama iti vaśīkārasaṃjña iti cākhyāyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1731: vijitaṃ ca manastattvaviṣayaviniyogayogyatāṃ nīyate,seyamasya yogyatā damaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1732: yathā dānto 'yaṃ vṛṣabhayuvā halaśakaṭādivahanayogyaḥ kṛta iti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1734: ata eva śrutiḥ-'tasmācchānto dānta uparatastitikṣuḥ śraddhāvitto bhūtvātmanyevātmānaṃ paśyet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1736: tadetasya śamadamādirūpasya sādhanasya saṃpat, prakarṣaḥ, śamadamādisādhanasaṃpat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1738: tasya ca nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvabrahmajñānaṃ mokṣasya kāraṇamityupaśrutya tajjijñāsā bhavati dharmajijñāsāyāḥ prāgūrdhvaṃ ca,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1740: na kevalaṃ jijñāsāmātram, api tu jñānamapītyāha-jñātuṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1747: 2-athaśabdena jijñāsāhetupratipādanātkimataḥśabdenetyāśaṅkya nānena hetorabhidhānaṃ kiṃ tu pūrvoktahetutvarūpāsiddhiparihāra ityāha-atraivamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1757: tadyathā-matsyārthī saśalkānsakaṇṭakānmatsyānupādatte, sa yāvadādeyaṃ tāvadādāya vinivartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1761: na hi mṛgāḥ santīti śālayo nopyante, bhikṣukāḥ santīti sthālyo nādhiśrīyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1762: api ca dṛṣṭaṃ sukhaṃ candanavanitādisaṅgajanma kṣayitālakṣaṇena duḥkhenāghrātatvādatibhīruṇā tyajyetāpi,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1765: tathā ca 'akṣayyaṃ ha vai cāturmāsyayājinaḥ sukṛtaṃ bhavati' /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1766: na ca kṛtakatvahetukaṃ vināśitvānumānamatra saṃbhavati, naraśiraḥkapālaśaucānumānavat
GSP33brsvbh1u:1770: śaṅkhavadityanumānaṃ 'nāraṃ spṛṣṭvāsthi sasnehaṃ savāsā jalamāviśet'ityāgamādbādhitaviṣayaṃ tathā sukṛtamanityaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1780: na hi madhuviṣasaṃpṛktamannaṃ viṣaṃ parityajya samadhu śakyaṃ śilpivareṇāpi bhoktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1781: kṣayitānumānopodbalitaṃ ca 'tadyatheha karmajitaḥ'ityādi vacanaṃ kṣayitāpratipādakam 'apāma somam'ityādikaṃ vacanaṃ mukhyāsaṃbhave jaghanyavṛttitāmāpādayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1783: atra ca brahmapadena tatpramāṇaṃ veda upasthāpitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1784: sa ca yogyatvāt 'tadyatheha karmacitaḥ'ityādirataḥ iti sarvanāmnā parāmṛśya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1787: yathā svargādeḥ kṛtakasya sukhasya duḥkhānuṣaṅgastathā brahmaṇo 'pītyata āha-tathā brahmavijñānādapīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1792: ṣaṣṭhīsamāsapradarśanena prācāṃ vṛttikṛtāṃ brahmaṇe jijñāsā brahmajijñāseti caturthīsamāsaḥ parāsto veditavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1793: 'tādarthyasamāse prakṛtivikṛtigrahaṇaṃ kartavyam'iti kātyāyanīyavacanena yūpadārvādiṣveva prakṛtivikārabhāve caturthīsamāsaniyamāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1798: brahmaṇo jijñāsetyukte tatrānekārthatvādbrahmaśabdasya saṃśayaḥ, kasya brahmaṇo jijñāseti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1804: yato brahmajijñāsāṃ pratijñāya tajjñāpanāya paramātmalakṣaṇaṃ praṇayati tato 'vagacchāmaḥ paramātmajijñāsaiveyaṃ na vipratvajātyādijijñāsetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1807: saṃbandhamātraṃ ca śeṣa iti brahmaṇo jijñāsetyukte brahmasaṃbandhinī jijñāsetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1808: tathā ca brahmasvarūpapramāṇayuktisādhanaprayojanajijñāsāḥ sarvā brahmajijñāsārthā brahmajijñāsayāvaruddhā bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1812: tathā cāpratijñātārthacintā pramāṇādiṣu bhavediti ye manyante tānpratyāha-brahmaṇa iti karmaṇi iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1814: icchāyāḥ pratipattyanubandho jñānam, jñānasya ca jñeyaṃ brahma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1815: na khalu jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ vinā nirūpyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1816: na ca jijñāsā jñānaṃ vineti pratipattyanubandhatvāt prathamaṃ jijñāsā karmaivāpekṣate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1817: na tu saṃbandhimātram;tadantareṇāpi sati karmaṇi tannirūpaṇāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1818: na hi candramasamādityaṃ vopalabhya kasyāyamiti saṃbandhyanveṣaṇā bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1824: nanu satyaṃ na jijñāsyamantareṇa jijñāsā nirūpyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1826: brahma tu śeṣatayā saṃbhantsyata ityata āha-jijñāsyāntareti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1832: nigūḍhābhiprāya eva dūṣayati-evamapi pratyakṣaṃ brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1833: vācyasya karmatvasya jijñāsayā prathamamapekṣitasya prathamasaṃbandhārhasya cānvayaparityāgena paścātkathañcidapekṣitasya saṃbandhimātrasya saṃbandho,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1851: na kevalaṃ jñānamiṣyate kintvavagatiṃ sākṣātkāraṃ kurvadavagatiparyantaṃ sanvācyāyā icchāyāḥ karma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1855: nahyanapekṣaṇīyaviṣayamavagatiparyantamapi jñānamiṣyata ityata āha-jñānena hi pramāṇenāvagantumiṣṭaṃ brahma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1856: bhavatu brahmaviṣayāvagatiḥ, evamapi kathamiṣṭetyata āha-brahmāvagatirhi puruṣārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1859: kiṃ tu niḥśreyasaṃ vigalitanikhiladuḥkhānuṣaṅgaparamānandaghanabrahmāvagatirbrahmaṇaḥ svabhāva iti saiva niḥśreyasaṃ puruṣārtha iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1869_1: na pratibhātīva parādhīnaprakāśa iva dehendriyādibhyo bhinno 'pyabhinna iva bhāsata
GSP33brsvbh1u:1869_2: iti saṃsārabījāvidyādyanarthanibarhaṇātprāgaprāpta iva tasminsati prāpta iva bhavatīti
GSP33brsvbh1u:1877: tacca na kevalebhyo vedāntebhyo 'pi tu brahmamīmāṃso
GSP33brsvbh1u:1879: FN: 1-atredaṃ bodhyam-brahmātmatāmicchatā jñānameṣitavyaṃ tacca vicāropakaraṇebhyo vedāntebhyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1880: tathāca sati brahmavicāraḥ kartavya ityarthaḥ syāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1882: vicārasyādhikāryatvāditicet jñātumicchā jijñāsā / sā hi saṃdigdher'the nirṇayāya bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1883_0: sa ca vicārasādhya iti vicārakartavyatārthādgamyate / ārthike cāsminnarthe kartavyapadādhyāhāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1883_1: śrautastu sādhanacatuṣṭayānantaraṃ brahmajñānecchā bhavituṃ yuktetyeṣaḥ / tasmānna
GSP33brsvbh1u:1885: pakaraṇebhya iti icchāmukhena brahmamīmāṃsāyāṃ pravartyate, na tu vedānteṣu tadarthavivakṣāyāṃ vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1886: tatra phalavadarthāvabodhaparatāṃ svādhyāyādhyayanavidheḥ sūtrayatā 'athāto dharmajijñāsā'ityanenaiva pravartitatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1888: yadyapi ca dharmamīmāṃsāvat vedārthamīmāṃsayā brahmamīmāṃsāpyākṣeptuṃ śakya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1890: nāpi brahmamīmāṃsāyā adhyayanamātrānantaryamiti brahmamīmāṃsārambhāya nityānityavivekādyānantaryapradarśanāya cedaṃ sūtramārambhaṇīyamityapaunaruktyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1892: etena sūtreṇa brahmajñānaṃ pratyupāyatā mīmāṃsāyāḥ pratipādyata ityuktam tadayuktam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1901: athāprasiddhaṃ vedāntebhyastarhi na tadvedāntāḥ pratipādayantīti sarvathāprasiddhaṃ naiva śakyaṃ jijñāsitum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1902: anubhūte hi priye bhavatīcchā na tu sarvathānanubhūtāpūrve /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1912: ayamarthaḥ-prāgapi brahmamīmāṃsāyā pūrvaṃ adhītavedasya nigamaniruktavyākaraṇādipariśīlanaviditapadatadarthasaṃbandhasya 'sadeva somyedamagra āsīt'ityupakramāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1920: FN: 2-nityatvaṃ ca dhvaṃsāpratiyogitve sati prāgabhāvāpratiyogitvarūpaṃ bodhyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1929: muktau satyāmasyaite śuddhatvādayaḥ prathante, tatastu prāk dehā
GSP33brsvbh1u:1931: FN: 4-bhedābhedamatena śaṅkā / samādhānaṃ tu sadaiva mukta iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1934: sadaiva muktaḥ sadaiva kevalo 'nādyavidyāvaśāt bhrāntyā tathāvabhāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1942: na kevalam 'sadeva somyedam'ityādīnāṃ vākyānāṃ paurvāparyālocanayā itthaṃbhūtabrahmāvagatiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1952: tadevaṃ tatpadārthasya śuddhatvādeḥ prasiddhimabhidhāya tvaṃpadārthasyāpyāha-sarvasyātmatvācca brahmāstitvaprasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1968: na na pratyetyahamasmīti, kintu pratyetyeveti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1969: nanvahamasmīti ca jñāsyati mā ca jñāsīdātmānamityata āha-yadīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1971: ahaṅkārāspadaṃ hi jīvātmānaṃ cenna pratīyāt, ahamiti na pratīyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1972: nanu pratyetu sarvo jana ātmānamahaṅkārāspadam, brahmaṇi tu kimāyātamityata āha-ātmā ca brahma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1978: ākṣeptā prathamakalpāśrayaṃ doṣamāha-yadi tarhi loka iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1987: anyathā anāśrayā bhinnāśrayā vā vipratipattayo na syuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1993: tvaṃpadārthasya ca jīvātmano lokataḥ siddhiḥ sarvatantrasiddhāntaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1995: tasmātsāmānyataḥ prasiddhe dharmiṇi viśeṣato vipratipattau yuktastadviśeṣeṣu saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1998: atra dehendriyamanaḥkṣaṇikavijñānacaitanyapakṣe na tatpadārthanityatvādayaḥ tvaṃpadārthena saṃbadhyante, yogyatāvirahāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2008: 1-vedaprāmāṇyavādino mīmāṃsakāḥ / tehi kriyārthatvamāmnāyasya bruvāṇā vedāntā aupacārikā vā avivakṣitasvārthā vā manyanta iti darśitaṃ prāk /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2011: tadevaṃ tvaṃpadārthavipratipattidvārā tatpadārthe vipratipattiṃ sūcayitvā sākṣāttatpadārthe vipratipattimāha-asti tadvyatirikta īśvaraḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktiriti kecit /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2017: na tvaṃpadārthena sāmānādhikaraṇyamiti svamatamāha-atmā sa bhokturityapare /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2018: bhokturjīvātmano 'vidyopādhikasya sa īśvarastatpadārtha ātmā,tata īśvarādabhinno jīvātmā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2023: tannimittaśca saṃśayaḥtathāpi kimarthaṃ brahmamīmāṃsārabhyata ityata āha-tatrāvicāryeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2028: tadavirodhinaśca ye 'nye 'pi tarkā adhvaramīmāṃsāyāṃ nyāye ca vedapratyakṣādiprāmāṇyapariśodhanādiṣūktāsta upakaraṇaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2036: yatra yadyapi brahmasvarūpajñānasya pradhānasya pratijñayā tadaṅgānyapi pramāṇādīni pratijñātāni,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2039: na tenopalabdhena tadviruddhasya nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvasya brahmaṇaḥ svarūpaṃ śakyaṃ lakṣayitum,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2040: na hi jātu kaścitkṛtakatvena nityaṃ lakṣayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2041: na ca taddharmeṇa nityatvādinā tallakṣyate, tasyānupalabdhacaratvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2045: FN: 1-itarapramāṇenāprasiddhamapi śabdataḥ prasiddhaṃ syāditi cettatrāha-evaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2051: mā bhūdanubhūyamānaṃ jagattaddharmatayā tādātmyena vā brahmaṇo lakṣaṇam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2055: tadutpattyā tu bhaviṣyati deśāntaraprāptiriva saviturvrajyāyā iti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2057: lāghavāya sūtrakṛtā janmādīti napuṃsakaprayogaḥ kṛtastadupapādanāya samāhāramāha-janmasthitibhaṅgamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2060: pradhānakālagrahalokapālakriyāyadṛcchāsvabhāvābhāveṣūpaplavamāneṣu satsu sarvajñaṃ sarvaśaktisvabhāvaṃ brahma jagajjanmādikāraṇamiti kutaḥ saṃbhāvanetyata āha-asya jagata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2061: atranāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākṛtasya iti cetanabhāvakartṛkatvasaṃbhāvanayā pradhānādyacetanakartṛkatvaṃ nirupākhyakartṛkatvaṃ ca vyāsedhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2062: yatkhalu nāmnā rūpeṇa ca vyākriyate taccetanakartṛkaṃ dṛṣṭam, yathā ghaṭādi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2063: vivādādhyāsitaṃ ca jagannāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākṛtam tasmāccetanakartṛkaṃ saṃbhāvyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2064: cetano hi buddhāvālikhya nāmarūpe ghaṭa iti nāmnā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2065: rūpeṇa ca kambugrīvādinā bāhyaṃ ghaṭaṃ niṣpādayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2066: ata eva ghaṭasya nirvartyasyāpyantaḥ saṃkalpātmanā siddhasya karmakārakabhāvo ghaṭaṃ karotīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2068: tathā cācetano buddhāvanālikhitaṃ karotīti na śakyaṃ saṃbhāvayitumiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2070: cetanā grahā lokapālā vā nāmarūpe buddhāvālikhya jagajjanayiṣyanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2072: kecitkartāro bhavanti, yathā sūdartvigādayaḥ, na bhoktāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2073: kecittu bhoktāraḥ, yathā śrāddhavaiśvānareṣṭyādiṣu pitāputrādayaḥ, na kartāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2076: deśādīni ca tāni pratiniyatāni ceti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2085: evaṃ ya eva sukhinasta eva kadācidduḥkhinaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2086: sarvametadākasmikāparanāmni yādṛcchikatve vā svābhāvikatve vā sarvajñāsarvaśaktikartṛkatve ca na ghaṭate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2089: ekasyā api hi śarīraracanāyā rūpaṃ manasā na śakyaṃ cintayituṃ kadācit,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2095: na tu vṛddhipariṇāmāpakṣayā apītyata āha-anyeṣāmapi bhāvavikārāṇāṃ--vṛddhyādīnāntriṣvevāntarbhāva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2097: tenālpāvayavādavayavino dvitantukāderanya eva mahānpaṭo jāyata iti janmaiva vṛddhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2105: tathā sati hi tatpratipādake 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni'iti vedavākye buddhisthīkṛte jaganmūlakāraṇaṃ brahma lakṣitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2106: anyathā tu jāyate 'sti vardhate ityādīnāṃ grahaṇe tatpratipādakaṃ nairuktavākyaṃ buddhau bhavet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2111: tannāntarīyakatayā tu sthitibhaṅgaṃ gamyata ityata āha-yotpattirbrahmaṇaḥ kāraṇā
GSP33brsvbh1u:2120_1: upādānatvaṃ sidhyet / nahi daṇḍādiṣu ghaṭādayo līyante / tasmāditaravaiyarthyamiticenna /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2130: 3-nanu lakṣaṇādeva brahmasiddhau śāstrayonitvasamanvayādhikaraṇayorvaiyarthyamityāśaṅkāṃ pariharati-tadaneneti / lakṣaṇaṃhi siddhasya vastuno bhedamavagamayati īdṛśaṃ taditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2135_0: 4-utkaṭaikatarakoṭikaḥ saṃśayaḥ saṃbhāvanā / kāryeṇa hi kāraṇaṃ kiñcidastīti mitam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2135_1: tattvekamanekaṃ veti saṃdigdhaṃ / tasya yadaikatvaṃ sidhyati tadā tatsarvajñaṃ sarvaśakti
GSP33brsvbh1u:2135_2: ca bhavati / ayaṃ ca saṃdehaḥ kalpanālāghavākhyatarkeṇa utkaṭaikatarakoṭikatāṃ nītaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2135_3: saṃbhavānetyucyate prāsādādīnāmanekakartṛkatvasya dṛṣṭatvānna tatra nirṇayo bhavati
GSP33brsvbh1u:2142: yadanye vaiśeṣikakādaya ita evānumānādīśvaraviniścayamicchantīti saṃbhāvanāhetutāṃ draḍhayitumāha-etadeveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2149: tathā ca kuto mananam,kutaśca tadanubhavaḥ sākṣātkāraḥityata āha-satsu tu vedāntavākyeṣviti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2151: śabdāvirodhinyā tadupajīvinyā ca yuktyā vivecanaṃ mananam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2155: evaṃ brahmaṇyapi kasmānna bhavatītyata āha-na dharmajijñāsāyāmiveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2160: yadyapi dharmajijñāsāyāmapi sāmagryāṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ vyāpārastathāpi sākṣānnāsti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2161: brahmajijñāsāyāṃ tu sākṣādanubhavādīnāṃ saṃbhavo 'nubhavārthā ca brahmajijñāsetyāha-anubhavāvasānatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2176: anuṣṭhānasya ca vināpyanubhavaṃ śābdajñānamātrādeva siddherityāha-kartavye hītyādinā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2190: evaṃ nārāsthitasparśananiṣedho brahmaghnaśca tadvāraṇavidhirityevañjātīyakā vidhipratiṣedhā arthavantaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2193: yasmādgrahaṇāgrahaṇayoruditānuditahomayośca virodhātsamuccayāsaṃbhave tulyabalatayā ca bādhyabādhakabhāvābhāve satyagatyā vikalpaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2195: kintu sāmānyaśāstrasya sparśananiṣedhasya dhāraṇavidhiviṣayeṇa viśeṣaśāstreṇa bādhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2196: etaduktaṃ bhavati-vidhipratiṣedhaireva sa tādṛśo viṣayo 'nāgatotpādyarūpa upanītaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2198: bhūte vastuni tu neyamasti vidhetyāha-na tu vastvevaṃ naivamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2208: savāsanendriyamanoyonayo vā, yathāsthāṇurvā puruṣo vetisthāṇau saṃśayaḥ,puruṣa eveti va viparyāsaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2210: na tu puruṣatattvaṃ vā sthāṇutattvaṃ vāpekṣante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2212: tasmādayathāvastavo vikalpanā na vastu vikalpayanti vā anyathayanti vetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2217: evamuktena prakāreṇa bhūtavastuviṣayāṇāṃ jñānānāṃ prāmāṇyasya vastutantratāṃ prasādhya brahmajñānasya vastutantratāmāha-tatraivaṃ satīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2219: yat kila bhūtārthaṃ vākyaṃ tatpramāṇāntaragocarārthatayānuvādakaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2225: na tu vedāntavākyāni tadadhīnasatyatvānīti kathaṃ vedāntavākyagrathanārthatā sūtrāṇāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2228: kasmāt punarnendriyaviṣayatvaṃ pratīca ityata āha-svabhāvata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2255: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yathā rajjvajñānasahitarajjūpādānā hi dhārā rajjvāṃ satyāmasti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2265: na kevalaṃ jagadyonitvādasya bhagavataḥ sarvajñatā, śāstrayonitvādapi boddhavyā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2267_1: nityanaimittikakāmyakarmapaddhatiṣu ca brahmatattve ca śiṣyāṇāṃ śāsanāt śāstramṛgvedādiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2273: purāṇādipraṇetāro hi maharṣayaḥ śiṣṭāstaistayā tayā dvārā vedānvyācakṣāṇaistadarthacādareṇānutiṣṭhadbhiḥ parigṛhīto veda iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2277: sarvajñasya hi jñānaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ, śāstrasyāpyabhidhānaṃ sarvaviṣayamiti sādṛśyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2279: sarvajñasya guṇaḥ sarvaviṣayatātadanvitaṃ śāstram, asyāpi sarvaviṣayatvā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2283: 1-idamihānumānaṃ-brahma vedaviṣayādadhikaviṣayajñaṃ tatkartṛtvāt / yo yadvākyapramāṇakartā sa tadviṣayādadhikaviṣayajñaḥ yathā pāṇiniriti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2285: yadyadvistarārthaṃ śāstraṃ yasmātpuruṣaviśeṣātsaṃbhavati sa-puruṣaviśeṣaḥtato 'pi-śāstrātadhikataravijñānaḥ iti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2286: adyatve 'pyasmadādibhiryatsamīcīnārthaviṣayaṃ śāstraṃ viracyate tatrāsmākaṃ vaktṛṇāṃ vākyājjñānamadhikaviṣayam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2287: nahi te te 'sādhāraṇadharmā anubhūyamānā api śakyā vaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2289: vistarārthamapi vākyaṃ na vaktṛjñānena tulyaviṣayamiti kathayituṃ vistaragrahaṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2291: vedasya yasmāt mahato bhūtāt yoneḥ saṃbhavaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2292: tasya mahato bhūtasya brahmaṇo niratiśayaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ ca sarvaśaktitvaṃ ca kimu vaktavyamiti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2298: devarṣayo hi mahāpariśrameṇāpi yatrāśaktastadayamīṣatprayatnena līlayaiva karotīti niratiśayamasya sarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktitvaṃ coktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2300: ye 'pi tāvat varṇānāṃ nityatvamāsthiṣata tairapi padavākyādīnāmanityatvamabhyupeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2304: varṇānāṃ nityānāṃ vibhūnāṃ ca kālato deśato vā paurvāparyāyogāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2305: vyaktiścānityeti kathaṃ tadupagṛhītānāṃ varṇānāṃ nityānāmapi padatā nityā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2308: yathā hi yādṛśaṃ gātracalanādi nartakaḥ karoti tādṛśameva śikṣyamāṇānukaroti nartakī,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2310: evaṃ yādṛśīmānupūrvīṃ vaidikānāṃ varṇapadādīnāṃ karotyadhyāpayitā tādṛśīmevānukaroti māṇavakaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2317: vaiyāsikaṃ tu matamanuvartamānāḥ śrutismṛtītihāsādisiddhasṛṣṭipralayānusāreṇānādyavidyopadhānalabdhasarvaśaktijñānasyāpi paramātmano nityasya vedānāṃ yonerapi na teṣu svātantryam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2319: yathā hi yāgādibrahmahatyādayor'thānarthahetavo brahmavivartā api na sargāntare 'pi vipariyanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2325: evaṃ sargāntareṣvapīti tadanurodhāt sarvajño 'pi sarvaśaktirapi pūrvapūrvasargānusāreṇa vedānviracayanna svatantraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2329: na hi bahūnāmapyajñānāṃ vijñānāṃ vāśayadoṣavatāṃ pratibhāne yukta āśvāsaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2332: tatpratyayena cārvācīnānāmapi tatra saṃpratyaya ityupapannaṃ brahmaṇaḥ śāstrayonitvam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2340: tadanena sūtreṇa pratipādanīyamityutsūtraṃ pūrvapakṣamāracayati bhāṣyakāraḥ-kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2344: na khalu laukikāni vākyāni pramāṇāntaraviṣayamarthamavabodhayanti svataḥ pramāṇam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2349: yadi tvasaṃnidhānāttatparatvaṃ na rocayante, tataḥ saṃnihitopāsanādikriyāparatvaṃ vedāntānām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2350: evaṃ hi pratyakṣādyanadhigatagocaratvenānapekṣatayā prāmāṇyaṃ ca prayojanavattvaṃ ca sidhyatīti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2359: vedāntānāṃ cājñātaṃ brahma jñāpayatāṃ tathābhāvādityata āha-na ca pariniṣṭhita iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2370: yasmāt phalasaṃbandhaḥ kriyāyāḥ śeṣatvamantareṇa na saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2372: tacca nājñānata iti / siddhaṃ cetpuṃvyāpārānapekṣaṃ phalamārabheta sadārabhetetyasaṃbhavasteṣāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2377: 3-nanu adhikārādividhīnāṃ parasparamavinābhāve kathamavāntarabheda iti cettatrāha-tadvākyānāmiti / aidaṃparyaṃ-tātparyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2383: na tvatra viniyogādayo na santi,santo 'pyanyato labdhatvātkevalamavivakṣitāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2384: tasmāt bhāvanāviṣayo vidhirna siddhe vastuni bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2387: evaṃ ca satyuktarūpe brahmaṇi śabdasyātātparyāt pramāṇāntareṇa yādṛśa
GSP33brsvbh1u:2391: masya rūpaṃ vyavasthāpyate na tacchabdena virudhyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2411: 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni'iti tu vākyaṃ pūrvamudāhṛtaṃ jagadutpattisthitināśakāraṇamiti ceha smāritamiti na paṭhitam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2412: yena hi vākyamupakramyate yena copasaṃhriyate tadeva vākyārtha iti śābdāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2416: 1-'jāmi vā etadyajñasya kriyate yadanvañcau puroḍāśau upāṃśuyājamantarā yajati viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyo 'jāmitvāya'ityādimantreṇa,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2417_0: āgneyāgnīṣomīyayoḥ puroḍāśayoḥ nirantarayoḥ karaṇe jāmi-ālasyaṃ bhavediti madhye
GSP33brsvbh1u:2418: vidhipratyayasya cābhāvādagrepaṭitayāgatrayasyāyamanuvāda iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ / evaṃ sati ekavākyatvabhaṅgāpattyā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2421: apūrvayāgavidheravāyamiti bhedalakṣaṇe cintitam / 'viṣṇurupāṃśu-'ityādayastu anuvādā iti dik /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2424: evamatrāpi 'sadeva somyedam'iti brahmopakramāt 'tattvamasi'iti ca jīvasya brahmātmanopasaṃhārāt tatparataiva vākyasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2428_2: bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati'iti sarvātmakaṃ brahmopakramya 'brahmaivedamamṛtaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2431: na ca tatparatvasya dṛṣṭasya sati saṃbhave 'nyaparatā adṛṣṭā yuktā kalpayitum, atiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2432: na kevalaṃ kartṛparatā teṣāmadṛṣṭā, anupapannā cetyāha-
GSP33brsvbh1u:2439: tīre bhalāni santīti puṃvākyavaditi / tatra pūrvavādyabhimatasya hetoḥ pauruṣeyatvena sopādhikatvaṃ apinā dyotyata ityāha-ayamabhisaṃdhiriti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2442: tatraivaṃ bhavān pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭām, kiṃ puṃvākyānāṃ sāpekṣatā bhūtārthatvena, āho pauruṣeyatvena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2450: evaṃ tarhi tadapūrvakāṇāṃ vedāntānāṃ bhūtārthānāmapi nāprāmāṇyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2458: bhūtārthasya śabdānapekṣeṇa puruṣeṇa mānāntarataḥ śakyajñānatvādbuddhipūrvaṃ viracanopapatteḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2464: tasmāt pauruṣeyatvena sāpekṣatvaṃ durvāraṃ, na tu bhūtārthatvena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2467: FN: 6-vedāntavākyakadambasya kāryaparatve tu na vākyatvahetunā sāpekṣatvamanumeyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2474: 7-akārye mānāntarāyogyatvasyāsiddhatvāttatparatve 'pi vedāntānāṃ pauruṣeyatvaṃ saṃbhavatīti samā sādhanavyāptiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2475: tataśca vākyatvādiliṅgakānumānena pauruṣeyatvaṃ durapahnavamityāha-atra brūma iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2477: brūmaḥ-kiṃ punaridaṃ kāryamabhimatamāyuṣmataḥ yadaśakyaṃ puruṣeṇa jñātum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2478: apūrvamiti cet, hanta kutastyamasya liṅādyarthatvam, tenālaukikena saṃgatisaṃvedanavirahāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2479: lokānusārataḥ kriyāyā eva laukikyāḥ kāryatayā liṅāderavagamāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2485: na ca kriyā kṣaṇabhaṅgurāmuṣmikāya svargāya kalpata iti pāriśeṣyādvedata evāpūrve kārye liṅādīnāṃ saṃbandhagraha iti cet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2488: spaṣṭadṛṣṭena pauruṣeyatvena vā teṣāmapūrvārthatvapratiṣedhe vākyatvādinā liṅgena vedāntānāmapi pauruṣeyatvamanumitamityapūrvārthatā na syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2491: 9-smaryamāṇakartṛkatvena sopādhiko vākyatvaheturiti cet siddhārthakeṣvapi vedānteṣu tatsamamiti kāryārthatvamanapekṣatāprayojakaṃ na bhavatītyāha-anyatastviti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2497_1: pratyakṣatā / na cājñāte puṃsāṃ vākyaracanā saṃbhavatīti apauruṣeyo veda ityādi tatroktamavagantavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2500: tenāpauruṣeyatve siddhe bhūtārthānāmapi vedāntānāṃ na sāpekṣatayā prāmāṇyavighātaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2505: gantṛtā nāsti yena prāmāṇyaṃ na syāt, jīvasya brahmatāyā anyato 'nadhigamāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2509_1: puruṣārthapratilambhonāyaṃ sarpo rajjuriyamitijñānādiveti so 'yamasya vidhyarthajñānāt prakarṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2520: tatrāprāptaprāptau cātyaktatyāge ca bāhyopāyānuṣṭhānasādhyatvāt tadupāyatattvajñānādasti parācīnānuṣṭhānāpekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2522: na hi sahasramapi rajjupratyayā vastusantaṃ phaṇinamanyathayitumīśate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2523: samāropite tu prepsitajihāsite tattvasākṣātkāramātreṇa bāhyānuṣṭhānānapekṣeṇa śakyete prāptumiva hātumiva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2524: samāropamātrajīvite hi te,samāropitaṃ ca tattvasakṣātkāraḥ samūlaghātamupahantīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2535: santu tarhi vedāntā devatāpratipādanadvāreṇopāsanāvidhiparā evetyata āha-na tu tathā brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2536: upāsyopāsakopāsanādibhedasiddhyadhīnopāsanā na nirastasamastabhedaprapañce vedāntavedye brahmaṇi saṃbhavatīti nopāsanāvidhiśeṣatvaṃ vedāntānāṃ tadvirodhitvāt ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2540: na hi hānopādānabuddhī eva prāmaṇasya phale,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2546: svādhyāyavidhyadhīnagrahaṇatayā hi sarvo vedarāśiḥ puruṣārthatantra ityavagatam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2549: na ca vedāntebhya iva tadarthāvagamamātrādeva kaścitpuruṣārtha upalabhyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2551: 'barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyam'ityayamapi niṣedhavidhiḥ svaniṣedhyasya nindāmapekṣate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2553: tadyadi dūrato 'pi na nindāmavāpsyattato niṣedhavidhireva rajataniṣedhe ca nindāyāṃ ca darvihomavat sāmarthyadvayamakalpayiṣyat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2554: tadevamuttaptayoḥ 'so 'rodīt'iti 'barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyam'iti ca padasaṃdarbhayorlakṣyamāṇanindādvāreṇa naṣṭāśvadagdharathavat parasparaṃ samanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2556: nanu vidhyasaṃsparśino vedasyānyasya na prāmāṇyaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kathaṃ vedāntānāṃ tadaspṛśāṃ tadbhaviṣyatītyata āha-na cānumānagamyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2557: abādhitānadhigatāsaṃdigdhabodhajanakatvaṃ hi pramāṇatvaṃ pramāṇānāmtacca svata ityupapāditam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2559: tathāpi tadbodhopajanane mānāntaraṃ nāpekṣate nāpīmāmevārthāpattim, parasparā
GSP33brsvbh1u:2566: vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇyastīti dṛṣṭāntānapekṣaṃ teṣāṃ brahmaṇi prāmāṇyaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2567: anyathā nendriyāntarāṇāṃ rūpaprakāśanaṃ dṛṣṭamiti cakṣurapi na rūpaṃ prakāśayediti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2573: yatra hi śabdā lokena na prayujyante tatra na teṣāṃ saṃgatigrahaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2574: na cāheyamanupādeyaṃ rūpamātraṃ kaścidvivakṣati prekṣāvān, tasyābubhutsitatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2576: tasmāt pratipitsitaṃ pratipipādayiṣannayaṃ lokaḥ pravṛttinivṛttihetubhūtamevārthaṃ pratipādayet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2589: manumāya tasya ca śabdabhāvābhāvānuvidhānamavagamya śabdasya tadviṣayavācakatvaṃ niścetavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2591: kāryapratyaye tu narāntaravartini pravṛttinivṛttī sto hetū ityajñātasaṃgatitvānna brahmarūpaparā vedāntāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2600: FN: 2-nakāro 'yaṃ sāṃsārikāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ na nivṛttiriti yojanīyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2602: na ca rajjuriyaṃ na bhujaṅgaḥiti yathākathañcillakṣaṇayā vākyārthatattvaniścaye yathā bhayakampādinivṛttiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2605: api ca yadi śrutabrahmaṇo bhavati sāṃsārikadharmanivṛttiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2609: tacca kāryaṃ svātmani niyojyaṃ niyuñjānaṃ niyoga iti ca mānāntarāpūrvatayāpūrvamiti cākhyāyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2610: na ca viṣayānuṣṭhānaṃ vinā tatsiddhiriti svasiddhyarthaṃ tadeva kāryaṃ svaviṣayasya karaṇasyātmajñānasyānuṣṭhānamākṣipati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2611: yathā ca kāryaṃ svaviṣayādhīnanirūpaṇamiti jñānena viṣeyeṇa nirūpyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2612: evaṃ jñānamapi svaviṣayamātmānamantareṇāśakyanirūpaṇamiti tannirūpaṇāya tādṛśamātmānamākṣipati, tadeva kāryam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2615: 3-nanu kāryaṃ svaviṣayajñānanirūpaṇāya jñāyamānamātmānamākṣipati cedātmanaḥ śrautatvaṃ na syādityāśaṅkya vidhyākṣiptasya śrautatve gurusaṃmatimāha-yathāhuriti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2617: yathāhuḥ-'yattu tatsiddhyarthamupādīyate ākṣipyate tadapi vidheyamiti tantre vyavahāraḥ'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2622_0: 4-nanu 'vācaṃ dhenumupāsīta'itivadāropyasya vidheyadhīviṣayatvaṃ kiṃ na syādata āha-āropiteti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2622_1: tadbhāva aikyabhāvaḥ / tathāsati āropitaikyabhāvena jñānaṃ nirūpitaṃ na syāt / satyāṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2624: āropitatadbhāvasya tvanyasya nirūpakatve tena tannirūpitaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2631: 'yūpamaṣṭāśrīkaroti'ityādibhirvākyaistakṣaṇādividhiparairapi saṃskārāviṣṭaṃ viśiṣṭalakṣaṇasaṃsthānaṃ dāru yūpa iti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2635_0: 1-'yadāhavanīye juhoti'iti śrūyate / tatra ka āhavanīya ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ 'vasante brāhmaṇo
GSP33brsvbh1u:2639: kārya eva ca saṃbandho na svarūpe,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2640: iti hetudvayaṃ bhāṣyavākyenopapāditam-pravṛttinivṛttiprayojanatvāt ityādinātatsāmānyādvedāntānāmapi tathaivārthavattvaṃ syāt ityantena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2641: na ca svatantraṃ kāryaṃ niyojyamadhikāriṇamanuṣṭhātāramantareṇeti niyojyabhedamāha-sati ca vidhiparatva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2642: 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati'iti siddhavadarthavādādavagatasyāpi brahmabhavanasya niyojyaviśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ brahma bubhūṣorniyojyaviśeṣasya rātri
GSP33brsvbh1u:2645: 1-'pratitiṣṭhanti ha vā ya etā rātrīrupayanti'iti rātriśabdena somaviśeṣā vidhīyante / tatra kiṃ etadvākyābhihitapratiṣṭhā phalamuta svarga iti saṃśaye evaṅkāma ityaśravaṇāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2648_0: svarga eva phalamiti prāpte pratiṣṭhāphalasya sākṣānnirdeśena ānumānikasvargakalpanāyā
GSP33brsvbh1u:2648_1: anyāyyatvātpratiṣṭhaiva phalamiti rāddhāntaḥ / tathāca tadabhisaṃdhimāṃstatra niyojya iti jñeyam /
