GSP33brsvbh1u:2654_1: kratvartho vā puruṣārtha iti saṃśaye phalakalpanāparihārāya amāvāsyāśabdasya karmārthakatvena
GSP33brsvbh1u:2655_1: piṇḍapitṛyajña iti / tadvadatra kalpane tu svargor'thaḥ brahmabhavanaśabdenāsamavetaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2657: yajñanyāyena tu svargakāmasya niyojyasya kalpanāyāmarthavādasyāsamavetārthatayātyantaparokṣā vṛttiḥ syāditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2663: atra cātmadarśanaṃ na vidheyam taddhi dṛśerupalabdhivacanatvāt śrāvaṇaṃ vā syāt pratyakṣaṃ vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2666: tatra śrāvaṇaṃ na vidheyam, svādhyāyavidhinaivāsya prāpitatvāt, karmaśrāvaṇavat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2668: na caupaniṣadātmaviṣayaṃ bhāvanādheyavaiśiṣṭyaṃ vidheyaṃ, tasyopāsanāvidhānādeva vājina
GSP33brsvbh1u:2671: 1-yathā bhikṣārthavihitadadhyānayanādvājinamānuṣaṅgikatayā jāyate evamamūtatvāya vihitādupāsanātsākṣātkāro jāyata iti tadutpādanaṃ na vidheyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2677: arthavattyā mananādipratītyā cetyasya śeṣaḥ prapañco nigadavyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2683: tacca sarvaṃ kāryaṃ ca vināśi ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2686: etaduktaṃ bhavati-tvayāpyupāsanāvidhiparatvaṃ vedāntānāmabhyupagacchatā nityaśuddhabuddhatvādirūpabrahmātmatā jīvasya svābhāvikī vedāntagamyāsthīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2690: upāsanāsaṃskāravadupāsanāpūrvamapi cetaḥsahakārīti cetdṛṣṭaṃ ca khalu naiyogikaṃ phalamaihikamapi, yathā
GSP33brsvbh1u:2692: FN: 1-'citrayā yajeta paśukāmaḥ'iti vihitacitrāniyogaphalaṃ iha janmāntare vā bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2700: gāndharvaśāstrārthepāsanāvāsanāyā ivāpūrvānapekṣāyāḥ ṣaṭjādisākṣātkāre vedāntārthopāsanāvāsanāyā jīvabrahmabhāvasākṣātkāre 'napekṣāyā eva sāmarthyāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2703: na ca tatkāmaḥ kriyāmeva kāryamavagamiṣyati nāpūrvamiti sāṃpratam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2707: na ca brahmabhūyādanyadamṛtatvamārthavādikaṃ kiñcidasti, yena tatkāma upāsanāyāmadhikriyeta,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2710_1: sarvābhilaṣitasvargakāmanāvānadhikārī kalpitaḥ / evamiha kalpane 'nityaphalakatvaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2712: viśvajinnyāyena tu svargakalpanāyāṃ tasya sātiśayatvaṃ kṣayitvaṃ ceti na nityaphalatvamupāsanāyāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2715: upāsanāyāḥ saṃskārahetubhāvasya saṃskārasya ca sākṣātkāropajanane manaḥsācivyasya ca mānāntarasiddhatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2718: yathopāṃśuyājavākye 'viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ'ityādayo vidhisarūpā na vidhayaḥ-iti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2724: pare hi dvayīṃ nityatāmāhuḥ-kūṭasthanityatā pariṇāminityatāṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2733: ekadeśapariṇāme vā sa ekadeśastato bhinno vā abhinno vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2736: abhede vā kathaṃ na sarvātmanā pariṇāmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2741: na ca bhedābhedayorvirodhānnaikatra samavāya iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2743: FN: 2-yatpramāṇaviparyayeṇa virodhena vartate tadviruddhamiti kva saṃpratyaya iti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2746: yattu yathā pramāṇenāvagamyate tasya tathābhāva eva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2747: kuṇḍalamidaṃ suvarṇamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyapratyaye ca vyaktaṃ bhedābhedau cakāstaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2750: ādhārādheyabhāve ekāśrayatve vā na sāmānādhikaraṇyam,na hi bhavati kuṇḍaṃ badaramiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2752: so 'yamabādhito 'saṃdigdhaḥ sarvajanīnaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyapratyaya eva kāryakāraṇayorbhedābhedau vyavasthāpayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2760: atrocyate-kaḥ punarayaṃ bhedo nāma, yaḥ sahābhedenaikatra bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2761: parasparābhāva iti cet, kimayaṃ kāryakāraṇayoḥ kaṭakahāṭakayorasti na vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2762: na cet, ekatvamevāsti, na ca bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2766: api ca kaṭakasya hāṭakādabhede yathā hāṭakātmanā kaṭakamukuṭakuṇḍalādayo na bhidyante evaṃ kaṭakātmanāpi na bhidyeran,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2768: tathā ca hāṭakameva vastusanna kaṭakādayaḥ, bhedasyāpratibhāsanāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2769: atha hāṭakatvenaivābhedo na kaṭakatvena,tena tu bheda eva kuṇḍalādeḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2770: yadi hāṭakādabhinnaḥ kaṭakaḥ kathamayaṃ kuṇḍalādiṣu nānuvartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2772: ye hi yasminnanuvartamāne vyāvartante te tato bhinnā eva, yathā sūtrātkusumabhedāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2773: nānuvartante cānuvartamāne 'pi hāṭakatve kuṇḍalādayaḥ,tasmātte 'pi hāṭakādbhinnā eveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2774: sattānuvṛttyā ca sarvavastvanugame 'idamiha nedam, idamevaṃ nedam'iti vibhāgo na syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2776: api ca dūrātkanakamityavagate na tasya kuṇḍalādayo viśeṣā jijñāsyeran,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2781: pratyuta jñānameva teṣāṃ yuktam,kāraṇābhāve hi kāryabhāva autsargikaḥ,sa ca kāraṇasattayā apodyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2782: asti cābhede kāraṇasatteti kanake jñāte jñātā eva kuṇḍalādaya iti tajjijñāsājñānāni cānarthakāni syuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2783: tena yasmin gṛhyamāṇe yanna gṛhyate tattato bhidyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2785: gṛhyamāṇe ca dūrato hemni na gṛhyante tasya bhedāḥ kuṇḍalādayaḥ,tasmātte hemno bhidyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2786: kathaṃ tarhi hema kuṇḍalamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti cet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2788: athānuvṛttivyāvṛttivyavasthā ca hemni jñāte kuṇḍalādijijñāsā ca katham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2800: tasmāt kūṭasthanityataiva pāramārthikī na pariṇāminityateti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2801: vyomavat iti ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ parasiddhaḥ, asmanmate tasyāpi kāryatvenānityatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2806: vrīhīṇāṃ khalu prokṣaṇena saṃskārākhyoṃ'śo yathā janyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2812: sukhaṃ cāpratīyamānaṃ na puruṣārthaṃ ityata āha-svayañjyotiriti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2813: tadevaṃ svamatena mokṣākhyaṃ phalaṃ nityaṃ śrutyādibhirupapādya kriyāniṣpādyasya tu mokṣasyānityatvaṃ prasañjayati-tadyadīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2815: api ca jñānajanyāpūrvajanito mokṣo naiyogika ityasyārthasya santi bhūyasyaḥ śrutayo nivārikā ityāha-api ca brahma vedeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2816: avidyādvayapratibandhāpanayamātreṇa ca vidyāyā mokṣasādhanatvam na svato 'pūrvotpādena cetyatrāpi śrutīrudāharati-tvaṃ hi naḥ piteti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2829: mithyājñānaṃ cāvidyā rāgādyupajananakrameṇa dṛṣṭenaiva saṃsārasya paramaṃ nidānam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2838: yena mithyājñānaṃ bhedāvabhāsaṃ nivartayanna vidhiviṣayo bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2844: tathā ca vidheḥ prāgaprāptaṃ puruṣecchayā kartavyaṃ sat vidhigocaro bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2845: yathā vṛttyantaratvena manaso viśvedevasāmyādviśvāndevānmanasi saṃpādya mana ālambanamavidyamānasamaṃ kṛtvā prādhānyena saṃpādyānāṃ viśveṣāmeva devānāmanucintanam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2847: evaṃ cidrūpasāmyājjīvasya brahmarūpatāṃ saṃpādya jīvamālambanamavidyamānasamaṃ kṛtvā prādhānyena brahmānucintanam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2859: prāyaṇakāle hi sa eva sarvāṇīndriyāṇi saṃgṛhyotkrāmatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2860: seyaṃ saṃvargadṛṣṭirvāyau prāṇe ca daśāśāgataṃ jagaddarśayati yathā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2861: evaṃ jīvātmani bṛṃhaṇakriyayā brahmadṛṣṭismṛtatvāya phalāya kalpata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2864: FN: 2-stutaśastravaditi / 'ājyaiḥ stuvate praugaṃ śaṃsati iti stutaśastre samāmnāte,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2865_2: guṇakarmaṇi vā apūrvārthatvena pradhānakarmaṇi veti saṃdehe kratūpayogidevatāsmaraṇasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:2866: stautiśaṃsatī apūrvotpattiṃ prati stotraśastre vidadhyātāmiti / evamihātmopāsanadarśane pradhānakarmetyaśayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2869: ātmā tu dravyaṃ karmaṇi guṇa iti saṃskāro vātmano darśanaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2872: evaṃ kartṛtvena kratvaṅgabhūte ātmani 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ'iti darśanaṃ guṇakarma vidhīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2878: 'yaistu dravyaṃ cikīrṣyate guṇastatra pratīyeta'iti nyāyādata āha-na cedaṃ brahmātmaikatvavijñānamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2881: FN: 1-ātmopāstyādeḥ saṃskārakarmatvaṃ prakaraṇādvā vākyādvā bhavet / nādya ityāha-darśeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2883: darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇe hi samāmnātamājyāvekṣaṇaṃ tadaṅgabhūtājyasaṃskāra iti yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2887: naca 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ'ityādi kasyacitprakaraṇe samāmnātam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2889: 'yasya pūrṇamayī juhūrbhavati'ityavyabhicaritakratusaṃbandhajuhūdvāreṇa juhūpadaṃ kratuṃ smārayadvākyena yathā parṇatāyāḥ kratuśeṣabhāvamāpādayati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2891: yena taddarśanaṃ kratvaṅgaṃ sadātmānaṃ kratvarthaṃ saṃskuryāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2895_1: tatra kiṃ śobhanahiraṇyadhāraṇaṃ kratvaṅgamuta puruṣadharma iti saṃdehe durvarṇakāma
GSP33brsvbh1u:2898: hiraṇyasādhanakaṃ dhāraṇaṃ vākyaśeṣagataphalāya vidhīyata iti puruṣadharmaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2901: 'suvarṇaṃ bhāryam'itivat viniyogabhaṅgena pradhānakarmaivāpūrvaviṣayatvānna guṇakarmeti sthavīyastayaitaddūṣaṇamanabhidhāya sarvapakṣasādhāraṇaṃ dūṣaṇamuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2903: kiṃ ca jñānakriyāviṣayatvavidhānamasya bahuśrutiviruddhamityāha-na ca vidikriyeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2909: sarvameva hi vākyaṃ nedantayā vastubhedaṃ bodhayitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2912: tena pramāṇāntarasiddhe laukike evārthe yadā gatiridṛśī śabdasya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2919: tvaṃpadārtho hi pramātā pramāṇādhīnayā pramityā prameyaṃ ghaṭādi vyāpnotītyavidyāvilasitam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2920: tadasyā viṣayībhūtodāsīnatatpadārthapratyagātmasāmānādhikaraṇyena pramātṛtvābhāvāt tannivṛttau pramāṇādayastisro vidhā nivartante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2921: na hi pakturavastutve pākyapākapacanāni vastusanti bhavitumarhantīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2922: tathā hi-'vigalitaparāgvṛttyarthatvaṃ tvaṃpadasya tadastadā tvamiti hi padenaikārthatve tvamityapi yatpadam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2923: tadapi ca tadā gatvaikārthyaṃ viśuddhacidātmatāṃ tyajati sakalānkartṛtvādīnpadārthamalānnijān //
GSP33brsvbh1u:2931: tathā ca viśuddhavijñānotpādo mokṣa iti nirvartyo mokṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2932: anyeṣāṃ tu saṃskārarūpāvasthāmapahāya yā kaivalyāvasthāvāptirātmanaḥ sa mokṣa iti vikāryo mokṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2935: 'atha yadataḥ paro divo jyotirdīpyate'iti śruterbrahmaṇo vikṛtāvikṛtadeśabhedāvagamādavikṛtadeśabrahmaprāptirūpāsanādividhikāryā bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2936: tathā ca prāpyakarmatā brahmaṇa ityata āha-na cāpyatvenāpīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2939: madhye tu praśāntasakalakallolopasargaḥ svacchaḥ sthiratayāvikṛtastasya madhyamavikṛtaṃ pautikaḥ potena prāpnoti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2942: atha jīvo brahmaṇo bhinnastathāpi na tena brahmāpyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2948: tena hi tatkusumaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ lākṣārasasavarṇaṃ phalaṃ prasūte /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2951: guṇo hi brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvo vā bhinno vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2958: aśuddhiḥ satī darpaṇe nivartate,na tu brahmaṇi asatī nivartanīyā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2961: brahmasvabhāva eva mokṣo 'nādyavidyāmalāvṛta upāsanādikriyayātmani saṃskriyamāṇe 'bhivyajyate, na tu kriyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2966: nāvidyā brahmāśrayā, kiṃ tu jīve,sā tvanirvacanīyetyuktam,tena nityaśuddhameva brahma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2968: kriyā hi brahmasamavetā vā brahma saṃskuryāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2971: na tāvadbrahmadharmaḥ kriyā, tasyāḥ svāśrayavikārahetutvena brahmaṇo nityatvavyāghātāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2974: 1-yadyapi caitrasamavetā bhāvanā darpaṇasyopakaroti tathāpi saṃyogavibhāgākhyadhātvarthadvārā / tau ca nātmanītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2977: na hi darpaṇe nighṛṣyamāṇe maṇirviśuddho dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2981: FN: 2-avyavahitatvāt / anityatvamātmanaḥ prasajyetetyuktamanityatvaṃ tu vyavahitamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2987: anādyanirvācyāvidyopadhānameva brahmaṇo jīva iti ca kṣetrajña iti cācakṣate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2992: tenātrāpi yadāśritā kriyā sāṃvyavahārikapramāṇaviṣayīkṛtā tasyaiva saṃskāro nānyasyeti na vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2993: tattvatastu na kriyā na saṃskāra iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2994: sanidarśanaṃ tu śeṣamadhyāsabhāṣye eva kṛtavyākhyānamiti neha vyākhyātam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3008: pañcamī tu kācit vidhā bhaviṣyati, yayā mokṣasya karmatā ghaṭiṣyata ityata āha-ato 'nyaditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3009: ebhyaḥ prakārebhyo na prakārāntaramanyadasti, yato mokṣasya kriyānupraveśo bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3010: etaduktaṃ bhavati-catasṛṇāṃ vidhānāṃ madhye 'nyatamatayā kriyāphalatvaṃ vyāptam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3011: sā ca mokṣādvyāvartamānā vyāpakānupalabdhyā mokṣasya kriyāphalatvaṃ vyāvartayatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3013: tathā ca tadarthāni śāstrāṇi tadarthāśca pravṛttayo 'narthakānītyata upasaṃhāravyājenāha-tasmājjñānamekamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3014: atha jñānaṃ kriyā mānasī kasmānna vidhigocaraḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3015: kasmācca tasyāḥ phalaṃ nirvartyādiṣvanyatamaṃ na mokṣa iti codayati-nanu jñānamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3022: tadetasminvailakṣaṇye sthite eva vailakṣaṇyāntaramāha-kriyā hi nāma seti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3025: yathā vā yoṣiti agnivastvanapekṣāgnibuddhiḥ-yā sā kriyā hi nāmeti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3026: na hi 'yasyai devatāyai havirgṛhītaṃ syāttāṃ dhyāyedvaṣaṭkariṣyan'ityasmādvidheḥ prāgdevatādhyānaṃ prāptam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3030: na hyasau svasāmagrībalalabdhajanmā san manujecchayānyathākartumakartuṃ vā śakyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3034: tayoranvayavyatirekāvadhṛtasāmarthyayoḥ sākṣātkāre vā anādyavidyāpanaye vā vidhimantareṇa prāptatvena puruṣecchayānyathākartumakartuṃ vā aśakyatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3048: satyaṃ śrūyante liṅgādayaḥ,na tvamī vidhiviṣayāḥ, tadviṣayatve 'prāmāṇyaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3050: sa eva ca heya upādeyo vā, yaṃ puruṣaḥ kartumakartumanyathā vā kartuṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3051: tatraiva ca samarthaḥ kartādhikṛto niyojyo bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3055: 2-śravaṇaṃ nāma brahmātmani 'tattvamasi'ityādivākyakadambasya tātparyanirṇayānukūlo vyāpāraḥ tarkarūpaḥ / tatrāsati viṣayāvagame kathaṃ tatkartavyatābodhaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3056: avagame ca kartumakartumanyathākartumaśakyatvam / evaṃ mananāderapi boddhavyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3058_1: iti prayuktā api liṅādayaḥ pravartanāyāmasamarthā upala iva kṣurataikṣṇyaṃ kuṇṭhamapramāṇībhavantīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3061: asāmarthye tu na kartṛtāyato nādhikṛto 'to na niyojya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3066: anyataḥ prāptā eva hi śravaṇādayo vidhisarūpairvākyairanūdyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3069_1: udghāṭyata iti pravṛttiviśeṣakaratā anuvādānāmastīti saprayojanatayā svādhyāyavidhyadhīnagrahaṇatvamupapadyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3071: svato 'sya puruṣārthatve siddhe yadanuṣṭhānānaṅgatvaṃ tadbhūṣaṇaṃ na dūṣaṇamityāha-yadapīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3086: atha tu bhūte 'pyarthe padānāṃ loke śakyaḥ saṃgatigrahastata upaniṣadāntatparatvaṃ paurvāparyaparyālocanayāvagamyamānamapahṛtya na kāryaparatvaṃ śakyaṃ kalpayitum,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3089: yadi tatparaḥ prayogo na loke dṛśyeta,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3091: na tāvattatparaḥ prayogo na dṛśyate loke /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3096: nāpi bhūtārthabuddhirvyutpannapuruṣavartinī na śakyā samunnetum, harṣāderunnayanahotoḥ saṃbhavāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3099: na cāyamapratipādayan harṣahetumarthaṃ harṣāya kalpata ityanena harṣaheturartha ukta iti pratipadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3100: harṣahetvantarasya cāpratīteḥ putrajanmanaśca taddhetoravagamāttadeva vārttāhāreṇābhyadhāyīti niścinoti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3103: evaṃ ca brahmasvarūpajñānasya paramapuruṣārthahetubhāvādanupadiśatāmapi puruṣapravṛttinivṛttī vedāntānāṃ puruṣahitānuśāsanācchāstratvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3105: yadyadviṣayapramājanakaṃ tattadviṣayaṃ, yathā rūpādiviṣayaṃ cakṣurādi,tathā caitāni,tasmāttatheti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3108: upanīya advayaṃ brahma savāsanāmavidyāṃ hinastīti brahmavidyāmāha /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3113: anyaśeṣaṃ hi bhūtaṃ dravyaṃ cikīrṣitaṃ sadutpattyādyāpyaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3120: upaniṣadāmanārabhyādhītānāṃ paurvāparyaparyālocanayā puruṣapratipādanaparatvena puruṣasyaiva prādhānyenedaṃ prakaraṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3122: ataḥ svaprakaraṇasthaḥ so 'yaṃ tathāvidha upaniṣadbhyaḥ pratīyamāno na nāstīti śakyo vaktumityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3124: mānāntarogocaratvenāgṛhītasaṃgatitayā apadārthasya brahmaṇo vākyārthatvānupapatteḥ kathamupaniṣadarthatetyata āha-sa eṣa neti netyātmetyātmaśabdāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3126: tathāpi prakāśātmana eva satastattadupādhiparihāṇyā śakyaṃ vākyārthatvena nirūpaṇam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3128: nahi prakāśaḥ svasaṃvedano na bhāsate,nāpi tadavacchedakaḥ kāryakaraṇasaṃghātaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3129: tena 'sa eṣa neti netyātmā'iti tattadavacchedaparihāṇyā bṛhattvādāpanācca svayaṃprakāśaḥ śakyo vākyāt brahmeti cātmeti ca nirūpayitumityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3130: athopādhinirāsavadupahitamapyātmarūpaṃ kasmānna nirasyata ityata āha-ātmanaśca pratyākhyātumaśakyatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3133: na hi jātu rajjvabhāve rajjvāṃ bhujaṅga iti vā dhāreti vā vibhramo dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3134: api cātmānaḥ prakāśasya bhāsā prapañcasya prabhā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3135: tathā ca śrutiḥ 'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3136: na cātmanaḥ prakāśasya pratyākhyāne prapañcaprathā yuktā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3139: sarvajanīnāhaṃpratyayaviṣayo hyātmā kartā bhoktā ca saṃsārī,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3141: ya eva laukikāḥ śabdāsta eva vaidikāsta eva ca teṣāmarthā ityaupaniṣadamapyātmapadaṃ tatraiva pravartitumarhati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3145: ahaṃpratyayaviṣayo yaḥ kartā kāryakaraṇasaṃghātopahito jīvātmā-tat sākṣitvena,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3149: śuddhaṃ tu rūpaṃ tasya sākṣitacca mānāntarānadhigatamupaniṣadgocara iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3154: tathā ca śrutiḥ 'na vā are sarvasya kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavati ātmanastu kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavati'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3155: api cātaḥ sarveṣāmātmatvādeva na heyo nāpyupādeyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3159: tasmāddheyopādeyaviṣayau vidhiniṣedhau na tadviparītamātmatattvaṃ viṣayīkuruta iti sarvasya prapañcajātasyātmaiva tattvamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3163: yaśca paramārthāsan asau prakṛtiḥ rajjutattvamiva sarpavibhramasya vikārasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3166: na hi sahasramapi śilpino ghaṭaṃ paṭayitumīśata ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3168: puruṣa eva hi sarvasya prapañcavikārajātasya tattvam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3169: na ca puruṣasyāsti vināśo yato 'nanto vināśaḥ syādityata āha-puruṣo hi vināśahetvabhāvāditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3171: atha mā bhūtsvarūpeṇa puruṣo heya upādeyo vā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3175: api cātmanaḥ paramārthasato dharmo 'pi paramārthasanniti na tasyātmavadanyathātvaṃ kāraṇaiḥ śakyaṃ kartum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3183: na hi somaśarmaṇi prakṛte tadguṇābhidhānaṃ parisaṃcaṣṭe viṣṇuśarmaṇo guṇavattām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3188: nahi te kriyārthā ityata āha-api cāmnāyasyeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3189: yadyucyeta nahi kriyārthatvaṃ kriyābhidheyatvam, api tu kriyāprayojanatvam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3190: dravyaguṇaśabdānāṃ ca kriyārthatvenaiva bhūtadravyaguṇābhidhānam, na svaniṣṭhatayā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3194: 1-'codanā hi bhūtaṃ bhavantaṃ bhaviṣyantamityevañjātīyakaṃ śaknotyavagamayitum'iti śābarabhāṣye vidhivākyasya bhūtārthabodhakatvaṃ pratīyate tatkathaṃ dravyādeḥ kriyābodhitā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3197: etaduktaṃ bhavati, kāryamarthamavagamayantī codanā tadarthaṃ bhūtādikamapyarthaṃ gamayatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3199: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-na tāvatkāryārthā eva svārthe padānāṃ saṃgatigraho nānyārtha ityupapāditaṃ bhūte 'pyarthe vyutpattiṃ darśayadbhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3206: na hi pratyekaṃ svapradhānatayā guṇapradhānabhāvarahitānāmekavākyatā dṛṣṭā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3210_1: na ghaṭate 'tastatsiddhyai ekavākyatvāya ca lakṣaṇayānvitaparatvaṃ kalpyate tādṛkprayojanābhāve
GSP33brsvbh1u:3219: tathā cārthāntarasaṃsargaparatāmātreṇa vākyārthapratyayopapattau na kāryasaṃsargaparatvaniyamaḥ padānām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3223: bhavyasaṃsargiṇā rūpeṇa tasyāpi bhavyatvādityata āha-na hi bhūtamupadiśyamānamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3226: 4-bhavyasaṃsargiṇā rūpeṇa bhūtamapi bhavyamityatra kiṃ bhavyaṃ kāryamuta kriyā / ubhābhyāmapi bhūtārthasya naikyamityāha-na tādātmyeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3228: na tādātmyalakṣaṇaḥ saṃsargaḥkiṃ tu kāryeṇa saha prayojanaprayojanilakṣaṇo 'nvayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3229: tadviṣayeṇa tu bhāvārthena bhūtārthānāṃ kriyākārakalakṣaṇa iti na bhūtārthānāṃ kriyārthatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3233: na hi kriyārthaṃ bhūtamupadiśyamānamabhūtaṃ bhavati, api tu kriyānivartanayogyaṃ bhūtameva tat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3238: bhūtaviṣayā dṛśyamānā mṛtvā śīrtvā vā na kathañcitkriyāniṣṭhatāṃ gamayitumucitāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3241: 6-kāryānvayo hi na śabdārthaḥ kintu upādhiḥ / tathāhi-kartavyatātadabhāvāvagamādhīne hi pravṛttinivṛttī,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3244_1: ato virahayyāpi kāryānvayaṃ prayogabhede bhavati bhūtaṃ vastu padavācyam / tadidamuktam-nahyupahitamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3247: tathā ca vartamānāpadeśā astikriyopahitā akāryārthā apyaṭavīvarṇakādayo loke bahulamupalabhyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3248: evaṃ kriyāniṣṭhā api saṃbandhamātraparyavasāyinaḥ,yathākasyaiva puruṣaḥiti praśne uttaraṃrājñaḥiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3250: na hi pṛcchatā puruṣasya vā tarūṇāṃ vāstitvanāstitve pratipitsite,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3251: kiṃ tu puruṣasya svāmibhedastarūṇāṃ ca prakārabhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3252: praṣṭurapekṣitaṃ cācakṣāṇaḥ svāmibhedameva prakārabhedameva ca prativyakti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3255: upapāditā ca bhūte 'pyarthe vyutpattiḥ prayojanavati padānām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3256: codayati-yadi nāmopadiṣṭaṃ bhūtaṅkiṃ tava-upadeṣṭuḥ śroturvā prayojanaṃsyāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3258: aprayojanaṃ ca brahma, tasyodāsīnasya sarvakriyārahitatvenānupakārakatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3263: api ca ye 'pi kāryaparatvaṃ sarveṣāṃ padānāmāsthiṣata,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3265: 'na surā pātavyā'ityādīnāṃ na kāryaparatā śakyā āsthātum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3266: kṛtyupahitamaryādaṃ hi kāryaṃ kṛtyā vyāptaṃ tannivṛttau nivartate, śiṃśapātvamiva vṛkṣatvanivṛttau /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3268: viṣayaścāsya sādhyasvabhāvatayā bhāvārtha eva pūrvāparībhūto 'nyotpādānukūlātmā bhavitumarhati, na dravyaguṇau /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3274_1: yajatyādayastebhyaḥ kriyā-apūrvaṃ pratīyeta na dravyaguṇaśabdebhya iti tadarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3275: bhāva ityādibhyo nāpūrvaṃ pratīyata iti karmaśabdā ityuktam / karmaśabdebhyo 'pi yāgahomaśabdebhyo nāpūrvādhigatiriti prathamadalopanyāsa ityavagantavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3296: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimaindravāyavādivākye vihitānāṃ somarasānāṃ yāgānāṃ ca yathākramaṃ soma-yāgaśabdāvanuvaditārāvuta dravyayuktasya karmaṇo vidhātārāviti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3297: tatraindravāyavādivākyeṣu dravyadevatākhyayāgarūpapratīteryāgānumānāditaratra rūpāpratīteḥ samudāyānuvāda iti prāpte rāddhāntitaṃ dvitīye-nānuvādatvamapratyabhijñānāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3300_0: evaṃ hi yathā somenetivākye viśiṣṭavidhirevaṃ dadhisāṃtatyavākyāni yadi dravyaguṇaviśiṣṭahomāghāravidhāyīni
GSP33brsvbh1u:3300_1: tarhi agnihotrādhāravākye tadvihitahomānāmāghārāṇāṃ ca samudāyāvanuvadetāṃ tathāsati
GSP33brsvbh1u:3303: tatsaṃnidhau śrutasya sāṃtatyasya dadhyādivākyasya viśiṣṭavidhitve gauravaprasaṅgena,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3305: naitāvatā dadhyādivākye bhāvārthaviṣayaṃ kāryaṃ virudhyata ityabhyupagamaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3314: tatra dravyaguṇayoḥ kāryaṃ prati sākṣādaviṣayatve.pi bhāvārthaṃ pratyanubandhatayā vidhīyetetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3320: bhāvārtho hi kārakavyāpāramātratayāviśiṣṭaḥ kārakaviśeṣeṇa dravyādinā viśeṣyata iti dravyādistadanubandhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3321: tathā ca bhāvārthe vidhīyamāne sa eva sānubandho vidhīyata iti dravyaguṇāvaviṣayāvapi tadanubandhatayā vihitau bhavataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3323: NOTE 3-tarhi saṃtatādivākyāni viśiṣṭavidhayaḥ syuḥ / agnihotrādivākyaṃ ca tadanuvādaḥ syāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3324_0: tatrāha-eva ceti / ayamāśayaḥ-yadyapyatra viśiṣṭo vidhiḥ pratīyate tathāpi bhāvārthadvārā
GSP33brsvbh1u:3324_1: dravyādikamapi viṣayīkaroti / tatra saṃkrānto yadi bhāvārthamanyato vihitaṃ na labheta
GSP33brsvbh1u:3324_2: tarhi gauravamapyuparīkṛtya viśiṣṭaṃ vidadhītātha labheta tata upapadākṛṣṭaśaktirdravyādiparo
GSP33brsvbh1u:3324_3: bhavati / bhāvārthaṃ tvanuvadati / tadihāgnihotrādivākyata eva bhāvārthalābhāddravyaparatetyunneyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3326_1: cānyataḥ prāptatayā tadanuvādena tadanubandhībhūtadravyādiparo bhavatīti sarvatra
GSP33brsvbh1u:3335: nanu na bhavatyartho vidheyaḥsiddhe bhavitari labdharūpasya bhavanaṃ pratyakartṛtvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3341: prayatna itinirviṣayaścāsāvaśakyapratipattirato viṣayāpekṣāyāmāgneyaśabdopasthāpito dravyadevatāsaṃbandha evāsya viṣayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3346: nanu vyāpāraviṣayaḥ puruṣaprayatnaḥ kathamavyāpārarūpaṃ saṃbandhaṃ gocarayet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3347: na hi ghaṭaṃ kurvityatrāpi sākṣānnāmārthaṃ ghaṭaṃ puruṣaprayatno gocarayatyapi tu daṇḍādi hastādinā vyāpārayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3348: tasmādghaṭārthāṃ kṛtiṃ vyāpāraviṣayāmeva puruṣaḥ pratipadyate, na tu rūpato ghaṭaviṣayām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3349: uddeśyatayā tvasyāmasti ghaṭo na tu viṣayatayā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3353: NOTE 7-yataḥ yadāgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māvāsyāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ cācyuto bhavati ityādivākyena yāgo vidhīyate tasmāt 'ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsīṃ yajate'ityanuvāde yajata iti śrutaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3354: anyathā saṃbandha eva śrūyetetyarthaḥ / tasmānna kutrāpi saṃbandhavidhānamiti siddham / idamuktaṃ vistareṇa 'prakaraṇaṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ rūpāvacanāt'(jai. 2 /2 /3)
GSP33brsvbh1u:3357: evāgneya ityatrāpi dravyadevatāsaṃbandhākṣipto yajireva kāryaviṣayo vidheyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3358: kimuktaṃ bhavati, āgneyo bhavatītiḥāgneyena yāgena bhāvayediti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3359: ata eva 'ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsyāṃ yajate' 'ya evaṃ vidvānamāvāsyāṃ yajate'ityanuvādo bhavati 'yadāgneyaḥ'ityādivihitasya yāgaṣaṭkasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3363: ata eva ca vihitānūditasya tasyaiva 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta'ityādhikārasaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3369: tathā ca 'na hanyāt' 'na pibet'ityādiṣu yadi kāryamabhyupeyeta,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3372: evaṃ ca prajāpativratanyāyena paryudāsavṛttyāhananāpānasaṃkalpalakṣaṇayā tadviṣayo vidhiḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3374: NOTE 10-evaṃ niyogakṛtidhātvarthānāṃ vyāpyavyāpakatvamuktvā vyāpakanivṛttyā vyāpyanivṛttimāha-tathāca prasajyeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3377: na ca sati saṃbhave lakṣaṇā nyāyyā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3380: vibhajate niṣedheṣu tadabhāvāya-nekṣeteti / 'tasya brahmacāriṇo vratam'iti vrataśabdopakramāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3381_0: ekasmiṃśca vākye upasahārasya prakramādhīnatvādākhyātayogināpi nañā pratīto niṣedho
GSP33brsvbh1u:3386: tadabhāve ca tadvyāptasya kāryasyābhāva iti na kāryaparatvaniyamaḥ sarvatra vākye ityāha-brahmaṇo na hantavya ityevamādyā iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3387: nanu kasmānnivṛttireva kāryaṃ na bhavati, tatsādhanaṃ vetyata āha-na ca sā kriyeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3396_0: na ca rāgataḥ pravṛttasya hananapānādāvakasmādaudāsīnyamupapadyate vinā vidhārakaprayatnamtasmātsa
GSP33brsvbh1u:3396_1: eva pravṛttyunmukhānāṃ manovāgdehānāṃ vidhārakaḥ prayatno niṣedhavidhigocaraḥ kriyeti
GSP33brsvbh1u:3396_2: nākriyāparamasti vākyaṃ kiñcidapīti āha-na ca hananakriyānivṛttyaudāsīnyavyatirekeṇa
GSP33brsvbh1u:3397: kena hetunā na śakyamityata āha-svabhāvaprāptahantyarthānurāgeṇa nañaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3400: hananādi vā nañartho vā vidhārakaprayatno veti vikalpya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3403: ayamarthaḥ-hananapānaparo hi vidhipratyayaḥ pratīyamānaste eva vidhatte ityutsargaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3404: na caite śakye vidhātum, rāgataḥ prāptatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3405: na ca nañaḥ prasajyapratiṣedho vidheyaḥ, tasyāpyaudāsīnyarūpasya siddhatayā prāptatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3410: tasmādyatpibeddhanyādvetyanūdya tanneti niṣidhyate, tadabhāvo jñāpyate,na tu nañartho vidhīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3412_0: NOTE 3-nanu nañarthaścenna vidhīyate tarhi hananaṃ nāstītyādāviva siddhatayā pratīyetetyāśaṅkyāha-abhāvaśceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3415: sādhye ca sādhyavadbhāsata iti sādhyaviṣayo nañarthaḥ sādhyavadbhāsata iti nañarthaḥ kārya iti bhramaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3417: nanu bodhayatu saṃbandhino 'bhāvaṃ nañpravṛttyunmukhānāṃ tu manovāgdehānāṃ kuto 'kasmānnivṛttirityata āha-abhāvabuddhiścaudāsīnya
GSP33brsvbh1u:3423: NOTE 2-vidhiniṣedhayoriṣṭāniṣṭopāyatvabodhakatvaṃ vyutpattibalāddarśayati-ayamabhiprāya ityādinā pravartakeṣu vākyeṣvityataḥ prāktanena granthena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3426_1: pravṛttiṃ bhujaṅgāṅgulidānonmukhasya ca tato nivṛttimupalabhya bālo vyutpitsuḥ prayojyavṛddhasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:3437: api tu bhūyobhūyaḥ svagatamālocayata uktakāraṇapūrvāveva pratyavabhāsete /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3439_0: sa cāvagamaḥ prāgabhūtaḥ śabdaśravaṇānantaramupajāyamānaḥ śabdaśravaṇahetuka iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:3439_1: pravartakeṣu vākyeṣu 'yajeta'ityādiṣu śabda eva kartavyamiṣṭasādhanaṃ vyāpāramavagamayaṃstasyeṣṭasādhanatāṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3451: tayā khalvayaṃ cetana āpātato ramaṇīyatāṃ paśyannapyāyatimālocya pravṛttyabhāvaṃ nivṛttimavabudhya nivartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3469: na ca kavacāpagame ca asati ca śastraprahāre, rājanyajīvanāśa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3483: satyaṃ, na brahmajñānamātraṃ sāṃsārikadharmanivṛttikāraṇam, api tu sākṣātkāraparyantam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3489: atraiva sukhaduḥkhānutpādabhedena nidarśanadvayamāha-na hi dhanina iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3496: yatpunaraśarīratvaṃ tadasya svabhāva iti na śakyaṃ nivartayitum,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3499: na mithyājñānanimittaṃ saśarīratvam api tu dharmādharmanimittam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3501: tannivṛttau ca prāyaṇameveti na jīvato 'śarīratvamiti śaṅkate-tatkṛteti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3505: vāgbuddhiśarīrārambhajanitau hi tau nāsati śarīrasaṃbandhe bhavataḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3506: tābhyāṃ tu śarīrasaṃbandhaṃ rocayamāno vyaktaṃ parasparāśrayatvaṃ doṣamāvahati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3515: na hi yato dharmādharmabhedādātmaśarīrasaṃbandhabhedastata eva sa dharmādharmabhedaḥ kintveṣa pūrvasmādātmaśarīrasaṃbandhātpūrvadharmādharmabhedajanmanaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3526: prasiddho vastubhedo yasya puruṣasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3531: evaṃ saṃśaye samāropitamaniścitamudāhṛtya viparyayajñāne niścitamudāharati-yathā vā śuktikāyāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3532: śuklabhāsvarasya dravyasya puraḥsthitasya sati śuktikārajatasādhāraṇye yāvadatra rajataviniścayo bhavati tāvatkasmācchuktiviniścaya eva na bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3543: jīvato viduṣo 'śarīratve ca śrutismṛtī udāharati-tathā ceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3554: atha kasmānmananādividhireva na bhavatītyata āha-yadi hyavagatamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3555: na tāvanmanananididhyāsane pradhānakarmaṇī apūrvaviṣaye amṛtatvaphale ityuktamadhastāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3560: yathā prayājopayuktasyājyasya 'prayājaśeṣeṇa havīṃṣyabhidhārayet'iti haviḥṣu kṣāraṇam / etadubhayarūpamapi paramātmano na saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3572: itarathā tu dharmajijñāsaiveti na śāstrāntaramiti na śāstrārambhatvaṃ syādityāha-pratipattividhiparatva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3573: na kevalaṃ siddharūpatvādbrahmātmaikyasya dharmādanyatvamapi tu tadvirodhādapītyupasaṃhāravyājenāha-tasmādahaṃ brahmāsmīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3576: te ca sādhyasādhanetikartavyatābhedādhiṣṭhānā dharmotpādinaśca tadadhiṣṭhānā na brahmātmaikye sati prabhavanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3579: api tu sarveṣāṃ pramāṇānāmityāha-sarvāṇi cetarāṇi pramāṇānīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3588: yathā svaduḥkhena duḥkhī, yathā svasukhena sukhī, tathā putrādigatenāpīti so 'yaṃ guṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3594: tadasattve tu na lokayātrā, nāpi brahmātmaikatvānubhavaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3606: etaduktaṃ bhavati-eṣa hi vibhāgo 'dvaitasākṣātkārakāraṇam, tato niyamena prāgbhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3608: na ca pramāturātmano 'nveṣṭavya ātmānya ityāha-anviṣṭaḥ syātpramātaiva pāpmadoṣādivarjitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3620: yastu sākṣātkāro bhāvikaḥ, nāsau kāryaḥ, tasya brahmasvarūpatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3621: avidyā tu yadyavidyāmucchindyājjanayedvā, na tatra kācidanupapattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3622: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'vidyāṃ cāvidyāṃ ca yastadvedobhayaṃ saha /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3631_1: sūtrasaṃdarbheṇa sarvajñe sarvaśaktau jagadutpattisthitivināśakāraṇe prāmāṇyaṃ vedāntānāmupapāditam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3635: atra ca vipratipatteḥ pravādināṃ viśeṣānupalambhe sati saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3645: na ca jñānakriye cidātmani staḥ, tasyāpariṇāmitvādekatvācca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3647: yadyapi ca sāmyāvasthāyāṃ pradhāne samudācaradvṛttinī kriyājñāne na staḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3649: tathā ca pradhānameva sarvajñaṃ ca sarvaśakti ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3654: bhogāpargalakṣaṇapuruṣārthadvayaprayuktānādipradhānapuruṣasaṃyoganimit tastu mahadahaṅkārādikrameṇācetanasyāpi cetanānadhiṣṭhitasya pradhānasya pariṇāmaḥ sargaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3661: 'api cāhurvṛddhāḥ-yathāgryaprāye likhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadanti bhavedayamagryaḥ iti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3663: tatteja aikṣata ityādyupacāraprāye kṣutam tadaikṣata ityaupacārikameva vijñeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3664: anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi iti ca pradhānasya jīvātmatvaṃ jīvārthakāritayāha /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3665: yathā hi bhadraseno rājārthakārī rājñā bhadraseno mamātmetyupacaryate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3666: evaṃ tattvamasi ityādyāḥ śrutayo bhāktāḥ saṃpattyarthā vā draṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3667: svamapīto bhavati iti ca niruktaṃ jīvasya pradhāne svakīye 'pyayaṃ suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ brūte /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3670: vṛttīnāmanyāsāṃ pramāṇādīnāmabhāvastasya pratyayakāraṇaṃ tamastadālambamā nidrā jīvasya vṛttirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3671: tathā sarvajñaṃ prastutya śvetāśvataramantro 'pi-sakāraṇaṃ karaṇādhipādhipaḥ iti prādhānābhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3673: tasmādacetanaṃ pradhānaṃ jagadupādānamanuvadanti śrutaya iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3678: sattvasaṃpattyā cedasya sarvajñatātha tamaḥsaṃpattyāsarvajñataivāsya kasmānna bhavatītyata āha-tena ca sattvadharmeṇa jñāneneti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3687_0: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadyapi rajastamasī api staḥ tathāpi puruṣārtaprayuktaguṇavaiṣamyātiśayātsattvasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:3687_1: niratiśayotkarṣe sārvajñyaṃ kāryamutpadyata iti pradhānavasthāyāmapi tanmātraṃ vivakṣitvāvivakṣitvā
GSP33brsvbh1u:3689: nahi kiñcidekaṃ kāryaṃ janayedapi tu bahūni /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3690: cidātmā caikaḥ, pradhānaṃ tu triguṇamiti tata eva kāryamutpattimarhati, na cidātmana ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3691: tavāpi ca yogyatāmātreṇaiva cidātmanarḥ vajñatābhyupagamo na kāryayogādityāha-tvayāpīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3702: jagadbījaṃ tadeveṣṭaṃ cetane ca sa āñjasaḥ //
GSP33brsvbh1u:3713: pārthivatve tulya iva maṇerbimbodgrāhitā na loṣṭādīnām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3717: akriyānimittasya ca kārakatvanivṛttau tadvyāptasya tadviśeṣasya kartṛtvasya nivṛtteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3720: tasya tvanavacchinnasya tattadviṣayopadhānamedāvacchedena kalpitabhedasyānityatvaṃ kāryatvaṃ copapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3721: tathā caivaṃlakṣaṇa īkṣaṇe sarvaviṣaye brahmaṇaḥ svātantryalakṣaṇaṃ kartṛtvamupapannam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3722: yadyapi ca kūṭasthanityasyāpariṇāmina audāsīnyamasya vāstavaṃ tathāpyanādyanirvacanīyavidyāvacchinnasya vyāpāravattvabhavabhāsata iti kartṛtvopapattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3723: parairapi ca cicchekteḥ kūṭasthanityāyā vṛttīḥ prati kartṛtvamīdṛśamevābhyupeyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3726: tadvṛttayaśca khaṃ vā paraṃ vā veditumutsahante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3727: no khalvandhāḥ sahasramapi pānthāḥ panthānaṃ vidanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3728: cakṣuṣmatā caikena cedvedyate, sa eva tarhi mārgadarśī svatantraḥ kartā netā teṣām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3729: evaṃ buddhisattvasya svayamacetanasya citibimbasaṃkrāntyā cedāpannaṃ caitanyasya jñātṛtvaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3736: sarvathā bhavanmate 'pi nedaṃ svābhāvikaṃ kvacidapi jñātṛtvaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3738: nityasyātmano jñānaṃ pariṇāma iti ca bhedābhedapakṣamapākurvadbhirapāstam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3739: kūṭasthasya nityasyātmano 'vyāpāravata eva bhinnaṃ jñānaṃ dharma iti copariṣṭādapākariṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3741: tasya kartā īśvaro jñātā sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktiriti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3742: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'tapasā cīyate brahma tato 'nnamabhijāyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3743: annātprāṇo manaḥ satyaṃ lokāḥ karmasu cāmṛtam //
GSP33brsvbh1u:3750: vyācikīrṣāyāṃ copacaye sati tato nāmarūpamannamadanīyaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ vyācikīrṣitamabhijāyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3751: tasmādavyākṛtādvyācikīrṣitādannātprāṇo hiraṇyagarbho brahmaṇo jñānakriyāśaktyadhiṣṭhānaṃ jagatsūtrātmā sādhāraṇo jāyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3755: tebhyaśca satyākhyebhyo 'nukrameṇa lokāḥ bhūrādayaḥ teṣu manuṣyādiprāṇino varṇāśramakrameṇa karmāṇi dharmādharmarūpāṇi jāyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3760: yasya bhagavato jñānamayaṃ tapo dharmo nāyāsamayam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3762: kiñca nāmarūpamannaṃ ca vrīhiyavādi jāyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3764: kṣetrajñānāṃ ca satyapi caitanye sargādau viṣayānīkṣaṇāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3770: iha tu mukhyasyautsargikatvena niścaye sati saṃśayābhāvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3778: na ca pradhānaṃ paramāṇavo vā tadatiriktasarvajñeśvarādhiṣṭhitā jagadupādānamiti sāṃprataṃ kāryatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3779: kāraṇātkāryāṇāṃ bhedābhāvāt kāraṇajñānena samastakāryaparijñānasya mṛdādinidarśanenāgamena prasādhitatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3781: sākṣācca 'ekamevādvitīyam''neha nānāsti kiñcana'mṛtyoḥ samṛtyumāpnotiḥityādibhirbrahmātiriktasya prapañcasya pratiṣedhācetanopādānameva jagat,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3783: sadupādānatve hi siddhe jagatastadupādānaṃ cetanamacetanaṃ veti saṃśayya mīmāṃsyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3789: yadyapyākāśādyā bhūtasṛṣṭistathāpi tejo 'bannānāmeva trivṛtkaraṇasya vivakṣitatvāttatra tejasaḥ prāthamyāttejaḥ prathamamuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3792: tadyathā-prācī pratīcī dakṣiṇodīcīti catasraḥ kalā brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavānnāma prathamaḥ pādaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3794: tathā pṛthivyantarīkṣaṃ dyauḥ samudra ityaparaścatasraḥ kalā dvitīyaḥ pādo 'nantavānnāma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3795: tathāgniḥ sūryaścandramā vidyuditi catasraḥ kalāḥ, sa jyotiṣmānnāma tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3796: prāṇaścakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vāgiti catasraḥ kālāḥ, sa caturthaṃ āyatanavānnāma brahmaṇaḥ pādaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3800: na cāvivakṣitārthasya dhātusvarūpasya cetanopādānasādhanatvasaṃbhava ityata āha-īkṣateriti dhātvarthanirdeśo 'bhimataḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3807: sāmudācaradvṛtti tāvanna bhavati sattvaṃ, guṇavaiṣamya prasaṅgena sāmyānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3810: apica caitanyapradhānavṛttivacano jānātirna cācetane vṛttimātre dṛṣṭacaraprayoga ityāha-apica nāsākṣiketi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3811: kathaṃ tarhi yogināṃ sattvāśotkarṣahetukaṃ sarvajñatvamityata āha-yogināṃ tviti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3812: sattvāṃśotkarṣo hi yogināṃ caitanyacakṣuṣmatāmupakaroti, nāndhasya pradhānasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3813: yadi tu kāpilamatamapahāya hairaṇyagarbhamāsthīyeta tatrāpyāha-atha punaḥ sākṣinimittamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3814: teṣāmapi hi prakṛṣṭasattvopādānaṃ puruṣaviśeṣasyaiva kleśakarmavipākāśayāparāmṛṣṭasya sarvajñatvaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3822: kiṃ vāstavaṃ karmābhāvamabhipretya vaiṣamyamāha bhavān uta tadvivakṣābhāvam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3823: tatra yadi tadvivakṣābhāvaṃ, tadā prakāśayatītyanena mā bhūtsāmyaṃ, prakāśata ityanena tvasti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3825: atha ca prakāśasvabhāvaṃ pratyasti svātantryaṃ savituriti pariharati-na /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3832: yāsāṃ sati karmaṇyavivakṣite śrutīnāmupapattistāsāṃ sati karmaṇi vivakṣite sutarāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3834: yasya bhagavata īśvarasya prasādāt tasya nityasiddhasyeśvarasya nityaṃ jñānaṃ bhavatīti kimu vaktavyamiti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3838: vastuto nityasya kāraṇānapekṣāṃ svarūpeṇoktvā vyatirekamukhenāpyāha-api cāvidyādimata ityādi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3843: na tasya kāryamāvaraṇādyapagamo vidyate, anāvṛttatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3850: na tu ātmani svabhāvasiddhaprakāśe sa ghaṭata ityata āha-dṛśyate cātmana eva sata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3860: śaṅkottaratvena vā svātantryeṇa vā pradhānanirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3866_0: tacca na prathamaṃ sūkṣmatayā śakyaṃ śvetaketuṃ grāhayitumiti tatsaṃbaddhaṃ pradhānameva
GSP33brsvbh1u:3866_1: sthūlatayātmatvena grāhyate śvetaketurarundhatīmivātīva sūkṣmāṃ darśayituṃ tatsaṃnihitāṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3874: api ca jagatkāraṇaṃ prakṛtya svapitītyasya niruktaṃ karvitī śrutiścetanameva jagatkāraṇaṃ brūte /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3877: nahi mṛdātmā ghaṭa ātmīye 'pi pāthasi pralīyate 'pi tvātmabhūtāyāṃ mṛdyeva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3878: naca rajatamanātmabhūte hastini pralīyate, kintvātmabhūtāyāṃ śuktāvevetyāha-
GSP33brsvbh1u:3885: api tu teṣu sarvatra jagatkāraṇacetanyāvagatiḥ samāneti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3887: yathā hi sarveṣāṃ cakṣū rūpameva grāhayati, na punā rasādikaṃ kasyaciddarśayati kasyacidrūpam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3892: 'tadaikṣata'ityatra īkṣaṇamātraṃ jagatkāraṇasya śrutaṃ na tu sarvaviṣayam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3894: śvetāśvatarāṇāṃ tūpaniṣadi sarvajña īśvaro jagatkāraṇamiti sākṣāduktamiti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3899: śastraṃ ca sarvajñe sarvaśaktau jagadutpattisthitipralayakāraṇaṃ brahmaṇyeva pramāṇaṃ na pradhānādāviti nyāyato vyutpāditam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3900: na cāsti kaścidvedāntabhāgo yastadviparītamapi bodhayediti ca 'gatisāmānyāt'ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3905: yadyapi tatvato nirastasamastopādhirūpaṃ brahma tathāpi na tena rūpeṇa śakyamupadeṣṭumityupahitena rūpeṇopadeṣṭavyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3915: kathaṃ ca phalabhedaṃ ityata āha-eka eva tviti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3918: nanu yadyeka ātmā kūṭasthanityo niratiśayaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3919: kathametasmin bhūtāśraye tāratamyaśrutayā ityata āha-yadyapyeka ātmeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3920: yadyapi niratiśayamekameva rūpamātmana aiśvaryaṃ ca jñānaṃ cānandaśca,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3929: yathottamaprakāśaḥ savitā diṅmaṇḍalamekarūpeṇaiva prakāśenāpūrayannapi varṣāsu nikṛṣṭaprakāśa iva śaradi tu prakṛṣṭaprakāśa iva prathate, tathedamapīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3935: vikāraśabdān neti cen na prācuryāt | BBs_1,1.13 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:3940: 'ānandamaya iti hi vikāre prācurye ca mayaṭastulyaṃ mukhyārthatvamiti vikārārthānnamayādipadaprāyapāṭhādānandamayapadamapi vikārārthameveti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3941: na ca prāṇamayādiṣu vikārārthatvāyogātsvārthiko mayaḍiti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3942: prāṇādyupādhyavacchinno hyātmā bhavati prāṇādivikārāḥ, ghaṭākāśamiva ghaṭavikārāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3945: priyādibhāgī śarīro jīvo na brahma yujyate //
GSP33brsvbh1u:3946: 'na ca sarvāntaratayā brahmaivānandamayaṃ, na jīva iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3950: nahi devadatto balavānityukte sarvānsiṃhaśārdūlādīnapi prati balavānapratīyate 'pi tu samānajātīyanarāntaramapekṣya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3952: na ca niṣkalasya brahmaṇaḥ priyādyavayavayogaḥ, nāpi śarīratvaṃ yujyata iti saṃsāryevānandamayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3953: tasmādupahitamevātropāsyatvena vivakṣitaṃ, na tu brahmarūpaṃ jñeyatveneti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3954: api ca yadi prācuryārtho 'pi mayaṭ, tathāpi saṃsāryevānandamayaḥ;na tu brahma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3955: ānandaprācurya hi tadviparītaduḥkhalavasaṃbhave bhavati na tu tadatyantāsaṃbhave /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3956: na ca paramātmano manāgapi duḥkhalavasaṃbhavaḥ, ānandaikarasatvādityāha-na ca saśarīrasya sata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3957: aśarīrasya punarapriyasaṃbandho manāgapi nāstīti prācuryārtho 'pi mayaḍ nopapadyayata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3961: tathāca tadadhikāre paṭhitamabhyasyamānamānandapadaṃ tadbuddhimādhatta iti tasyaivānandamayasyābhyāsa iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3962: jyotiṣṭomādhikāre 'vasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeta'iti jyotiḥpadamiva jyotiṣṭomābhyāsaḥ kālaviśeṣavidhiparaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3975: mantre hi punaḥ punaḥ 'anyo 'ntara ātmā'iti parabrahmaṇyāntaratvaśravaṇāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3979: māntravarṇikameva paraṃ brahma brāhmaṇe 'pyānandamaya iti gīyata iti //15//
GSP33brsvbh1u:3991: rasaḥ sāro hyayamānandamaya ātmā 'rasaṃ hyevāyaṃ labdhvā'nandī bhavati'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3992: so 'yaṃ jīvātmano labdhṛbhāvaḥ, ānandamayasya ca labhyatā, nābheda upapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3993: tasmādānandamayasya jīvātmano bhede parabrahmatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3996: kathaṃ tarhi paramātmano vastuto 'bhinnena jīvātmanā paramātmā labhyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4000: jīvo hyavidyayā parabrahmaṇo bhinno darśitaḥ, na tu jīvādapi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4002: na jīvasyāvidyayāpi svato bhedo darśita iti na labdhṛlabdhavyabhāva ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4005: yathā parameśvarādbhinno jīvātmā draṣṭā na bhavatyevaṃ jīvātmano 'pi draṣṭurna bhinnaḥ parameśvara iti jīvasyānirvācyatve parameśvaro 'pyanirvācyaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4007: rajataṃ hi samāropitaṃ na śuktito bhidyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4008: na hi tadbhedenābhedena vā śakyaṃ nirvaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4016: eṣa tāvadutsargo yat-'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭheti brahmaśabdātpratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4019: ihāpyavayavaparatvātpucchapadasya tatsamānādhikaraṇaṃ brahmapadamapi svārthatyāgena kathañcidavayavaparaṃ vyākhyāyātām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4023: ānandapadābhyāsena ca jyotiḥ padeneva jyotiṣṭoma anandamayo lakṣyatāṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4030: pucchapadaṃ hi vāladhau mukhyaṃ sadānandamayāvayave gauṇameveti mukhyaśabdārthalaṅghanamavayavaparatāyāmadhikaraṇaparatāyāṃ ca tulyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4035: api cānandamayapadasya brahmārthatve, 'brahma puccham'iti na samañjasam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4044: tathā ca māntravarṇikasya brahmaṇa eva brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti svapradhānasyābhidhānāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4046: 'so 'kāmayeta'ityādyā api śrutayo brahmaviṣayā na ānandamayaviṣayā ityarthasaṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4051: etaduktaṃ bhavati-ānandamaya ityādivākye yat 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā'iti brahmapadaṃ tatsvapradhānameveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4056: yat 'satyaṃ jñānam'ityādinā mantravarṇena brahmoktaṃ tadevopāyabhūtena brāhmaṇena svapradhānyena gīyate-'brahma pucchaṃpratiṣṭhā'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4060: atra 'itaścānandamayaḥ'iti bhāṣyasya sthāne 'itaśca brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā'iti paṭhitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4062: atrāpi 'itaścānandamayaḥ'ityasya ca 'ānandamayādhikāre'ityasya ca bhāṣyasya sthāne 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā'iti 'brahmapucchādhikāre'iti ca paṭhitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4065: ityanayorapi sūtrayorbhāṣye ānandamayasthāne 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā'iti pāṭho draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4066: vikārasyānandamayasya brahma pucchamavayavaścetkathaṃ sarvasyāsya vikārajātasya sānandamayasya brahma pucchaṃ kāraṇamucyeta 'idaṃ sarvamasṛjata /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4068: nahyānandamayavikārāvayavo brahma vikāraḥ san sarvasya kāraṇamupapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4069: tasmādānandamayavikārāvayavo brahmeti tadavayavayogyānandamayo vikāra iha nopāsyatvena vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4070: kintu svapradhānamiha brahma pucchaṃ jñeyatveneti siddham // 19//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4075: pūrvasminnadhikaraṇe 'pāstasamastaviśeṣabrahmapratipattyarthamupāyatāmātreṇa pañca kośā upādhayaḥ sthitāḥ, natu vivakṣitāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4076: brahmaiva tu pradhānaṃ 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā'iti jñeyatvenopakṣiptamiti nirṇītam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4084: 'ye cāmuṣmātparāñco lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣṭe devakāmānāṃ ca'ityaiśvaryamaryādāśruteśca saṃsāryeva kāryakāraṇasaṃghātātmako rūpādisaṃpanna ihopāsyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4090_0: rūpādimattvānyathānupapattyā ca kāryakāraṇātmake jīve upāsyatvena vivakṣite yattāvadṛgādyātmakatayāsya
GSP33brsvbh1u:4090_1: sarvātmakatvaṃ śrūyate tatkathañcidādityapuruṣasyaiva stutiriti ādityapuruṣa evopāsyo
GSP33brsvbh1u:4091: anādhāratve ca nityatvaṃ sarvagatatvaṃ ca hetuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4093: nityamapyasarvagataṃ ca yattasmādadharabhāvenāsthitaṃ tadeva tasyottarasyādhāra iti nānādhāraṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4099: na cādityasya devatāyāḥ karmānadhikāre 'pi sarvapāpmavirahaḥ prāgbhavīyadharmādharmarūpapāpmasaṃbhave sati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4100: na caiteṣāṃ prāgbhavīyo dharma evāsti na pāpmeti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4104: naca vinigamanāhetvabhāvaḥ, tatra tatra sarvapāpmavirahasya bhūyobhūyo brahmaṇyeva śravaṇāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4137: tatra 'ākāśa iti hovāca'iti kiṃ mukhyakāśapādānurodhena 'asya lokasya kā gatiḥ'iti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4138: 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni'iti 'jyāyā'itica 'parāyaṇam'iti ca kathañcidvyākhyāyatāṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4142: 'asya lokasya kā gatiḥ'iti praśnottare 'ākāśa iti hovāca'ityākāśasya gatitvena pratipādyatayā prādhānyāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4146: tena tadanuraktāyāṃ buddhau yadyadeva tadekavākyagatamupanipatati tattajjaghanyatayā upasaṃjātavirodhi tadānuguṇyenaiva vyavasthānamarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4147: naca kkacidākāśaśabdo bhaktyā brahmaṇi prayukta iti sarvatra tena tatpareṇa bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4148: nahi gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra gaṅgapadamanupapattyā tīraparamiti yādāṃsi gaṅgāyāmityatrāpyanena tatpareṇa bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4153: loke cāsya nabhasi nirūḍhatvāt, tatpūrvakatvācca vaidikārthapratītervaiparītyānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4154: tadānuguṇyena ca 'sarvāṇi ha vā'ityādīni bhāṣyakṛtā svayameva nītāni /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4163: 'asya lokasya kā gatiḥ'iti praśno dṛśyamānanāmarūpaprapañcamātragativiṣaya iti tadanurodhādya eva sarvasya lokasya gatiḥ sa evākāśaśabdena prativaktavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4164: naca bhūtākāśaḥ sarvasya lokasya gatiḥ, tasyāpi lokamadhyapātitvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4168: naca praśnena pūrvapakṣarūpeṇānavasthitārthenottaraṃ vyavasthitārthaṃ na śakyaṃ niyantumiti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4172: tathāhi-'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyakāśādeva samutpadyante'iti sarvaśabdaḥ kathañcidalpaviṣayo vyākhyeyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4174: na khalvapāmākāśa eva kāraṇamapi tu tejo 'pi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4175: evamannasyāpi nākāśameva kāraṇamapi tu pāvakapāthasī api /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4189: tathāca tadarthaṃ sat ākāśapadaṃ pradhānārthaṃ bhavati, nānyathā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4194_0: tatra tatra brahmaṇyākāśaśabdasya tatparyāyasya ca prayogaprācuryādatyantābhyāsenāsyāpi
GSP33brsvbh1u:4195: tatraiva ca prathamāvagatānuguṇyenottaraṃ nīyate, yatra tadanyathā kartuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4196: yatra tu na śakyaṃ tatrottarānuguṇyenaiva prathamaṃ nīyata ityāha-vākyopakrame 'pīti //22//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4200: udgīthe-'yā devatā prastāvamanvāyattā'ityupakramya śrūyate-'katamā sā devateti prāṇa iti hovāca'uṣastiścākrāyaṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4202: prastāva iti sāmno bhaktiviśeṣastamanvāyattā anugatā prāṇo devatā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4203: atra prāṇaśabdasya brahmaṇi vāyuvikāre ca darśanātsaṃśayaḥ-kimayaṃ brahmavacana uta vāyuvikāravacana iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4204: tatra ata eva brahmaliṅgādeva prāṇo 'pi brahmaiva na vāyuvikāra iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4209: ākāśasya vā vāyvādibhūtakāraṇatvaṃ prati nāgamādṛte mānāntaraṃ prabhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4210: tatra paurvāparyaparyālocanayā yatrārthe samañjasa āgamaḥ sa evārthastasya gṛhyate, tyajyate cetaraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4211_0: iha tu saṃveśanodgamane bhūtānāṃ prāṇaṃ pratyucyamāne kiṃ brahma pratyucyete āho
GSP33brsvbh1u:4211_1: vāyuvikāraṃ pratīti viśaye 'yadā vai puruṣaḥ svapiti prāṇaṃ tarhi vāgapyeti'ityādikāyāḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:4211_3: mānāntarānugrahalabdhasāmarthyāyā balātsaṃveśanodgamane vāyuvikārasyaiva prāṇasya, na brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4212: api cātrodgīthapratihārayoḥ sāmabhaktyorbrahmaṇo 'nye ādityaścānnaṃ ca devate abhihite kāryakāraṇasaṃghātarūpe,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4218: 'no khalu svataḥsiddhapramāṇabhāvamapauruṣeyaṃ vacaḥ svaviṣayajñānotpāde vā tadvyavahāre vā mānāntaramapekṣate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4222: tasmādasaṃvādino vā cakṣuṣa iva rūpe tvagindriyasaṃvādino vā tasyaiva dravye nādārḍhyaṃ vā dārḍhyaṃ vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4225: pratītau vā tatrāpi prāṇo brahmaiva bhavenna vāyuvikāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4226: 'yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'ityatra vākye yathā prāṇaśabdo brahmavacanaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4227: na cāsminvāyuvikāre sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ saṃveśanodgamane mānāntareṇa dṛśyete /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4232: indriyasaṃveśanodgamanaṃ tvavayutyānuvādenāpi ghaṭiṣyate, ekaṃ vṛṇīte dvau vṛṇīte itivat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4235: tathā copāsakasya prāṇaprāptiḥ karmasamṛddhirvā phalaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4242: idamāmananti-'atha yadataḥ paro divo jyotirdīpyate niśvataḥpṛṣṭheṣu sarvataḥ pṛṣṭheṣvanuttameṣūttameṣu lokeṣvidaṃ vāva tadyadidamasminnantaḥ puruṣe jyotiḥ'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4243: yajjyotirato divo dyulokātparaṃ dīpyate prakāśate viśvataḥpṛṣṭheṣu viśveṣāmupari /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4244: asaṃkucadvṛttirayaṃ viśvaśabdo 'navayavatvena saṃsāramaṇḍalaṃ brūta iti darśayitumāha-sarvataḥpṛṣṭheṣūttameṣu /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4245: na cedamuttamamātraṃ apitu sarvottamamityāha-anuttameṣunāstyebhyo 'nya uttama ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4247: śrotragrāhyeṇa ca pihitakarṇena puṃsā ghoṣeṇa liṅgenānumīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4252: atra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ jyotiḥśabdaḥ teja uta brahmeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4259: kokṣeyajyotiḥsārūpyaṃ ca cakṣuṣyo rūpavān śruto viśruto bhavatītyalpaphalatvaṃ ca svavākye śrūyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4260: na jātu jvalanāparanāmā dīptirvinā tejo brahmaṇi saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4264: audarye tu tejasyadhyasya bāhyaṃ teja upāsanametat phalānurūpaṃ yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4266: etadupodbalanāya ca nirastamapi maryādādhārabahutvamupanyastaṃ, iha tannirāsakāraṇābhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4268: tasya sauryādeḥ sāvayavatvena tadekadeśamaryādāsaṃbhavāt tasya copāsyatvena vidhānāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4271: naca 'pādo 'sya sarvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi'iti brahmapratipādakaṃ vākyāntaraṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4272: 'yadataḥ paro divo jyotiḥ'śabdaṃ brahmaṇi vyavasthāpayatīti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4273: nahi saṃnidhānamātradvākyāntareṇa vākyāntaragatā śrutiḥ śakyā mukhyārthāntryāvayitum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4274: naca vākyāntare 'dhikaraṇatvena dyauḥ śrutā diva iti maryādāśrutau śakyā pratyabhijñātum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4275: apica vākyāntarasyāpi brahmārthatvaṃ prasādhyameva nādyāpi sidhyati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4276: tatkathaṃ tena niyantuṃ brahmaparatayā 'yadataḥ paraḥ'iti vākyaṃ śakyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4278: tejaḥkathanaprastāve tamaḥkathanaṃ pratipakṣopanyāsena pratipakṣāntare dṛḍhā pratītirbhavatītyetadartham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4289: 'ekaikāṃ trivṛtaṃ trivṛtaṃ karavāṇi'iti tejaḥprabhṛtyupāsanāmātraviṣayā śrutirna saṃkocayituṃ yuktetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4290: evamekadeśini dūṣite paramasamādhātā pūrvapakṣī brūte-astu tarhi trivṛtkṛtameveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4293: tathāpi yathā kārye jyotiṣyatiśayenopapadyate na tathātretyata uktam-upapadyetatarāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4298: brahmaṇyeva pradhānaṃ hi brahmacchando na tatra tu //
GSP33brsvbh1u:4302: tatra vacanāni tvapūrvatvāditi sarvanāmnaḥ prasiddhārthatvaṃ balādapanīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4304: tadiha 'yadataḥ paro divo jyotiḥ'iti yacchabdasāmarthyāt dyumaryādenāpi jyotiṣā prasiddhena bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4306: pūrvavākye ca dyusaṃbandhitayā tripādbrahma prasiddhamiti prasiddhyapekṣāyāṃ tadeva saṃbadhyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4307: naca pradhānasya prātipadikārthasya tattvena pratyabhijñāne tadviśeṣaṇasya vibhaktyarthasyānyatāmātreṇānyatā yuktā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4308: evaṃ ca tadvākyasthāni tejoliṅgānyasamañjasānīti brahmaṇyeva gamayitavyāni, gamitāni ca bhāṣyakṛtā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4310: athavā prakāśamātravacano jyotiḥśabdaḥ prakāśaśca brahmeti brahmaṇi mukhya iti jyotirbahmeti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4312: prasiddhyapekṣāyāṃ pūrvavākyagataṃ prakṛtaṃ saṃnihitaṃ, aprasiddhaṃ tu kalpyaṃ na prakṛtam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4323: chando 'bhidhānān neti cen na tathā ceto'rpaṇanigadāt tathā hi darśanam | BBs_1,1.25 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:4324: pūrvavākyasya hi brahmārthatve siddhe syādetadevaṃ, natu tadbrahmārthaṃ, apitu gāyatryartham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4325: 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ yadidaṃ kiñca'iti gāyatrīṃ prakṛtyedaṃ śrūyate-'tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4329: evaṃ 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam'ityakṣarasaṃniveśamātrasya gāyatryā na sarvatvamupapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4332: tasmādgāyatrīdvārā brahmaṇa evopāsanā na gāyatryā iti pūrveṇaiva gatārthatvādanārambhaṇīyametat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4335: tathāhi-gāyatrīdvārā brahmopāsaneti kor'thaḥ, gāyatrīvikāropādhino brahmaṇa upāsaneti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4338: tasmādasya sarvātmatvādikaṃ stutyarthaṃ, tadvaraṃ gāyatryā evāstu stutiḥ kayācitpraṇāḍyā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4339: 'vāgvai gāyatrī vāgvā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ gāyati ca trāyate ca'ityādiśrutibhyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4340: tathāca 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam'ityupakramya gāyatryā eva hṛdayādibhirvyākhyāya ca 'saiṣā catuṣpadā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī'ityupasaṃhāro gāyatryāmeva samañjaso bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4347: gāyatryākhyacchandodvāreṇa gāyatrīrūpavikārānugate brahmaṇi cetorpaṇaṃ cittasamādhānamanena brāhmaṇavākyena nigadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4352: kintu yadetadbrahma sarvātmakaṃ sarvakāraṇaṃ tatsvarūpeṇāśakyopadeśamiti tadvikāragāyatrīdvāreṇopalakṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4353: gāyatryāḥ sarvacchandovyāptyā ca savanatrayavyāptyā ca dvijātidvitīyajanmajananīyatayā ca śrutervikāreṣu madhye prādhānyena dvāratvopapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4355: nahi kuṇḍalenopalakṣitaṃ kaṇṭharūpaṃ kuṇḍalaviyoge 'pi paścātpratīyamānamapratīyamānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4357: tadevaṃ gāyatrīśabdasya mukhyārthatve gāyatryā brahmopalakṣyata ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4358: saṃprati tu gāyatriśabdaḥ saṃkhyāsāmānyādgauṇyā vṛttyā brahmaṇyeva vartata iti darśayati-apara āheti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4359: tathāhi-ṣaḍakṣaraiḥ pādairyathā gāyatrī catuṣpadā, evaṃ brahmāpi catuṣpāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4365: tathāhi śrutiḥ-'idaṃ vāva tadyo 'yaṃ bahirdhā puruṣādākāśaḥ'taddhi tasya jagaritasthānam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4367: tathā-'ayaṃ vāva sa yo 'yamantaḥ puruṣa ākāśaḥ' /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4381: bhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayavākprāṇā iti ṣaṭ prakārā gāyatryākhyasya brahmaṇaḥ śrūyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4384: asyārthaḥ-hṛdayasyāsya khalu pañca suṣayaḥ pañca chidrāṇi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4385: tāni ca devaiḥ prāṇādibhī rakṣyamāṇāni svargaprāptidvārāṇīti devasuṣayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4386: tathāhi-hṛdayasya yatprāṅmukhaṃ chidraṃ tatstho yo vāyuḥ sa prāṇaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4391: atha yo 'sya dakṣiṇaḥ suṣistatstho vāyuviśeṣo vyānaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4392: tatsaṃbaddhaṃ śrotra taccandramāḥ, 'śrotreṇa sṛṣṭā viśaścandramāśca'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4393: atha yo 'sya pratyaṅmukhaḥ suṣistatatstho vāyuviśeṣo 'pānaḥ sa ca vāksaṃbandhādvāk,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4395: atha yo 'syodaṅmukhaḥ suṣistatstho vāyuviśeṣaḥ sa samānaḥ tatsaṃbaddhaṃ manaḥ tatparjanyo devatā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4396: atha yo 'syordhvaḥ suṣistatstho vāyuviśeṣaḥ sa udānaḥ pādatalādārabhyordhvaṃ nayanāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4399: tatsaṃbaddhāḥ pañca hārdasya brahmaṇaḥ puruṣā na gāyatryāmakṣarasaṃniveśamātre saṃbhavanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4403: upadeśabhedān neti cen nobhayasminn apy avirodhāt | BBs_1,1.27 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:4406: yo hi śyeno vṛkṣāgre vastuto 'sti sa ca tataḥ paro 'pyastyeva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4409: yadā tu maryādaiva mukhyatayā prādhānyena vivakṣitā tadā lakṣaṇayādhāratvaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4416: na vaktur ātmopadeśād iti ced adhyātmasaṃbandhabhūmā hy asmin | BBs_1,1.29 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:4426: hitatamapuruṣārthasiddhiśca nikhilabhrūṇahatyādipāpāparāmarśaśca prajñātmatvaṃ cānandādiśca na mukhye prāṇe saṃbhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4429_0: vaktṛtvaṃ ca vākkaraṇavyāpāravattvaṃ yadyapi paramātmani svarūpeṇa na saṃbhavati
GSP33brsvbh1u:4431: tadeva brahma tvaṃ viddhi'iti vāgvadanasya brahma kāraṇamityāha-śarīrādhāraṇamapi yadyapi mukhyaprāṇasyaiva tathāpi prāṇavyāpārasya paramātmāyattatvātparamātmana eva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4446_0: indrasya devatāyā ātmani pratibuddhasya caramadehasya vāmadevasyeva prarabdhavipākakarmāśayamātraṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:4446_1: bhogena kṣapayato brahmaṇa eva sarvametatkalpata iti vigrahavadindrajīvaprāṇavāyuparityāgena
GSP33brsvbh1u:4447_0: atrocyate-'yo vai prāṇaḥ sā prajñā yā vā prajñā sa prāṇaḥ saha hyetavasmin śarīre
GSP33brsvbh1u:4447_1: vasataḥ sahotkrāmataḥ'iti yasyaiva prāṇasya prajñātmana upāsyatvamuktaṃ tasyaiva
GSP33brsvbh1u:4448: naca brahmaṇyabhede dvivacanaṃ, na sahabhāvaḥ na cotkramaṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4461: tameva tvekaṃ vākyārthaṃ padārthāvagamamantareṇa na śaknuvanti kartumityantarā tadarthameva tamapyavagamayanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4464: tena yathopāṃśuyājavākye jāmitādoṣopakrame tatpratisamādhānopasaṃhāre caikavākyatvāya 'prajāpatirupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ'ityādayo na pṛthagvidhayaḥ kintvarthavādā iti nirṇītaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4469: ata evopalakṣyasya pratyagātmasvarūpasyābhedamupalakṣaṇaṃ bhedenopalakṣayati-'prāṇa eva prajñātmā'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4474: jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgān neti cen nopāsātraividhyādāśritatvād iha tadyogāt | BBs_1,1.31 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:4481: prāṇāntarāṇīndriyāṇi, tāni hi mukhye prāṇe pratiṣṭhitāni /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4488: pañca śabdādayaḥ, pañca pṛthivyādaya iti daśa bhūtamātrāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4489: pañca buddhīndriyāṇi pañca buddhasya iti daśa prajñāmātrāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4490: tadevaṃ svamatena vyākhyāya prācāṃ vṛttikṛtāṃ matena vyācaṣṭe-athaveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4491: pūrvaṃ prāṇasyaikamupāsanamaparaṃ jīvasyāparaṃ brahmaṇa ityupāsanātraividhyena vākyabhedaprasaṅgo dūṣaṇamuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4492: iha tu brahmaṇa ekasyaivopāsātrayaviśiṣṭasya vidhānānna vākyabheda ityabhimānaḥ prācāṃ vṛttikṛtām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4496: iha tu siddharūpaṃ brahma na vidhiviṣayo bhavitumarhati, abhāvārthatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4498: vākyāntarebhyaśca brahmavagateḥ prāptatvāttadanūdyāprāptopāsanā bhāvārtho vidheyastasya ca bhedādvidhyāvṛttilakṣaṇo vākyabhedo 'tisphuṭa iti bhāṣyakṛtā noddhāṭitaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4501: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite bhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ prathamasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //1//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4508: atha dvitīyaṃ pādamāripsuḥ pūrvoktamarthaṃ smārayati vakṣyamāṇopayogitayā-prathame pāda iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4510: na caite sākṣātpūrvamupapāditā iti kathaṃ hetubhāvena na śakyā upadeṣṭumityata uktam-samastajagatkāraṇasyeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4511: yadyapyete na pūrvaṃ kaṇṭhata uktāstathāpi brahmaṇo jagajjanmādikāraṇatvopapadānenādhikaraṇasiddhāntanyāyenopakṣiptā ityupapannasteṣāmuttaratra hetubhāvenopanyāsa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4514: tatra kaiva kathā manomayādīnāmarthāntare prasiddhānāṃ padānāṃ brahmagocaratvanirṇayaṃ pratītyabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4523: tasmiṃścāniti sthitikāle ceṣṭata iti tadanaṃ jagat tasmātsarvaṃ khalvidaṃ jagadbrahma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4524: ataḥ kaḥ kasminrajyate kaśca kaṃ dveṣṭīti
GSP33brsvbh1u:4526: atha khalu kratumayaḥ puruṣo yathākraturasmiṃlloke puruṣo bhavati tathetaḥ pretya bhavati sa kratuṃ kurvīta manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīra ityādi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4527: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimiha manomayatvādibhirdharmaiḥ śārīra ātmopāsyatvenopadiśyate āhosvidbrahmeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4532: tathā ca 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma'iti vākyaṃ prathamapaṭhitamapyarthālocanayā parameva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4534: evaṃ ca saṃkalpavidhiḥ prathamo nirviṣayaḥ sannaparyavasyanviṣayāpekṣaḥ svayamanirvṛtto na vidhyantareṇopajīvituṃ śakyaḥ, anupapadākatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4536: manomayatvādi ca kāryakāraṇasaṃghātātmano jīvātmana eva nirūḍhamiti jīvātmanopāsyenoparaktopāsanā na paścāt brahmaṇā saṃbaddhumarhati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4538: naca 'sarvaṃ khalvidam'iti vākyaṃ brahmaparamapi tu śamahetuvannigadārthavādaḥ śāntatāvidhiparaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4540: na cānyaparādapi brahmāpekṣitatayā svīkriyata iti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4547: evaṃ karmakartṛvyapadeśaḥ saptamīpraṇamāntatā cābhede 'pi jīvātmani kathañcidbhedopacāreṇa rāhoḥ śira itivaddraṣṭavyā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4549: evaṃ satyasaṃkalpatvādayo 'pi paramātmavartino jīve 'pi saṃbhavanti, tadavyatirekāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4550: tasmājjīva evopāsyatvenātra vivakṣitaḥ, na paramātmeti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4557: tathā hi prāṇaḥ śarīramasyeti sarvanāmārtho bahuvrīhiḥ saṃnihitaṃ ca sarvanāmārthaṃ saṃprāpya tadabhidhānaṃ paryavasyet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4559: tadeva tu manovikāro vā manaḥpracuraṃ vā kimarthamityadyāpi na vijñāyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4560: tadyatraiṣa śabdaḥ samavetārtho bhavati sa samāsārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4561: na caiṣa jīva eva samavetārtho na brahmaṇīti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4564: vikārāṇāṃ ca svakāraṇādabhedātteṣāṃ ca manomayatayā brahmaṇastatkāraṇasya manomayatvopapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4567: tatra prathamaṃ dvārasya buddhisthatvāttadevopāsyamastu, na punarjaghanyaṃ brahma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4575: vayaṃ tu paśyāmaḥ-'samāropyasya rūpeṇa viṣayo rūpavānbhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4576: viṣayasya tu rūpeṇa samāropyaṃ na rūpavat //
GSP33brsvbh1u:4577: 'samāropitasya hi rūpeṇa bhujaṅgasya bhīṣaṇatvādinā rajjū rūpavatī,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4580: bhujaṅgadaśāyāṃ tu na nāsti vāstavī rajjuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4584: tasmādbrahmaliṅgadarśanājjīve ca tadasaṃbhavādbrahmaivopāsyaṃ na jīva iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4598: yatparaṃ vedavākyaṃ tattenopāttaṃ vivakṣitam, atatpareṇa cānupāttamavivakṣitamityarthaḥ //2//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4607: śārīraguṇā iva manomayatvādayo brahmaṇītyata āha sūtrakāraḥ-anupapattestu na śārīraḥ //3 // //4 // //5//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4611: arbhakaustvāt tadvyapadeśāc ca neti cen na nicāyyatvād evaṃ vyomavac ca | BBs_1,2.7 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:4612: yattadavocāma samāropyadharmāḥ samāropaviṣaye saṃbhavanti, natu viṣayadharmāḥ samāropya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4615: na tāvadbhedapratiṣedhādbhedavyapadeśācca bhedābhedāvekatra tāttvikau bhavitumarhato virodhādityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4622: tādṛśāṃ ca jīvānāmavidyā, natu nirūpādhino brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4627: yo hi paratantraḥ so 'nyena bandhanāgāre praveśyeta,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4632: na caitāvatā īśvarasyānīśatā na hyupakaraṇādyapekṣitā kartuḥ svātantryaṃ vihanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4636: saṃbhogaprāptir iti cen na vaiśeṣyāt | BBs_1,2.8 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:4646: kaṭhavallīṣu paṭhyate-yasya brahma ca kṣatraṃ cobhe bhavata odanaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4647: mṛtyuryasyopasecanaṃ ka itthā veda yatra sa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4649: attṛtvaṃ ca bhoktṛtā vā saharntṛtā vā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4653: tadyadi bhoktṛtvamattṛtvaṃ tato muktasaṃśayaṃ jīvātmaiva pratipattavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4654: brahmakṣatrādi cāsya kāryakāraṇasaṃghāto bhogāyatanatayā vā sākṣādvā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4657: tatastrayāṇāmagnijīvaparamātmanāṃ praśnopanyāsopalabdheḥ saṃhartṛtvasyāviśeṣādbhavati saṃśayaḥ-kimattā agnirāho jīva utāho paramātmeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4658: tatraudanasya bhogyatvena loke prasiddherbhoktṛtvameva prathamaṃ buddhau viparivartate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4668: tatra yadi jīvasya bhogāyatanatayā tatsādhanatayā ca kāryakāraṇasaṃghātaḥ sthitaḥ, na tarhyedanaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4669: nahyodano bhogāyatanaṃ, nāpi bhogasādhanaṃ, api tu bhogyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4670: naca bhogāyatanasya bhogasādhanasya vā bhogyatvaṃ mukhyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4673: kasyacitkrūrasattvasya vyāghrādeḥ kaścidbhavet na tu sarvathā sarvajīvasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4679: 'brahma ca kṣatraṃ ca'iti ca śrutī saṃkocamarhataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4680: naca brahmakṣatre evātra vivakṣite, mṛtyūpasecanena prāṇabhṛnmātropasthāpanāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4681: prāṇiṣu pradhānatvena ca brahmakṣatropanyāsasyopapatteḥ, anyanivṛtteraśābdatvāt anarthatvācca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4685: tathāca 'na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścit'iti brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtasya na hānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4686: 'ka itthā veda yatra saḥ'iti ca durjñānatopapatsyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4691: guhāṃ praviṣṭāv ātmānau hi taddarśanāt | BBs_1,2.11 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:4696: autsargikasya mukhyatābalātpūrvasiddhāntapakṣāsaṃbhavena pakṣāntaraṃ kalpayiṣyata iti manvānaḥ saṃśayamākṣipati-atrāhākṣepteti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4701_0: tadiha buddheracaitanyena paramātmanaśca bhoktṛtvaniṣedhena jīvātmaivaikaḥ pāda pariśiṣyata
GSP33brsvbh1u:4702: astu vā mukhya eva, tathāpi na doṣa ityāha-yadveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4703: svātantryalakṣaṇaṃ hi kartṛtvaṃ tacca pāturiva pāyayiturapyastīti so 'pi kartā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4704: ata eva cāhuḥ-'yaḥ kārayati sa karotyeva'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4705: evaṃ karaṇasyāpi svātantryavivakṣayā kathañcitkartṛtvaṃ, yathā kāṣṭhāni pacantīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4715: jīvo hi bhoktṛtayā buddhiśca bhogasādhanatayā dharmasya gocare sthitau,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4719: naca jīvaḥ paramātmano 'bhinnastamaḥ prakāśarūpatvāt buddhistu jaḍatayā tama iti śakyopadeṣṭum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4720: tasmādbuddhijīvāvatra kathyete iti tatrāpi prete vicikitsāpanuttaye buddherbhedena paralokī jīvo darśanīya iti buddhirucyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4723: brahmaṇaiva sarūpeṇa na tu buddhyā virūpayā //1//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4726: gauḥ sadvitīyetyukte sajātīyenaiva gavāntareṇāvagamyate, na tu vijātīyenāśvādinā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4727: tadiha cetano jīvaḥ sarūpeṇa cetanāntareṇaiva brahmaṇā sadvitīyaḥ pratīyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4729: tadevam 'ṛtaṃ pibantau'ityatra prathamamavagate brahmaṇi tadanurodhena caramaṃ guhāśrayatvaṃ śālagrāme hariritivadvyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4730: bahulaṃ hi guhāśrayatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ śrutaya āhuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4733: evañca prathamāvagatabrahmānurodhena sukṛtalokavartitvamapi tasya lakṣaṇayā chatrinyāyena gamayitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4734: chāyātapatvamapi jīvasyāvidyāśrayatayā brahmaṇaśca śuddhaprakāśasvabhāvasya tadanāśrayatayā mantavyam //11//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4738: imameva nyāyaṃ 'dvā suparṇā'ityatrāpyudāharaṇe kṛtvācintayā yojayati-eṣa eva nyāya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4739: atrāpi kiṃ buddhijīvau uta jīvaparamātmānāviti saṃśayya karaṇarūpāyā api buddheredhāṃsi pacantītivatkartṛtvopacārādbuddhijīvāviha pūrvapakṣayitvā siddhāntayitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4741: taddarśanāditi ca 'samāne vṛkṣe puruṣo nimagnaḥ'ityatra mantre /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4742: na khalu mukhye kartṛtve saṃbhavati karaṇe kartṛtvopacāro yukta iti kṛtvācintāmuddhāṭayati-apara āha /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4752: vacanavirodhe nyāyasyābhāsatvādityata āha-nāpyasyādhikaraṇasya pūrvapakṣaṃ bhajata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4753: evaṃ hi pūrvapakṣamasya bhajeta, yadi hi kṣetrajñe saṃsāriṇi paryavasyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4754: tasya tu brahmarūpatāyāṃ paryavasyanna pūrvapakṣamapi svīkarotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4756: tāvetau sattvakṣetrajñau na ha vā evaṃvidi kiñcana raja ādhvaṃsata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4758: etāvataiva vidyopasaṃhārājjīvasya brahmātmatāparatāsya lakṣyata ityāha-tāvatā ceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4767: apitu buddhisattvaṃ mukhādirupapariṇataṃ citicchāyāpattyopapannacaitanyamiva bhuṅkte natu tattvato jīvaḥ paramātmā bhuṅkte /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4780: parokṣaṃ brahma na tathā pratibimbe tu yujyate //1//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4783: 'ṛtaṃ pibantau ityatra hi jīvaparamātmānau prathamamavagatāviti tadanurodhena guhāpraveśādayaḥ paścādavagatā vyākhyātāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4784: tadvadihāpi 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate'iti pratyakṣābhidhānātprathamamavagate chāyāpuruṣe tadanurodhenāmṛtatvābhayatvādayaḥ stutyā kathañcidvyākhyeyāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4791: kaṃ ca khaṃ cetyādi tu vākyamagnīnāṃ nācāryavākyaṃ niyantumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4792: 'ācāryastu te gatiṃ vaktā'iti ca gatyantarābhiprāyaṃ, na tūktapariśiṣṭābhiprāyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4794: saṃbhavamātreṇa tu jīvadevate upanyaste, bādhakāntaropadarśanāya caiṣa dṛśyata ityasyātrābhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4799: 'saṃnihitāśca puruṣātmādiśabdāste ca na yāvatsvārthamabhidadhati tāvatsarvanāmabhyāṃ nārthatuṣo 'pyabhidhīyata iti kutastadarthasyāparokṣatā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4800: puruṣātmaśabdau ca sarvanāmanirapekṣau svarasato jīve vā paramātmani vā vartete iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4801: naca tayoṣcakṣuṣi pratyakṣadarśanamiti nirapekṣapuruṣapadapratyāyitārthānurodhena ya eṣa iti dṛśyata iti ca yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4803: viduṣaḥ śāstrata upalabdireva dṛḍhatayā pratyakṣavaduparyate praśaṃsārthamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4804: api ca tadeva caramaṃ prathamānuguṇatayā nīyate yannetuṃ śakyam, alpaṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4807: tathā sati kiṃ nāma nāmṛtaṃ syāditi vyarthamamṛtapadam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4813: nanu sarvagatasyeśvarasya kasmādviśiṣeṇa cakṣureva sthānamupadiśyata iti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4815: śrutiḥ-'tadyadyapyasminsārpirvodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmanī eva gacchati'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4823: sa eva puṇyaphalāni vāmāni nayati lokamiti vāmanīḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4826: taduktaṃ śrutyā-'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti'iti //13//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4833: sthānino hi sthānaṃ mahadvṛṣṭaṃ, yathā yādasāmabdhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4834: tatkathamatyalpaṃ cakṣuradhiṣṭhānaṃ paramātmanaḥ paramamahata iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4836: sthānānyādayo yeṣāṃ te sthānādayo nāmarūpaprakarāsteṣāṃ vyapadeśātsarvagatasyaikasthānaniyamo nāvakalpate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4838: viśeṣatastu brahmaṇastāni tānyupāsanāsthānānīti tairasya yukto vyapadeśaḥ //14//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4844: evaṃ khalūpākhyāyate-upakosalo ha vai kāmalāyanaḥ satyakāme jābāle brahmacaryamuvāsa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4849_1: śraddadhānāyāsmai dṛḍhabhaktaye sametya brahmavidyāmūcire-'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4853: kintu kaṃ ca khaṃ ca brahmetyetanna vijānāmi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4854: nahi viṣayendriyasaṃparkajaṃ sukhamanityaṃ lokasiddhaṃ khaṃ ca bhūtākāśamacetanaṃ brahma bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4855: athainamagnayaḥ pratyūcuḥ-'yadvāva kaṃ tadeva khaṃ yadeva khaṃ tadeva kam'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4858: eṣā somya te 'smadvidyā pratyekamuktā svaviṣayā vidyā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4859: ātmavidyā cāsmābhiḥ saṃbhūya pūrvamuktā prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahmeti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4863: evaṃ vyavasthite 'yadvāva kaṃ tadeva khaṃ yadeva khaṃ tadeva kam'ityetadvyācaṣṭe bhāṣyakāraḥ-tatra khaṃśabda iti pratīkābhiprāyeṇeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4869: laukikasya sukhasya sādhanapāratantryaṃ kṣayiṣṇutā cāmayastena saha vartata iti sāmayaṃ sukham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4872: sukhaśabdasamānādhikaraṇo hi khaṃśabdo bhūtākāśamarthaṃ parityajya brahmaṇi guṇayogena vartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4873: tādṛśā ca khena sukhaṃ viśiṣyamāṇaṃ sāmayādvyāvṛttaṃ nirāmayaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4877: evaṃ khaṃpadasyāpi brahmapadaṃ śiro yayoḥ kaṅkhaṃpadayoste brahmaśirasī,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4879: astu prastute kimāyātamityata āha-tadevaṃ vākyopakrama iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4881: 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi'ityācāryavākye 'pi tadevānuvartanīyamiti tu kuta ityāha-ācāryastu te gatiṃ vakteti ca gatimātrābhidhānamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4882: yadyapyete bhinnavaktṛṇī vākye tathāpi pūrveṇa vaktrā ekavākyatāṃ gamite, gatimātrābhidhānāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4890: brahmavida iva te somya mukhaṃ prasannaṃ bhāti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4892: upakosalastu hrīṇo bhītaśca ko nu māmanuśiṣyāt bhagavan proṣite tvayītyāpātato 'pajñāya nirbadhyamāno yathāvadagnīnāmanuśāsanamavocat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4893: tadupaśrutya cācāryaḥ suciraṃ kliṣṭa upakosale samupajātadayārdrahṛdayaḥ pratyuvāca,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4894: somya kila tubhyamagnaye na brahma sākalyenāvocan,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4896: tadanubhavamāhātmyāt 'yathā puṣpakarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4900: yaduktamagnibhiḥ prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahmeti tatparipūraṇāya 'eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate'ityādi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4901: etaduktaṃ bhavati-ācāryeṇa ye sukhaṃ brahmākṣisthānaṃ saṃyadvāmaṃ vāmanībhāmanītyevaṅguṇakaṃ prāṇasahitamupāsate te sarve 'pahatapāpmāno 'nyatkarma kurvantu mā vākārṣuḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4906: yeṣu māseṣūttarāṃ diśameti savitā te ṣaṇmāsā uttarāyaṇaṃ taddevatāṃ pratipadyante,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4913: sa tādṛśaḥ puruṣa etānsatyalokasthaṃ kāryaṃ brahma gamayati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4914: sa eṣa devapatho devairarcirādibhirnetṛbhirupalakṣita iti devapathaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4915: sa eva ca brahmaṇā gantavyenopalakṣita iti brahmapathaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4916: etena pathā pratipadyamānāḥ satyalokasthaṃ brahma imaṃ mānavaṃ manoḥ sargaṃ kiṃbhūtamāvartaṃ janmajarāmaraṇapaunaḥ punyamāvṛttistatkartāvarto mānavo lokastaṃ nāvartante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4917: tathāca smṛtiḥ-'brahmaṇā saha te sarve saṃprāpte pratisaṃcare /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4930: vijñānātmano hi na pradeśe upāsanānyatra dṛṣṭacarī, brahmaṇastu tatra śrutapūrvetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4941: pravṛttiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ hi kāryaṃ cetanasya śarīriṇaḥ svaśarīrendriyādau vā śarīreṇa vā vāsyādau dṛṣṭaṃ nāśarīrasya brahmaṇo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4945: pradhānasya vā pṛthivyādyabhimānavatyā devatāyā vāṇimādyaiśvaryayogino yogino vā jīvātmano vāntaryāmitā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4953: tathāpi tasya pratiniyataniyamanāt 'yaḥ sarvaṃllokānantaro yamayati yaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtānyantaro yamayati'iti śrutivirodhādanupapatteḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4954: yogī tu yadyapi lokabhūtavaśitayā sarvāṃllokānsarvāṇi ca bhūtāni niyantumarhati tatra tatrānekavidhadehendriyādinirmāṇena 'sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavati'ityādiśrutibhyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4955: tathāpi 'jagadvyāpāravarjaṃ prakaraṇāt'iti vakṣyamāṇena nyāyena vikāraviṣaye vidyāsiddhānāṃ vyāpārabhāvātso 'pi nāntaryāmī /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4956: tasmātpāriśeṣyājjīva eva cetano dehendriyādimān dṛṣṭṛtvādisaṃpannaḥ svayamadṛśyādiḥ svātmani vṛttivirodhāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4959: 'ya ātmani tiṣṭhan'iti cābhede 'pi kathañcidbhedopacārāt 'sa bhagavaḥ kasminpratiṣṭhitaḥ sve mahimni'itivat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4962: yadi punarātmano 'pi niyantūranyo niyantā bhavet veditā vā tatastasyāpyanya ityanavasthā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4964: tadupārjitau hi dharmādharmau niyacchata ityanayā dvārā jīvo niyacchati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4974: tathāca sarvaṃ vikārajātaṃ tadavidyāśaktipariṇāmastasya śarīrendriyasthāne vartata iti yathāyathaṃ pṛthivyādidevatādikāryakaraṇaistāneva pṛthivyādidevatādīñchaknoti niyantum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4977: kintu yo jīvo niyantā lokasiddhaḥ sa paramātmaivopādhyavacchedakalpitabhedastathā vyākhyāyata ityasakṛdāveditaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4988: 'ya ātmani tiṣṭhan'ityādau cābhede 'pi bhedopacārakleśo na bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4999: śarīraś cobhaye 'pi hi bhedenainam adhīyate | BBs_1,2.20 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:5025: yathorṇanābhilālāpariṇāmā lūtātantavastatsarūpāḥ, tathā vivartā api vartamānasarūpā eva na virūpāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5027: na jātu rajjvāṃ kuñjara iti viparyasyanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5030: tasmātpradhānameva jaḍaṃ jaḍasya jagato yoniriti yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5034: ato yaḥ pradhānātparaḥ paramātmā sa sarvavit /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5039: tatkhalu jaḍamanirvācyamanirvācyasya jaḍasya prapañcasyopādānaṃ yujyate, sārūpyāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5045: sati bādhake 'syānāśrayaṇaṃ, iha tu bādhakaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5047: iha tvavidyāśaktereva jagadyonitvasaṃbhave na dvārādvāribhāvo yayukta iti pradhānamevātra vākye jagadyonirucyata iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5048: atha yoniśabdo nimittakāraṇaparastathāpi brahmaiva nimittaṃ na tu jīvātmeti vinigamanāyāṃ na heturastīti saṃśayena pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5051: yaḥ sarvajña iti śrutyā sarvajñasya sa ucyate //1//
GSP33brsvbh1u:5058: yattu sārūpyābhāvānna cidātmanaḥ pariṇāmaḥ prapañca iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5063: na khalu bāhyasārūpyanibandhana eva sarvo vibhrama iti niyamanimittamasti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5072: na kevalaṃ liṅgādapi tu 'parā vidyā'iti samākhyānādapyetadeva pratipattavyamityāha-apica dve vidye iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5075: avacchinno hi jīvātmā bhogyebhyo viṣayebhyo vyatirikta iti tajjñānena na sarvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5081: rūpyante 'neneti rūpaṃ, yajño rūpamupādhiryeṣāṃ te yajñarūpāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5083: ṛtuyajanenopādhinā ṛtvikśabdaḥ pravṛtta iti yajñopādhaya ṛtvijaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5086: ta ete 'ṣṭādaśa yajñarūpāḥ, yeṣvṛtvigādiṣūktaṃ karma yajñaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5100: tathāca bahusamañjasaṃ syādityata āha-nātra pradhānaṃ nāma kiñciditi //22//
GSP33brsvbh1u:5105: tadetatparamatenākṣepasamādhānābhyāṃ vyākhyāya svamatena vyācaṣṭe-anye punarmanyanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5109: saṃnidheśca prakaraṇaṃ balīya iti jāyamānaparityāgena viśvayonereva prakaraṇino rūpābhidhānamiti cet na,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5111: na caitāvatā mūrdhādiśrutayaḥ prakaraṇavirodhātsvārthatyāgena sarvātmatāmātraparā iti yuktam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5113: siddhe ca prakaraṇināsaṃbandhe jāyamānamadhyapātitvaṃ jāyamānagrahaṇe kāraṇamupanyastaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5114: tasmāddhiraṇyagarbha eva bhagavān prāṇātmanā sarvabhūtāntaraḥ kāryo nirdiśyata iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5121: śabdādibhyo 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhānāc ca neti cen na tathā dṛṣṭyupadeśād asambhavāt puruṣamapi cainam adhīyate | BBs_1,2.26 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:5123: prācīna śālasatyayajñendradyumnajanabuḍilāḥ sametya mīmāṃsāṃ cakruḥ-ko na ātmā kiṃ brahmeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5124: ātmetyukte jīvātmani pratyayo mā bhūdata uktaṃ kiṃ brahmeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5125: te ca mīmāṃsamānā niścayamanadhigacchantaḥ kaikeyarājaṃ vaiśvānaravidyāvidamupaseduḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5126: upasadya cocuḥ-ātmanamevemaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ saṃpratyadhyeṣismarasitameva no brūhītyupakramya dyusūrvāyvākāśavāripṛthivīnāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5129: prāṇo vāyuḥ pṛthagvartmātmā pṛthak vartma yasya vāyoḥ sa pṛthagvartmā sa evātmā svabhāvo yasya sa pṛthagvartmātmā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5130: saṃdeho dehasya madhyabhāgaḥ sa ākāśo bahulaḥ sarvagatatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5132: yato 'dbhyo 'nnamannācca rayirdhanaṃ tasmādāpo rayiruktāstāsāṃ ca mūtrībhūtānāṃ bastiḥ sthānamiti bastireva rayirityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5145_0: nanu 'ko na ātmā kiṃ brahma'ityupakrame ātmabrahmaśabdayoḥ paramātmani rūḍhatvena
GSP33brsvbh1u:5145_1: taduparaktāyāṃ buddhau vaiśvānarāgnyādayaḥ śabdāstadanurodhena paramātmanyeva kathañcinnetuṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5146: yadyapi ca vājasaneyināṃ vaiśvānaravidyopakrame 'vaiśvānaraṃ ha vai bhagavān saṃprati veda taṃ no brūhi'ityatra nātmabrahmaśabdau staḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5147: tathāpi tatsamānārthaṃ chāndogyavākyaṃ tadupakramamiti tena niścitārthena tadavirodhena vājasaneyivākyārtho niścīyata /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5152: naca sarvapāpmapradāha iti pāriśeṣyātparamātmaiva vaiśvānara iti niścite kutaḥ punariyamāśaṅkā-śabdādibhyo 'ntaḥ pratiṣṭhānānneti cediti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5155: api cāntaḥpratiṣṭhatatvaṃ ca prādeśamātratvaṃ ca na sarvavyāpino 'parimāṇasya ca parabrahmaṇaḥ saṃbhavataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5161: athavā agniśarīrāyā devatāyā aiśvaryayogāt dyumūrdhatvādaya upapadyanta iti śaṅkiturabhisaṃdhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5167: tadupādhyupadeśena vā manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīro bārūpa itivadupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5169_0: tathāca brahmāśrayasya pratyayasyāśrayāntare jāṭharavaiśvānarāhvaye kṣepeṇa vā jāṭharavaiśvānaropādhini
GSP33brsvbh1u:5169_1: vā brahmaṇyupāsye vaiśvānaradharmāṇāṃ brahmadharmāṇāṃ ca samāveśa upapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5170: asaṃbhavāditi sūtrāvayavaṃ vyācaṣṭe-yadi ceha parameśvaro na vivakṣyeteti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5171: puruṣamapi cainamadhīyata iti sūtrāvayavaṃ vyācaṣṭe-yadi ca kevala eveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5174: ata eva yatpuruṣa iti puruṣamanūdya na vaiśvānaro vidhīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5176: evaṃ ca parameśvaradṛṣṭirhi jāṭhare vaiśvānara ihopadiśyata iti bhāṣyaṃ virudhyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5178: 'sa yo haitamevamagniṃ vaiśvānaraṃ puruṣaṃ puruṣavidhaṃ puruṣe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitaṃ veda'iti vaiśvānarasya hi puruṣatvavedanamatrānūdyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5180: tasmāt 'sa eṣo 'gnirvaiśvānaro yat'iti yadaḥ pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5181: puruṣa iti tu tatra puruṣadṛṣṭerupadeśa iti yuktam //24// // 25 // // 26 //
GSP33brsvbh1u:5184: ata eva na devatā bhūtaṃ ca | BBs_1,2.27 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:5185: ata eva na devatā bhūtaṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5187: 'yo bhānunā pṛthivīṃ dyāmutemām'iti mantravarṇo 'pi na kevalauṣṇyaprakāśavibhavamātrasya bhūtāgnerimamīdṛśaṃ mahimānamāha,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5216: saṃpatter iti jaiminis tathā hi darśayati | BBs_1,2.31 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:5230: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakamīmaṃsābhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ prathamasyaḥādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2//
GSP33brsvbh1u:5242: 'pārāvāramathyapātī hi setuḥ tābhyāmavacchidyamāno jalavidhārako loke dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5253: tathāca pāravatyamṛtavyatirikte setāvanuśriyamāṇe pradhānaṃ vā sāṃkhyaparikalpitaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5254: tat khalu svakāryopahitamaryādatayā puruṣaṃ yāvadagacchadbhavatīti pāravat,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5266: atha tu sākṣācchutyuktaṃ dyubhvādyāyatanamādriyase, tato vāyurevāstu /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5267: 'vāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇāya ca lokaḥ paraśca lokaḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavanti'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5268: yadi tvātmaśabdābhidheyatvaṃ na vidyata iti na parituṣyasi,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5271: yadi punarasya dyubhvādyāyatanasya sārvajñyaśruteratrāpi na parituṣya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5272: bhavatu tato hiraṇyagarbha eva bhagavān sarvajñaḥ sūtrātmā dyubhvādyāyatanam /
