GSP33brsvbh1u:5273: tasya hi kāryatvena pāravattvaṃ cāmṛtātparabrahmaṇo bhedaścetyādi sarvamupapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5274: ayamapi 'vāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇa'iti śrutimupanyasyatā sūcitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5280: 'nahi mṛddārumayo mūrtaḥ pārāvāramadhyavartī pāthasāṃ vidhārako lokasiddhaḥ setuḥ pradhānaṃ vāvyākṛtaṃ vā vāyurvā jīvo vā sūtrātmā vābhyupeyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5282: so 'smākaṃ pāravattāvarjaṃ vidharaṇatvamātreṇa yogamātrādrūḍhiṃ parityajya pravartsyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5285: yathā 'dvyekayordvivacanaikavacane'ityatra dvitvaikatve dvyekaśabdārthau, anyathā dvyekeṣviti syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5287: tathā cāmṛtasyeti ca seturiti ca brahmaṇi dyubhvādyāyatane upapatsyete /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5288: atra ca svaśabdāditi tantroccaritatamātmaśabdāditi ca sadāyatanā iti sacchabdāditi ca brahmaśabdāditi ca sūcayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5291: āyatanāyatanavadbhāvaḥ sarvaṃ brahmeti ca sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ hiraṇyagarbhepyupapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5300: nātra dyubhvādyāyatanasya setutocyate yena pāravattā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5305: naca prādhānyādeṣa iti sarvanāmnā dyubhvādyāyatanamātmaiva parāmṛśyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5309: vidheyasya vyāpārasyaiva vyāpāravato 'mṛtatvasādhanatvāt na cedamaikāntikaṃ yatpradhānameva sarvanāmnā parāmṛśyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5317: brahmaṇaśca muktopasṛpyatvaṃ 'yadā sarve pramucyante'ityādau śrutyantare prasiddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5346: yāvatā 'na prāṇabhṛdanumāne'ityeka eva yogaḥ kasmānna kṛta ityata āha-pṛthagiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5358: na khalu hiraṇyagarbhādiṣu jñāteṣu sarvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati kintu brahmaṇyeveti //6//
GSP33brsvbh1u:5363: yadi jīvo hiraṇyagarbho vā dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ bhavet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5371: tatra hi 'anaśnannanyo 'abhicākaśīti'iti jīva upādhirahitena rūpeṇa brahmasvabhāva udāsīno 'bhoktā darśitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5373: tathā cetthaṃbhūtaṃ jīvaṃ kathayatānena mantravarṇena dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ brahmaiva kathitaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5382: nāradaḥ khalu devarṣiḥ karmavidanātmavittayā śocyamātmānaṃ manyamāno bhagavantamātmajñamājānasiddhaṃ mahāyoginaṃ sanatkumāramupasasāda /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5384: tadupaśrutya sanatkumāreṇa 'nāma brahmetyupāḥsva'ityukte nāradena pṛṣṭaṃ kiṃnāmno 'sti bhūya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5388: kartavyākartavyavivekaḥ saṃkalpaḥ, tasya kāraṇaṃ pūrvāparaviṣayanimittaprayojananirūpaṇaṃ cittam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5390_0: prāṇasya ca samastakriyākārakaphalabhedena pitrādyātmatvena ca rathāranābhidṛṣṭāntena
GSP33brsvbh1u:5390_2: eva nāradena sanatkumāra ekagranthena 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati'iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:5391: tadupaśrutya nāradena 'sukhaṃ tveva bhagavo vijijñāse'ityukte sanatkumāraḥ 'yo vai bhūmā tatsukham'ityupakramya bhūmānaṃ vyutpādayāṃbabhūva-'yatra nānyatpaśyati'ityādinā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5393: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ prāṇo bhūmā syādāho paramātmeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5400: apica bhūmeti bhāvo na bhavitāramantareṇa śakyo nirūpayitumiti bhavitāramapekṣamāṇaḥ prāṇasyānantaryeṇa buddhisaṃnidhānāttameva bhavitāraṃ prāpya nirvṛṇoti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5403: na cātmanaḥ prakaraṇādātmaiva buddhistha iti tasyaiva bhūmā syāditi yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5408: tadetatsaṃśayabījaṃ darśayatā bhāṣyakāreṇa sūcitaṃ pūrvapakṣasādhanamiti na punaruktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5409: naca bhūyobhūyaḥ praśnātparamātmaiva nāradena jijñāsita iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5411: tadevaṃ prāṇa eva bhūmeti sthite yadyattadvirodhitayā vacaḥ pratibhāti tattadanuguṇatayā neyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5414: 'eṣa tu vā ativadati'iti tuśabdena prāṇadarśino 'tivādino vyavacchidya satyenātivāditvaṃ vadan kathaṃ prāṇasya bhūmānamabhidadhītetyata āha-prāṇameva tviti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5418_0: apitu tadativāditvamaparityajya pratyuta tadanukṛṣya tasyaiva prāṇasya satyasya śravaṇamananaśraddhāniṣṭhākṛtibhirvijñānāya
GSP33brsvbh1u:5423: matvā ca guruśiṣyasabrahmacāribhiranusūyubhiḥ saha saṃvādya tattvaṃ śraddhatte /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5424: śraddhānantaraṃ ca viṣayāntaradarśī viraktastato vyāvṛttastattvajñānābhyāsaṃ karoti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5426: atha tattvajñānābhyāsaniṣṭhā bhavati, yadanantarameva tattvavijñānamanubhavaḥ prādurbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5428: apyāhuḥ-'bhūtārthabhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajaṃ yogijñānam'iti bhāvanāprakarṣasya paryanto niṣṭhā tasmājjāyate tattvānubhava iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5429: tasmātprāṇa eva bhūmeti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati'ityuktvā bhūmocyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5430: tatra satyaśabdaḥ paramārthe nirūḍhavṛttiḥ śrutyā paramārthamāha /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5433_0: tathāca 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati'iti brahmaṇo 'tivāditvaṃ śrutyānyanirapekṣayā
GSP33brsvbh1u:5434: evaṃ ca prāṇādūrdhvaṃ brahmaṇi bhūmāvagamyamāno na prāṇaviṣayo bhavitumarhati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5436_0: evaṃ cānātmavida ātmānaṃ vividiṣornāradasya praśne paramātmānamevāsmai vyākhyāsyāmītyabhisaṃdhimānsanatkumāraḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5437: naca praśnapūrvatāpravāhapatitenottareṇa sarveṇa praśnapūrveṇaiva bhavitavyamiti niyamo 'stītyādisugamena bhāṣyeṇa vyutpāditam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5440: tadabhidhāne hi sāpekṣatvena na prakaraṇaṃ samāpyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5441: tasmānnedaṃ prāṇasya prakaraṇamapi tu yadāyattaḥ prāṇastasya, sa cātmetyātmana eva prakaraṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5446: saṃdaṃśanyāyena hi bhūmna etatprakaraṇaṃ, sa cedbhūmā prāṇaḥ, prāṇasyaitatprakaraṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5450: na kevalaṃ śruterbhūmātmatā paramātmanaḥ, liṅgādapītyāha sūtrakāraḥ-
GSP33brsvbh1u:5452: yadapi pūrvapakṣiṇā kathañcinnītaṃ tadanubhāṣya bhāṣyakāro dūṣayati-yo 'pyasau suṣuptāvasthāyāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5467: sarvaṃ hi rūpadheyaṃ nāmadheyasaṃbhinnamanubhūyate, gaurayaṃ vṛkṣo 'yamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5469: nahi dhūmopāyā vahnidhīrdhūmasaṃbhinnaṃ vahnimavagāhate dhūmo 'yaṃ vahniriti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5472: apica śabdānupāye 'pi rūpadheyapratyaye liṅgendriyajanmani nāmasaṃbhedo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5475: 'tadyathā śaṅkunā sarvāṇi parṇāni saṃtṛṇṇānyevamoṅkāreṇa sarvā vāk'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5476: ata oṅkārātmakāḥ pṛthivyādayo 'mbarāntā iti varṇā evākṣaraṃ na paramātmeti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5477: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate-akṣaraṃ paramātmaiva, na tu varṇāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5480: na khalvambarāntāni pṛthivyādīni varṇā dhārayitumarhanti, kintu paramātmaiva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5482: naca nāmadheyātmakaṃ rūpadheyamiti yuktaṃ, svarūpabhedāt, upāyabhedāt, arthakriyābheda /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5484: rūpadheyāni tu ghaṭapaṭādīni ghaṭatvapaṭatvādisāmānyātmakāni cakṣurādīndriyāgrāhyāṇi madhudhāraṇaprāvaraṇādyarthakriyāṇi ca bhedenānubhūyante iti kuto nāmasaṃbhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5487: kintu yo nānādeśakālasaṃplutaḥ piṇḍaḥ so 'yaṃ saṃnihitadeśakāla ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5490: piṇḍa eva hi dṛṣṭaḥ sansaṃjñāṃ smārayituṃ kṣamaḥ //1//
GSP33brsvbh1u:5491: saṃjñā hi smaryamāṇāpi pratyakṣatvaṃ na bādhate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5492: saṃjñinaḥ sā taṭasthā hi na rūpācchādanakṣamā //2//
GSP33brsvbh1u:5499: ye tu pradhānaṃ pūrvapakṣayitvānena sūtreṇa paramātmaivākṣaramiti siddhāntayanti tairambarāntaradhṛterityanena kathaṃ pradhānaṃ nirākriyata iti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5500: atha nādhikaraṇatvamātraṃ dhṛtiḥ api tu praśāsanādhikaraṇatā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5501: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'etasya vākṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5507: nahyavaśyaṃ prāptipūrvakā eva pratiṣedhā bhavanti, aprāpteṣvapi nityānuvādānāṃ darśanāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5514: praśāsanamājñā cetanadharmo nācetane pradhāne vāvyākṛte vā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5520: ambarāntavidharaṇasyākṣarasyeśvarāgadyadanyadvarṇā vā pradhānaṃ vāvyākṛtaṃ vā teṣāmanyeṣāṃ bhāvo 'nyabhāvastamatyantaṃ vyāvartayati śrutiḥ-'tadvā etadakṣaraṃ gārgi'ityādikā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5525: akṣarasya cakṣurādyupādhiṃ vārayantī śrutiraupādhikasya jīvasyākṣaratāṃ niṣedhatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5535: ' 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati'iti śruteḥ sarvagataparabrahmavedane tadbhāvāpattau 'sa sāmabhirunnīyate brahmalokam iti na deśaviśeṣaprāptirupapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5537: na cekṣaṇasya loke tattvaviṣayatvena prasiddheḥ parasyaiva brahmaṇastathābhāvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5543: naca tattvaviṣayameva sarvaṃ darśanaṃ, anṛtaviṣayasyāpi tasya darśanāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5544: naca mananaṃ darśanaṃ, tacca tattvaviṣayameveti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5559: tadanurodhena ca parātpara ityatra parāditi jīvaghanaviṣayaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5560: tasmāttu paraḥ puruṣo dhyātavyaśca draṣṭavyaśca bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5561: tadidamuktam-na cātra jīvaghanaśabdena prakṛto 'bhidhyātavyaḥ paraḥ puruṣaḥ parāmṛśyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5562: kintu jīvaghanāt parāt paro yo dhyātavyo draṣṭavyaśca tameva kathayituṃ jīvaghano jīvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5565: sa hi samastakaraṇātmanaḥ sūtrātmano hiraṇyagarbhasya bhagavato nivāsabhūmitayā karaṇaparivṛtānāṃ jīvānāṃ saṃghāta iti bhavati jīvaghanaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5567: ata eva cāsya deśaviśeṣādhigatiḥ phalamupādhimattvāt, krameṇa ca samyagdarśanotpattau muktiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5568: 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati'iti tu nirupādhibrahmavedanaviṣayā śrutiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5574: 'atha yadidamasmin brahmapure daharam'sūkṣmaṃ guhāprāyaṃ puṇḍarīkasaṃniveśaṃ veśma 'daharo 'sminnantarākāśastasminyadantastadanveṣṭavyam'āgamācāryopadeśābhyāṃ śravaṇaṃ ca,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5580: tatra prathamaṃ tāvadevaṃ saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ daharākāśādanyadeva kiñcidanveṣṭavyaṃ vijijñāsitavyaṃ ca uta daharākāśa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5581: yadāpi daharākāśo 'nveṣṭavyastadāpi kiṃ bhūtākāśa āho śārīra ātmā kiṃ vā paramātmeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5584: tatra prathamaṃ tāvadbhūtākāśa eva dahara iti pūrvapakṣayati-tatrākāśaśabdasya bhūtākāśe rūḍhatvāditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5585: eṣa tu bahutarottarasaṃdarbhavirodhāttucchaḥ pūrvapakṣa ityaparitoṣeṇa pakṣāntaramālambate pūrvapakṣī-athavā jīvo dahara iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5592: tadiha śarīraṃ brahmavikāro 'pi na brahmaṇā vyapadeṣṭavyam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5595: apica brahmapura iti saptamyadhikaraṇe smaryate, tenādheyenānena saṃbaddhavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5596: naca brahmaṇaḥ sve mahimni vyavasthitasyānādheyasyādhārasaṃbandhaḥ kalpate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5598: tasmādbrahmaśabdo rūḍhiṃ parityajya dehādibṛṃhaṇatayā jīve yaugike vā bhākto vā vyākhyeyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5605: vatsarājasya pura ivojjayinyāṃ maitrasya sajñmetyata āha-tatra purasvāmina iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5606: ayamarthaḥveśma khalvadhikaraṇamanirdiṣṭhādheyamādheyaviśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ purasvāminaḥ prakṛtatvāttenaivādheyena saṃbaddhaṃ sadanapekṣaṃ nādheyāntareṇa saṃbandhaṃ kalpayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5607: nanu tathāpi śarīramevāsya bhogāyatanamiti ko hṛdayapuṇḍarīkasya viśeṣo yattadevāsya sajñmetyata āha-manaupādhikaśca jīva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5608: nanu mano 'pi calatayā sakaladehavṛtti paryāyeṇetyata āha-manaśca prāyeṇeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5615: agatyā bhedamāropya gatau satyāṃ na yujyate //
GSP33brsvbh1u:5621: api tu bhūtākāśopamānena puṇḍarīkopādhiprāptaṃ daharatvaṃ nivartyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5622: apica sarva evottare hetavo daharākāśasya bhūtākāśatvaṃ vyāsedhantītyāha-naca kalpitabheda iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5626: 'dehe hi brahmopalabhyata ityasādhāraṇatayā deho brahmapuramiti vyapadiśyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5630: tathāpi yathā vatsarājasya pure ujjayinyāṃ maitrasya sajñma bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5631: evaṃ jīvasya pure hṛtpuṇḍarīkaṃ brahmasadanaṃ bhaviṣyati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5633: brahmaṇo hi bādhake pramāṇe balīyasi jīvasya ca sādhake pramāṇe sati brahmaliṅgāni kathañcidabhedavivakṣayā jīve vyākhyāyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5634: na ceha brahmaṇo bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ, sādhakaṃ vāsti jīvasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5638: talliṅgānāṃ nābrahmaṇi vyākhyānamucitamiti brahmaiva daharākāśo na jīvabhūtākāśāviti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5639: śravaṇamananamanuvidya brahmānubhūya caraṇaṃ cārasteṣāṃ kāmeṣu caraṇaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5650: ācāryeṇa hi 'daharo 'sminnantarākāśastasminyadantastadanveṣṭavyaṃ tadvāva vijijñāsitavyam'ityupadiṣṭe 'ntevāsinākṣiptam-'kiṃ tadatra vidyate yadanveṣṭavyam' /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5655: tadasminnākṣepe parisamāpte samādhānāvasara ācāryasyākāśopamānopakramaṃ vacaḥ-'ubhe asmindyāvāpṛthivī samāhite'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5661: no khalvabhyupagamā eva doṣatvena codyanta ityata āha-tatra vākyaśeṣa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5664: yacca kartavyaṃ tadicchitīti 'tadanveṣṭavyaṃ tadvāva vijijñāsitavyam'iti taddaharākāśaviṣayamavatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5667: tataścākāśādhārau tāveva parāmṛśyate ityata āha-asminkāmāḥ samāhitāḥpratiṣṭhitāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5674: 'asminkāmāḥ'iti ca 'eṣaḥ'iti caikavacanāntaṃ na dve dyāvāpṛthivyau parāmnaṣṭumarhatīti daharākāśa eva parāmraṣṭavya iti samudāyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5675: tadanena krameṇa 'tasminyadantaḥ'ityatra tacchabdo 'nantaramapyākāśamatilaṅghya hṛtpuṇḍarīkaṃ parāmṛśatatyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5679: gatiśabdābhyāṃ tathā hi dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ ca | BBs_1,3.15 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:5681: uttarebhya ityasya prapañcaḥ etameva daharākāśaṃ prakramya batāho kaṣṭamidaṃ vartate jantūnāṃ tattvāvabodhavikalānāṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5683_2: sādbhutamiva sakhedamiva śrutaḥ pravartate-'imāḥ sarvāḥ prajā aharahargacchantya
GSP33brsvbh1u:5684_0: svāpakāle hi sarva evāyaṃ vidvānavidvāṃśca jīvaloko hṛtpuṇḍarīkāśrayaṃ daharākāśākhyaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5684_1: brahmalokaṃ prāpto 'pyanādyavidyātamaḥ paṭalapihitadṛṣṭitayā brahmabhūyamāpanno 'hamasmīti na veda /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5685: so 'yaṃ brahmalokaśabdastadgatiśca pratyahaṃ jīvalokasya daharākāśasyaiva brahmarūpalokatāmāhatuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5686: tadetadāha bhāṣyakāraḥ-itaśca parameśvara eva daharo yasmāddaharavākyaśeṣa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5690: yadyapi suṣuptasya brahmabhāve laukikaṃ na pramāṇāntaramasti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5692: īdṛśī nāmeyaṃ vaidikī prasiddhiryalloke 'pi gīyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5693: yathā śrutyantare yathā ca loke tatheha brahmalokaśabdo 'pīti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5697: tathāpīha ṣaṣṭhisamāsanirākaraṇena karmadhārayasamāsasthāpanāya liṅgamapyadhikamastīti tadapyuktaṃ sūtrakāreṇa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5699: naca daharākāśo brahmaṇo lokaḥ kintu tadbrahmeti brahma ca tallokaśceti karmadhārayaḥ siddho bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5702: yatkhalu puṇḍarīkasthamantaḥkaraṇaṃ tasminviśuddhe pratyāhṛtetarakaraṇānāṃ yogināṃ nirmala ivodake candramaso bimbamatisvacchaṃ caitanyaṃ jyotiḥsvarūpaṃ brahmāvalokyata iti //15//
GSP33brsvbh1u:5709: kutaḥ, asya dhāraṇalakṣaṇasya mahimno 'sminneveśvara eva śrutyantareṣūpalabdheḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5718: ye tvākāśaśabdo brahmaṇyapi mukhya eva nabhovadityācakṣate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5719: taiḥ 'anyāyaścānekārthatvam'iti ca 'ananyalabhyaḥ śabdārthaḥ'iti ca mīmāṃsakānāṃ mudrābhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5722: naca brahmaṇyeva mukhyo nabhasi tu tenaiva guṇayogena vartsyatīti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5724: nanu 'yāvanvā ayamākāśastāvāneṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśaḥ'iti vyatirekanirdeśānna lakṣaṇā yuktā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5725: nahi bhavati gaṅgāyāḥ kūlamiti vivakṣite gaṅgāyā gaṅgeti prayogaḥ tatkimidānīṃ 'paurṇamāsyāṃ paurṇamāsyā yajeta' 'amāvasyāyāmamāvāsyayā'ityasādhurvaidikaḥ prayogaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5727: yaccoktaṃyatra śabdārthapratītistatra lakṣaṇā'yatra punaranyārthe niścite śabdāprayogastatra vācakatvameveti, tadayuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5731: naca 'ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsīṃ yajate ya evaṃ vidvānamāvāsyām'ityatra paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdau na lākṣaṇikau /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5735: itaraparāmarśāt sa iti cen nāsaṃbhavāt | BBs_1,3.18 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:5737: samyak prasīdatyasmin jīvo viṣayendriyasaṃyogajanitaṃ kāluṣyaṃ jahātīti suṣuptiḥ saṃprasādo jīvasyāvasthābhedaḥ na brahmaṇaḥ tathā śarīrātsamutthānamapi śarīrāśrayasya jīvasya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5740: evaṃ vākyaśeṣagatābhyāmeva saṃprasādasamutthānābhyāṃ daharākāśo jīvaḥ kasmānnāvagamyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5743: saṃprasādasamutthanābhyāṃ hi jīvaparāmarśo na jīvaparaḥ, kintu tadīyatāttvikarūpabrahmabhāvaparaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5744: tathā caiṣa parāmarśo brahmaṇa eveti na saṃprasādasamutthāne jīvaliṅgam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5745: api tu brahmaṇa eva tādarthyādityagre vakṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5751: daharākāśameva prakṛtyopākhyāyate-yamātmānamanviṣya sarvāṃśca lokānāpnoti sarvāṃśca kāmān,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5752: tamātmānaṃ vividiṣantau surāsurarājavindravirocanau samitpāṇī prajāpatiṃ varivasitumājagmatuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5753: āgatya ca dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi tatparicaraṇaparau brahmacaryamūṣatuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5755: tāvūcatuḥ, ya ātmāpahatapāpmā tamāvāṃ vividiṣāva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5757: ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5764: yaśca svaṅgādau katama eteṣvasau atavaika eva sarveṣviti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5768: tadyadi vayaṃ bhrāntau stha iti brūmastataḥ svātmani samāropitapāṇḍityabahumānau vimānitau santau daurmanasyena yathāvadupadeśaṃ na gṛhṇīyātām,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5772: atha prajāpitiretau viparītagrāhiṇau mā bhūtāmityāśayavānpapraccha, kimatrāpaśyatāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5775: punaretayośchāyātmavibhramamapaninīṣuryathaiva hi chāyāpuruṣa upajanāpāyadharmābhedenāvagamyamāna ātmalakṣaṇavirahānnātmaivevamevedaṃ śarīraṃ nātmā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5777: sādhvalaṅkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtau bhūtvā punarudaśarāve paśyatamākmānaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5779: tau ca sādhvalaṅkṛtau suvasanau chinnanakhalomānau bhūtvā tathaiva cakratuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5781: tadupaśrutya prajāpatiraho batādyāpi na praśānta enayorvibhramaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5783: kālena kalmaṣe kṣīṇe 'smadvacanasaṃdarbhapaurvāparyalocanayātmatattvaṃ pratipatsyete svayameveti matvovāca,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5785: tayorvirocano dehānupātitvācchāyāyā deha evātmatattvamiti matvā nijasadanamāgatya tathaivāsurānupadideśa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5786_1: taṃ taṃ doṣaṃ paribhāvayan nāhamatra chāyātmadarśane bhogyaṃ paśyāmīti prajāpatisamīpaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5786_2: samitpāṇiḥ punarevevāyaṃ āgataśca prajāpatināgamanakāraṇaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ pathi paribhāvitaṃ jagāda /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5788: tatpunarapi tatprakṣayāyā carāparāṇi dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi brahmacaryaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5790: sa ca tathā caritabrahmacaryaḥ surendraḥ prajāpatimupasasāda /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5792: ya ātmāpahatapāpmādilakṣaṇo 'kṣaṇa darśitaḥ so 'yaṃ ya eṣa svapne mahīyamāno vanitādibhiranekadhā svapnopabhogān bhuñjāno virahatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5795_1: punaraparāṇi cara dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi svacchaṃ brahmacaryamidānīmapyakṣīṇakalmaṣo
GSP33brsvbh1u:5797: ya eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmādiguṇo darśito 'kṣiṇi ca svapne ca sa eṣa yo viṣayendriyasaṃyogavirahātprasannaḥ suṣuptāvasthāyāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5799: yathā hi jāgradvā svapnagato vāyamahamasmīti imāni bhūtāmani ceti vijānāti naivaṃ suṣuptaḥ kiñcidapi vedayate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5802: eva muktavati madhavati batādyāpi na te kalmaṣakṣayo 'bhūt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5805: caturthe ca paryāye pañca varṣāṇītyekottaraṃ śataṃ varṣāṇi brahmacaryaṃ carataḥ sahasrākṣasya saṃpedire /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5806: athāsmai brahmacaryasaṃpadunmṛditakalmaṣāya madhavate ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi yaśca svapne yaśca suṣupte anusyūta eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmādiguṇako darśitaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5807: tameva 'madhavan martyaṃ vai śarīram'ityādinā vispaṣṭaṃ vyācaṣṭe prajāpatiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5808: ayamasyābhisaṃdhiḥ-yāvatkiñcit sukhaṃ duḥkhamāgamāpāyi tatsarvaṃ śarīrendriyāntaḥkaraṇasaṃbandhi, na tvātmanaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5812: kevalamayaṃ nice caitanyānandaghane rūpe vyavasthitaḥ samastalokakāmān prāpto bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5813: etasyaiva hi paramānandasya mātrāḥ sarve kāmāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5817_0: 'evaṃ vyavasthita uttarādvākyasaṃdarbhātprājāpatyāt akṣiṇi ca svapne suṣupte ca caturtho
GSP33brsvbh1u:5822: jīvasya caitat sarvamiti sa evāpahatapāpmādiguṇaḥ śrutyokta iti nāpahatapāpmādibhiḥ paraṃ brahma gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5829: kintu vāgbuddhiśarīrārambhasaṃbhavo 'sya pāpmādiḥ śarīrādyabhāve na bhavati dhūma iva dhūmadhvajābhāva iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5831: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-paurvāparyālocanayā tāvadupaniṣadāṃ śuddhabuddhamuktamekamaprapañcaṃ brahma tadatiriktaṃ ca sarvaṃ tadvivarto rajjoriva bhujaṅga ityatra tātparyamavagamyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5832: tathāca jīvo 'pyavidyākalpitadehendriyādyupahitaṃ rūpaṃ brahmaṇo na tu svābhāvikaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5834: āvirbhūtabrahmarūpe tu nirupādhau saṃbhavanto brahmaṇa eva na jīvasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5835: evaṃ ca brahmaivāpahatāpāpmādiguṇaṃ śrutyuktamiti tadeva daharākāśo na jīva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5842: evaṃ dehendriyādyapyupajanāpāyadharmakaṃ nātmetyudaśarāvadṛṣṭāntena śarīrātmatāyā vyutthānaṃ bādha iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5844: dravyāntarasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ hi tenābhibhūtaṃ tasmādvivicyamānaṃ vyajyate hematārakādi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5848: te ca saṃsārāvasthāyāṃ bhāsanta iti kathaṃ jīvarūpaṃ na bhāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5858: tathāpi na sākṣājjapādikusumasaṃyogina ityetāvatā dṛṣṭāntitā iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5862: tadanena śravaṇamananadhyānābhyāsādvivekavijñānamuktvā tasya vivekavijñānasya phalaṃ kevalātmarūpasākṣātkāraḥ svarūpeṇābhiniṣpattiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5863: sa ca sākṣātkāro vṛttirūpaḥ prapañcamātraṃ pravilāpayan svayamapi prapañcarūpatvātkatakaphalavatpravilīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5866: atra copasaṃpattāvuttarakālāyāmapi ktvāprayogo mukhaṃ vyādāya svapitītīvanmantavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5869: tadā tatsaśarīrasyāpi saṃbhavati prārabdhakāryakarmakṣayasya purastādityāha-tathā vivekāvivekamātreṇeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5870: na kevalaṃ 'sa yoha vai tatparamaṃ brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati'ityādiśrutibhyo jīvasya paramātmano 'bhedaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5873: praticchāyātmavajjīvaṃ paramātmano vastuto bhinnamapyamṛtābhayātmatvena grāhayitvā paścātparamātmānamṛtābhayādimantaṃ prajāpatirgrāhyati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5874: na tvayaṃ jīvasya paramātmabhāvamācaṣṭe chāyātmana ivetyata āha-nāpi praticchāyātmāyamakṣilakṣita iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5877: kiñca dvitīyādiṣvapi paryāyeṣu 'etaṃ tveva te bhūyo 'nuvyākhyāyasyāmi'ityupakramātprathamaparyāyanirdiṣṭo na chāyāpuruṣaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5880: atha chāyāpuruṣa eva jīvaḥ kasmānna bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5881: tathāca chāyāpuruṣa evaitamiti parāmṛśyata ityata āha-kiñcāhamadya svapne hastinamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5882: kiñceti samuccayābhidhānaṃ pūrvopapattisāhityaṃ brūte, tacca śaṅkānirākaraṇadvāreṇa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5889: kena prakāreṇa na jānātītyata āha-ayamahamasmīmāni bhūtāni ceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5892: ya evāhaṃ jāgaritvā suptaḥ sa evaitarhi jāgarmīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5894: yadi hyetamityanenānantaroktaṃ cakṣuradhiṣṭhānaṃ puruṣaṃ parāmṛśya tasyātmatvamucyeta tato na bhavecchāyāpuruṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5902: kartā bhoktā ca vastuto bhavet, tatastadāśrayāḥ karmavidhaya uparudhyeran /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5905: na cābhede brahmaṇo jīvānāṃ brahmaguṇānāmasaṃbhavo jīveṣviti teṣāmabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5909: naca vastusato brahmaṇo guṇāḥ samāropiteṣu jīveṣu saṃbhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5910: no khalu vastusatyā rajjvā dharmāḥ sevyatvādayaḥ samāropite bhujaṅge saṃbhavinaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5913: avidyākalpitaṃ ca kartṛtvabhoktṛtvaṃ yathālokasiddhamupāśritya karmavidhayaḥ pravṛttāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5919: nanu brahmacedatra vaktavyaṃ kṛtaṃ jīvaparāmarśenetyuktamityata āha-
GSP33brsvbh1u:5923: na cāsau jīvamaparāmṛśya śakya upadeṣṭumiti tisṛṣvavasthāsu jīvaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5927: alpaśruter iti cet tad uktam | BBs_1,3.21 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:5936: 'balīyasā hi saureṇa tejasā mandaṃ tejaścandratārakādyabhibhūyamānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ, na tu tejaso 'nyena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5937: ye 'pi pidhāyakāḥ pradīpasya gṛhaghaṭādayo na te svabhāsā pradīpaṃ bhāsayitumīśate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5943: tasmādyadyapi 'yasmin dyauḥ pṛthivī cāntarikṣamotam'iti brahma prakṛtaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5946: tatra taṃ tasyeti ca sarvanāmapadāni pradarśanīyamevāvamrakṣyanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5949: tasmātpramāṇāntarāpratītamapi tejo 'ntaramalaukikaṃ śabdādupāsyatvena gamyata iti prāpte ucyate-'brahmaṇyeva hi talliṅgaṃ na tu tejasyalaukike /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5950: tasmānna tadupāsyatve brahma jñeyaṃ tu gamyate //
GSP33brsvbh1u:5952_0: kiṃvā 'bhārūpaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ'iti śrutyantaraprasiddhena brahmaṇo bhānena sūryādīnāṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5952_1: bhānamupapādyatāmiti viśaye na śrutasaṃbhave 'śrutasya kalpanā yujyata ityaprasiddhaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5958: tathā tadeva cākṣuṣaṃ tejo bāhyasauryāditejaḥāpyāyitaṃ rūpādi prakāśayati nānāpyāyitam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5960: nahi tejontarasya tejo 'ntarāpekṣāṃ vyāsedhāmaḥ, kintu tadbhānamanubhānam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5964: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadi svarūpasāmyābhāvamabhipretyānukāro nirākriyate, tadā vyabhāciraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5967: vanhyayaḥ piṇḍayostu yadyapi dahanakriyā na bhidyate tathāpi dravyabhedena kriyābhedaṃ kalpayitvā kriyāsādṛśyaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5968: tadevamanukṛteriti vibhajya tasya ceti sūtrāvayavaṃ vibhajate-tasya ceti caturthamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5973: brahmaṇi tu niḥśeṣajagadavabhāsake na sarvaśabdasya vṛttiḥ saṃkucatīti-tatraśabdamāharanniti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5975: 'tena raktaṃ rāgāt'ityādāvapi prakṛteḥ parasminpratyayer'thabhede 'nvākhyāyamāne prātipadikapratyarthasya pūrvavṛttatvamastīti teneti tatparāmarśānna vyabhāciraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5978: śrutistu liṅgādbalīyasīti śrautamiha brahmaiva gamyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5980: dṛṣṭārthatvādityāha-anantaraṃ ca hiraṇmaye pare kośa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5982: tatra kathaṃ tat jyotiṣāṃ jyotirityapekṣāyāmitadamupatiṣṭhate-na tatra sūrya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5985: ayamabhiprāyaḥ-'na tatra sūryo bhāti'iti neyaṃ satisaptamī,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5988: tena na tatra brahmaṇi prakāśayitavye sūryādayaḥ prakāśakatayā bhānti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5989: kintu brahmaiva sūryādiṣu prakāśayitavyeṣu prakāśakatvena bhāti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5990: tacca svayaṃprakāśam,agṛhyo nahi gṛhyata ityādiśrutibhya iti //22//
GSP33brsvbh1u:6009: taddhi tasyopalabdhisthānaṃ, śālagrāma iva kamalanābhasya bhagavataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6012: ātmaśabdo hyayaṃ svabhāvavacano vā jīvavacano vā brahmavacano vā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6013: tatra svabhāvasya svabhavitradhīnanirūpaṇatayā svasya ca bhavituranirdeśānna jñāyate kasya madhya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6014: naca jīvaparayorasti madhyamañjaseti naiṣa sthānanirdeśo vispaṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6021: api ca jīvātmanaḥ spaṣṭamaṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ smaryate-'aṅguṣṭhamātraṃ puruṣaṃ niśicakarṣa yamo balāt'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6022: nahi sarveśasya brahmaṇo yamena balānniṣkarṣaḥ kalpate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6023: yamo hi jagau-'hariguruvaśago 'smi na svatantraḥ prabhavati saṃyamane mamāpi viṣṇuḥ'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6024: tenāṅguṣṭhamātratvasya jīve niśchayādāpekṣikaṃ kiñcidbhūtabhavyaṃ prati jīvasyeśānatvaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6031: tadanantarasya saṃdarbhasya tatprativacanatociteti 'etadvai tat'iti brahmābhidhānaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6032: tathā cāṅguṣṭhamātratayā yadyapi jīve 'vagamyate tathāpi na tatparametadvākyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6036: tena yathā 'tattvamasi'iti vijñānātmanastvaṃpadārthasya taditi paramātmanaikatvaṃ pratipādyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6037: tathehāpyaṅguṣṭhaparimitasya vijñānātmana īśānaśrutyā brahmabhāvaḥ pratipādya iti yuktam //24//
GSP33brsvbh1u:6043: na cānyaḥ paramātmāna iha grahaṇamarhatīti na jīvaparametadvākyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6047: antaḥsaṃjñānāṃ mokṣamāṇānāṃ ca kāmyeṣu karmasvadhikāraṃ niṣedhati-śaktatvāditi tiryagdevarṣīṇāmaśaktānāmadhikāraṃ nivartayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6056: naca tajjīvamanabhidhāya śakyaṃ vaktumiti jīva ucyata ityarthaḥ //25//
GSP33brsvbh1u:6061: devarṣīṇāṃ brahmavijñānādhikāracintā samanvayalakṣaṇe 'saṃgatetyasyāḥ prāsaṅgikīṃ saṃgatiṃ darśayituṃ prasaṅgamāha-aṅguṣṭhamātraśrutiriti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6063: devādīnāṃ vividhavicitrānandabhogabhogināṃ vairāgyābhāvānnārthitvaṃ brahmavidyāyāmityata āha-tatrārthitvaṃ tāvanmokṣaviṣayamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6065: nanu devādīnāṃ vigrahādyabhāvendriyārthasaṃnikarṣajāyāḥ pramāṇādivṛtteranupapatteravidvattayā sāmarthyābhāvena nādhikāra ityata āha-tadā sāmarthyamiti teṣāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6068: na khalu vidhivat gurumukhādgṛhyamāṇo vedaḥ phalavatkarmabrahmāvabodhahetuḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6070: sa ca manuṣyāṇāmiha janmanīva devadīnāṃ prāci bhave vidhivadhīta āmnāya iha janmani smaryamāṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6071: ata eva svayaṃ pratibhāto vedaḥ saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6078: virodhaḥ karmaṇīti cen nānekapratipatter darśanāt | BBs_1,3.27 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:6080: mantrādipadasamanvayātpratīyamānor'thaḥ pramāṇāntarāvirodhe satyupeyaḥ na tu virodhe /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6083: tathāca vigrahādyabhāvācchabdopahitārthor'thopahito vā śabdo devatetyacetanatvānna tasyāḥ kvacidapyadhikāra iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6087: saiva kuta ityata āha-darśanātśrutiṣu smṛtiṣu ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6091: mā bhūdyāgādīnāmapi svargādisādhanatvamadṛṣṭamiti manuṣyaśarīrasya mātāpitṛsaṃyogajatvaniyamādasati pitroḥ saṃyoge kutaḥ saṃbhavaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6092: saṃbhave vānagnito 'pi dhūmaḥ syāditi bādhadarśanamiti cet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6093: hanta kiṃ śarīratvena hetunā devādiśarīramapi mātāpitṛsaṃyogajaṃ siṣādhayiṣasi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6097: bhūtavaśināṃ hi devādīnāṃ nānākāyacikīrṣāvaśādbhūtakriyotpattau bhūtānāṃ parasparasaṃyogena nānākāyamasutpādāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6098: dṛṣṭā ca vaśina icchāvaśādvaśye kriyā, yathā viṣavidyāvida icchāmātreṇa viṣaśakalapreraṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6102: na cāsmadādivatteṣāṃ śarīritvena vyavahitāviprakṛṣṭādidarśanāsaṃbhavo 'numīyata iti vācyam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6105: tena saṃnihitānāmapi na kratudeśe darśanaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6107: vaiśvadevaśastrasya hi nividi 'kati devāḥ'ityupakramya nividaivottaraṃ dattaṃ śākalyāya yājñavalkyena-trayaśca trī ca śatā trayaśca trī ca sahasreti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6109: etaduktaṃ bhavati-vaiśvadevasya nividi kati devāḥ śasyamānāḥ prasaṃkhyātā iti śākalyena pṛṣṭe yājñavalkyasyottaraṃ-'trayaśca trī ca śatā'ityādi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6110: yāvatsaṃkhyākā vaiśvadevanividi saṃkhyātā devāsta etāvanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6111: punaśca śākalyena 'katame te'iti saṃkhyeyeṣu pṛṣṭeṣu yājñavalkyasyottaram-mahimāna evaiṣāmete trayastriṃśattveva devā iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6112: aṣṭau vasava ekādaśa rudrā dvādaśādityā indraśca prajāpatiśceti trayastriṃśaddevāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6113: tatrāgniśca pṛthivī ca vāyuścāntarikṣaṃ cādityaśca dyauśca candramāśca nakṣatrāṇi ceti vasavaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6114: ete hi prāṇināṃ karmaphalāśrayeṇa kāryakāraṇasaṃghātarūpeṇa pariṇamanto jagadidaṃ sarvaṃ vāsayanti, tasmādvasavaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6115: katame rudrā iti daśeme puruṣe prāṇāḥ buddhikarmendriyāṇi daśa, ekādaśaṃ ca mana iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6117: te hi prāyaṇakāla utkrāmantaḥ puruṣaṃ rodayantīti rudrāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6118: katama ādityā iti dvādaśamāsāḥ saṃvatsarasyāvayavāḥ punaḥ punaḥ paruvartamānāḥ prāṇabhṛtāmāyūṃṣi ca karmaphalopabhogaṃ cādāpayantītyādityāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6124: yajñaḥ prajāpitiriti, yajñasādhanaṃ ca yajñarūpaṃ ca paśavaḥ prajāpatiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6125: eta eva trayastriṃśaddevāḥ ṣaṇṇāmagnipṛthivīvāyvantarikṣādityādivāṃ mahimāno na tato bhidyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6127: te tu ṣaḍagniṃ pṛthivīṃ caikīkṛtyāntarikṣaṃ vāyuṃ caikīkṛtya divaṃ cādityaṃ caikīkṛtya trayo lokāstraya eva devā bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6128: eta eva ca trayo 'nnaprāṇayorantarbhavanto 'nnaprāṇau dvau devau bhavataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6131: kathamayameka evādhyardhaḥ, yadasminsati sarvamidamadhyardhaṃ vṛddhiṃ prāpnoti tenādhyardha iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6132: katama eka iti, sa evādhyardhaḥ prāṇa eko brahma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6133: sarvadevātmatvena bṛhattvādbrahma tadeva syādityācakṣate parokṣābhidhāyakena śabdena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6138: aṇimā laghimā mahimā prāptiḥ prākāmyamīśitvaṃ vaśitvaṃ yatrakāmāvasāyitetyaiśvaryāṇi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6141: tadeva parisphuṭaṃ darśayituṃ vyatirekaṃ tāvadāha-kvacideka iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6142: na khalu bahuṣu śrāddheṣveko brāhmaṇo yugapadaṅgabhāvaṃ gantumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6144: yathaikaṃ brāhmaṇamuddiśya yugapannamaskāraḥ kriyate bahubhistathā svasthānasthitāmekāṃ devatāmuddiśya bahubhiryajamānairnānādeśāvasthitairyugapaddhavistyajyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6149: śabda iti cen nātaḥ prabhavāt pratyakṣānumānābhyām | BBs_1,3.28 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:6151: gotvādivatpūrvāvamarśābhāvādupādherapyekasyāpratīteḥ pācakādivadākāśadiśabdavadvyaktivacanā eva vasvādiśabdāḥ tasyāśca nityatvāttayā saha saṃbandho nityo bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6152: vigrahādiyoge tu sāvayavatvena vasvādīnāmanityatvāttataḥ pūrvaṃ vasvādiśabdo na svārthena saṃbaddha āsīt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6154: tataścotpanne vasvādau vasvādiśabdasaṃbandhaḥ prādurbhavandevadattādiśabdasaṃbandhavatpuruṣabuddhiprabhava iti tatpūrvako vākyārthapratyayo 'pi puruṣabuddhyadhīnaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6155: puruṣabuddhiśca mānāntarādhīnajanmeti mānāntarāpekṣayā prāmāṇyaṃ vedasya vyāhanyeteti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6158: vasutvādijātivācakācchabdāttajjātīyāṃ vyaktiṃ cikīrṣitāṃ buddhivāsikhya tasyāḥ prabhavanam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6160: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadyapi na śabda upādānakāraṇaṃ vasvādīnāṃ brahmopādānatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6167: tathāca tadeva pramāṇāntarāpekṣavākyatvādaprāmāṇyamāpatitamityata āha-utsargo 'pyayaṃ vācaḥ saṃpradāyapravartanātmaka iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6169: etaduktaṃ bhavati-svayaṃbhuvo vedakartṛtve 'pi na kālidāsādivatsvatantratvamapi tu pūrvasṛṣṭyanusāreṇa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6177: tatra na tāvadvasvādīnāṃ vakārādayo varṇā vācakāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6180: api caite pratyekaṃ vā vākyārthamabhidadhīran militā vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6185: teṣāmekavaktṛprayujyamānānāṃ rūpato vyaktito vā pratikṣaṇamapavargiṇāṃ mithaḥ sāhityasaṃbhavābhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6187: naca svarūpasāhityābhāve 'pi varṇānāmāgneyādīnāmiva saṃskāradvārakamasti sāhityamiti sāṃprataṃ, vikalpāsahatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6203: nahi yaiva vahnerdahanaśaktiḥ saiva tasya prakāśanaśaktiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6204: nāpi dahanaśakteḥ prakāśanaśaktiḥ apica vyutkrameṇoccaritebhyo varṇebhyaḥ saivāsti smṛtibījaṃ vāsanetyarthapratyayaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6215: na sphoṭa iti tu na mṛṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6220: na cāyamasati bādhake ekapadavākyānubhavaḥ śakyo mithyetivaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6222: upādhiḥ khalvekadhīgrāhyatā vā syāt, ekārthadhīhetutā vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6224: tathā sati dhavakhadirapalāśā iti na jātu syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6229_1: sa sphoṭa iti taṃ ca dhvanayaḥ pratyekaṃ vyañjayanto 'pi na drāgitveva viśadayanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6231_1: carame cetasi cakāsti viśadaṃ padavākyatattvamiti prāganutpannāyāstadanantaramarthadhiya
GSP33brsvbh1u:6239: arthadhiyastvapratyakṣāyā mānāntarajanmano vyakta evopajano na vā syānna punarasphuṭa iti na samaḥ samādhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6240: tasmānnityaḥ sphoṭa eva vācako na varṇā iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6241: tadetadācāryadeśīyamataṃ svamatamupapādayannapākaroti-varṇā eva tu na śabda iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6254: tatra kvacidvyabhicāradarśanena tadutprekṣāyāmucyate vṛddheḥ svataḥprāmāṇ.vādibhiḥ-'utprekṣeta hi yo mohādajñātamapi bādhanam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6258: na cedaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ gatvādijātiviṣayaṃ na gādivyaktiviṣayaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6259: tāsāṃ pratinaraṃ bhedopalambhādata eva śabdabhedopalambhādvaktṛbheda unnīyate 'somaśarmādhīte na viṣṇuśarmā'iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6261: yathā kālākṣīṃ ca svastimatīṃ cekṣamāṇasya vyaktibhedaprathāyāṃ satyāmeva tadanugatamekaṃ sāmānyaṃ prathate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6262: tathā kiṃ gakārādiṣu bhedena prathamāneṣveva gatvamekaṃ tadanugataṃ cakāsti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6263_1: mahadiva dīrghamiva vāmanamiva tathāgavyaktirājānata ekāpi vyañjakabhedāttadharmānupātinīva
GSP33brsvbh1u:6264: tatra gavyaktibhedamaṅgīkṛtyāpi yo gatvasyaikasya paropadhānabhedakalpanāprayāsaḥ sa varaṃ gavyaktāvevāstu kimantargaḍunā gatvenābhyupetena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6268: tathā sati daśa gakārānudacārayaccaitra iti hi pratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6270: na caiṣa jātyabhiprāyo 'bhyāso yathā śatakṛtvastittirīnupāyuṅkta devadatta iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6271: atra hi sorastāḍaṃ krandato 'pi gakārādivyaktau lokasyoccāraṇābhyāsapratyayasya vinirvṛttiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6277: na codāttādayo vyañjakadharmāḥ, na varṇadharmā iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6282: mā bhūvan ghrāṇarasanaśrotrāṇāṃ gandharasaśabdagocarāṇāṃ tadvantaḥ pṛthivyudakākāśā gocarāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6283: evaṃ ca mā nāma bhūdvāyugocaraṃ śrotram, tadguṇāṃstūdāttādīn gocarayiṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6285: naca śabdasya pratyabhijñānāvadhṛtaikatvasya svarūpata udāttādayo dharmāḥ parasparavirodhino 'paryāyeṇa saṃbhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6288: na tu bhāviko nānādharmasaṃsarga iti sthite 'bhyupetya parihāramāha bhāṣyakāraḥ-athavā dhvanikṛta iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6293: na cāyamanirdhāritaviśeṣavarṇatvasāmānyamātrapratyayo na tu varṇātiriktadabhivyañjakadhvanipratyaya iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6298_0: śabdavyañjakaḥ śrāvaṇo 'bhyupeyaḥ ubhayathāpi cākṣu vyañjaneṣu ca tattaddhvanibhedopadhānenānunāsikatvādayo
GSP33brsvbh1u:6298_1: 'vagamyamānāstaddharmā eva śabde pratīyante na tu svataḥ śabdasya dharmāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6299: tathā ca yeṣāmanunāsikatvādayo dharmāḥ parasparaviruddhā bhāsante bhavatu teṣāṃ dhvanīnāmanityatā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6301: yeṣu tu varṇeṣu pratyabhijñānaṃ na teṣāmanunāsikatvādayo dharmā iti nānityāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6303: yadyeṣa parasyāgraho dharmiṇyagṛhyamāṇe taddharmā na śakyā grahītumiti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6306: tadanena prabandhena kṣaṇikatvena varṇānāmaśakyasaṃgatigrahatayā yadavācakatvamāpāditaṃ varṇānāṃ tadapākṛtam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6314: yadi gakārādivilakṣaṇamavabhāsayet, gakārādirūṣitaḥ pratyayo na syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6318: evaṃ ca kalpitā evāsya bhāgā varṇā iti cet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6321: hantāsyāṃ nānā varṇāḥ prathanta iti nānātvāvabhāsa ekaikatvaṃ kasmānna bādhate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6323: no khalu senāvanabuddhī gajapadātituragādīnāṃ campakāśokakiṃśukādīnāṃ ca bhedamapabādhamāne udīyete,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6332: na caikasmṛtisamārohiṇāṃ kramākramaviparītakramaprayuktānāmabhedo varṇānāmiti yathākathañcitprayuktebhya etebhyor'thapratyayaprasaṅga iti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6333: uktaṃ hi-'yāvanto yādṛśā ye ca padārthapratipādane /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6336: nanu paṅktibuddhāvekasyāmakramāyāmapi vāstavī śālādīnāmasti paṅgiriti tathaiva prathā yuktā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6337: naca tatheha varṇānāṃ nityānāṃ vibhūnāṃ cāsti vāstavaḥ kramaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6342: tathāhi-jārārājeti padayoḥ prathayantyoḥ smṛtidhiyostattve 'pi varṇānāṃ kramabhedātpadabhedaḥ sphuṭataraṃ cakāsti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6350: santvanityā eva varṇāstathāpi gatvādyavacchedenaiva saṃgatigraho 'nādiśca vyavahāraḥ setsyatītyāha-athāpi nāmeti //28//
GSP33brsvbh1u:6355: nanu prācyāmeva mīmāṃsāyāṃ vedasya nityatvaṃ siddhaṃ tatkiṃ punaḥ sādhyata ityata āha-svatantrasya karturasmaraṇādeva hi sthite vedasya nityatva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6357: tasmānnityo vedaḥ jagadutpattihetutvāt, īśvaravaditi siddhameva nityatvamanena dṛḍhīkṛtam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6366: niranvayasya tu jagataḥ pravilaye 'tyantāsataścāpūrvasyotpāde 'bhidhānābhidheyāvatyantamucchinnāviti kimāśrayaḥ saṃbandhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6369: antaḥkaraṇādyupādhikalpitā hi te tadvicchede na sthātumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6370: naca brahmaṇastadvāsanā, tasya vidyātmanaḥ śuddhasvabhāvasya tadayogāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6371: brahmaṇaśca sṛṣṭyādāvantaḥkaraṇāni tadavacchinnāścha jīvāḥ prādurbhavanto napūrvakarmāvidyāvāsanāvanto bhavitumarhanti, apūrvatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6375_0: yadyapi mahāpralayasamaye nāntaḥkaraṇādayaḥ samudācaradvṛttayaḥ santi tathāpi svakāraṇe
GSP33brsvbh1u:6375_1: 'nirvācyāyāmavidyāyāṃ līnāḥ sūkṣmeṇa śaktirūpeṇa karmavikṣepakāvidyāvāsanābhiḥ sahāvatiṣṭhanta eva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6379: te cāvadhiṃ prāpya parameśvarecchāpracoditā yathā kūrmadehe nilīnānyaṅgāni tato niḥsaranti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6380: yathā vā varṣāpāye prāptamṛdbhāvāni maṇḍūkaśarīrāṇi tadvāsanāvāsitatayā ghanaghanāghanāsārāvasekasuhitāni punarmaṇḍūkadehabhāvamanubhavanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6384: naca sargapralayapravāhasyānāditāmantareṇaitadupapadyata iti sargapralayābhyayupagame 'pi saṃsārānāditā na virudhyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6389: tathāpi mahāpralayāntarite kutaḥ smaraṇaṃ vedānāmityata āha-anādau ca saṃsāre yathā svāpaprabodhayoriti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6391: tathāpi karmavikṣepasaṃskārasahitalayalakṣaṇā vidyāvaśeṣatāsāmyena svāpapralayāvasthayorabheda iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6395: prāyaṇakālaviprakarṣayośca vāsanocchedakāraṇayorabhāvena satyāṃ vāsanāyāṃ smaraṇopapatteḥ śabdārthasaṃbandhavedavyahārānucchedo yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6397: prāyaṇakālaviprakarṣau ca tatra saṃskāramātrocchedahetū sta iti kutaḥ suṣuptavatpūrvaprabodhavyavahāravaduttaraprabodhavyavahāra iti codayati-syādetat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6405: tatra kaiva kathā parameśvarānugraheṇa dharmajñānavairāgyaiśvaryātiśayasaṃpannānāṃ hiraṇyagarbhaprabhṛtīnāṃ mahādhiyām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6406: yathāvā ā ca manuṣyebhya ā ca kṛmibhyo jñānādīnāmanubhūyate nikarṣaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6407: evamā manuṣyebhya eva ā ca bhagavato hiraṇyagarbhajjñānādīnāṃ prakarṣe 'pi saṃbhāvyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6419: tathāca pūrvavyavahārocchedācchabdārthasaṃbandhaśca vedaścānityau prasajyeyātāmityata āha-prāṇināṃ ca sukhaprāptaya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6420: yathāvastusvabhāvasāmarthyaṃ hi sargaḥ pravartate, natu svabhāvasāmarthyamanyathayitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6421: nahi jātu sukhaṃ tattvena jihāsyate, duḥkhaṃ copāditsyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6424: tathā sati vastusāmarthyaniyamābhāvātsarvaṃ sarvasmādbhavediti pipāsurapi dahanamāhṛtya pipāsāmupaśamayet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6427: evaṃ ya eva vedā asminkalpe ta eva kalpāntare, ta eva caiṣāmarthā ta eva ca varṇāśramāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6440: kiṃ sarvāsu brahmavidyā svaviśeṣeṇa sarveṣāṃ kiṃvā kāsucideva keṣāñcit /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6443: asau vā ādityo devamadhvityatra hi manuṣyā ādityaṃ madhvadhyāsenopāsīran /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6444: upāsyopāsakabhāvo hi bhedādhiṣṭhāno na svātmanyādityasya devatāyāḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6448: ayamarthaḥ-'asau vā ādityo devamadhu'iti devānāṃ modahetutvānmadhviva madhu /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6453_0: yathā hi bhramarāḥ puṣpebhya āhṛtya makarandaṃ svasthānamānayantyevamṛṅmantrabhramarāḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:6455_1: āhṛtyāgnau hutaṃ somādi pūrvavadamṛtabhāvamāpannaṃ yajurvedamantrabhramarā ādityamaṇḍalamānayanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6457_1: āhṛtyāgnau hutaṃ somādi pūrvavadamṛtabhāvamāpannaṃ sāmamantrastotrabhramarā ādityamaṇḍalamānayanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6459: athāsyādityamadhuna udīcibhiratikṛṣṇābhī raśmināḍībhirathavedavihitebhyaḥ karmakusumebhya āhṛtyāgnau hutaṃ somādi pūrvavadamṛtabhāvamāpannamatharvāṅgirasamantrabhramarāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6461: aśvamedhe vācaḥstome ca pāriplavaṃ śaṃsanti iti śravaṇāditihāsapurāṇamantrāṇāmapyasti prayogaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6463: athāsya yā ādityamadhuna ūrdhvā raśmināḍyo gopyāstābhirupāsanabhramarāḥ praṇavakusumādāhṛtyādityamaṇḍalamānayanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6465: tā etā ādityavyapāśrayāḥ pañca rohitādayo raśmināḍya ṛgādisaṃbaddhāḥ krameṇopadiśyeti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6466: etadevāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvopalabhya yathāsvaṃ samastaiḥ karaṇairyaśastejaindriyasākalyavīryānnādyānyamṛtaṃ tadupalabhyāditye tṛpyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6467: tena khalvamṛtena devānāṃ vasvādīnāṃ modanaṃ vidadhadādityo madhu /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6472: ākāśasya hi sarvagatatvaṃ rūpādihīnatve ca brahmaṇā sārūpyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6473: tasya caitasyākāśasya brahmaṇaścatvāraḥ pādā agnyādayaḥ 'agniḥ pādaḥ'ityādinā darśitāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6474: yathā hi goḥ pādā na gavā viyujyanta, evamagnyādayo 'pi nākāśena sarvagatenetyākāśasya pādāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6475: tadevamākāśasya catuṣpado brahmadṛṣṭiṃ vidhāya svarūpeṇa vāyuṃ saṃvargaguṇakamupāsyaṃ vidhātuṃ mahīkaroti-vāyurvāva saṃvargaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6476: tathā svarūpeṇaivādityaṃ brahmadṛṣṭyopāsyaṃ vidhātuṃ mahikaroti-ādityo brahmetyādeśaḥupadeśaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6480: yadyucyeta nāviśeṣaṇa sarveṣāṃ devarṣīṇāṃ sarvāsu brahmavidyāsvadhikāraḥ, kintu yathāsaṃbhavamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6492: indro vṛtrāṇi jighnate'iti vigrahavattvaṃ devatāyā mantrārthavādā abhivadanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6493: tathā havirbhojanaṃ devatāyā darśayanti 'addhīndra piba caprasthitasya'ityādayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6494: tatheśanam-'indro diva indra īśe pṛthivyā indro apāmindra itparvatānām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6495: indro vṛdhāmindra inmedhirāṇāmindraḥ kṣeme yoge havya indraḥ'iti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6497: tathā varivasitāraṃ prati devatāyāḥ prasādaṃ prasannāyāśca phaladānāṃ darśayati-'āhutibhireva devān hutādaḥ prīṇāti tasmai prītā iṣamūrjaṃ ca yacchanti'iti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6501: laukikā api devatāvigrahādipañcakaṃ smaranti coparacaranti ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6502: tathāhi-yamaṃ daṇḍahastamālikhanti, ruṇaṃ pāśahastam, indraṃ vajrahastam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6505: tathāsyāḥ prasādaṃ ca prasannāyāśca phaladānamāhuḥ-prasanno 'sya paśupatiḥ putro 'sya jātaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6513: na cetihāsādi mūlaṃ bhavitumarhati, tasyāpi pauriṣeyatvena pratyakṣādyapekṣaṇāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6515: nanūktaṃ mantrārthavādebhyo vigrahādipañcakaprasiddhiriti, ata āha-arthavādā apīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6516: vidhyuddeśenaikavākyatāmāpadyamānā arthavādā vidhiviṣayaprāśastyalakṣaṇāparā na svārthe pramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6521: yatra tu na pramāṇāntaramasti, yathā vigrahādipañcake, sor'thaḥ śabdādevāvagantavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6524: na caikaṃ vākyamubhayaparaṃ bhavatīti vākyaṃ bhidyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6527_1: kathamupayujyantāṃ teṣa teṣu karmasvityapekṣāyāṃ dṛṣṭe prakāre saṃbhavati nādṛṣṭakalpanocitā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6528: dṛṣṭaśca prakāraḥ prayogasamavetārthasmāraṇaṃ, smṛtyā cānutiṣṭhanti khalvanuṣṭhātāraḥ padārthān /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6529: autsargikī cārthaparatā padānāmityapekṣitaprayogasamavetārthasmaraṇatātparyāṇāṃ mantrāṇāṃ nānadhigate vigrahādāvapi tātparyaṃ yujyata iti na tebhyo 'pi tatsiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6545: nahi śvitrinirṇejanaparaṃ śveto dhāvatīti vākyamitaḥ sārameyagamanaṃ gamayitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6549: nahyudakāharaṇārthinā ghaṭadarśanāyonmīlitaṃ cakṣurghaṭapaṭau vā paṭaṃ vā kevalaṃ nopalabhate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6550: tadevamekadeśini pūrvapakṣiṇā dūṣite paramasiddhāntavādyāha-atrocyate viṣama upanyāsa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6551: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-loke viśiṣṭārthapratyāyanāya padāni prayuktāni tadantareṇa na svārthamātrasmāraṇe paryavasyanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6552: nahi svārthasmāraṇamātrāya loke padānāṃ prayogo dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6554: na caitānyasmāritasvārthāni sākṣādvākyārthaṃ pratyāyayitumīśate iti svārthasmāraṇaṃ vākyārthamitaye 'vāntaravyāpāraḥ kalpitaḥ padānām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6555: naca yadarthaṃ yattattena vinā paryavasyatīti na svārthamātrabhidhāne paryavasānaṃ padānām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6564_0: yatra tu vākyasyaikasya vākyāntareṇa saṃbandhastatra lokānusārato bhūtārthavyutpattau
GSP33brsvbh1u:6565: yathā 'vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vāyumeva svena bhāgadheyenopadhāvati sa evainaṃ bhūtiṃ gamayati vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta'ityatra /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6566: iha hi yadi na svādhyāyādhyāyanavidhiḥ svādhyāyaśabdavācyaṃ vedarāśiṃ puruṣārthatāmaneṣyattato bhūtārthamātraparyavasitā nārthavādā vidhyuddeśenaikavākyatāmāgamiṣyan /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6567: tasmāt svādhyāyavidhivaśātkaimarthyākāṅkṣāyāṃ vṛttāntādigocarāḥ santastatpratyāyanadvāreṇa vidheyaprāśastyaṃ lakṣayanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6571: ata eva gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra gaṅgāśabdaḥ svārthasaṃbaddhabheva tīraṃ lakṣayati na tu samudratīraṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6575: ata eva yatra pramāṇāntaraviruddhārtā arthavādā dṛśyante,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6580: tasmādyatra sor'thorthavādānāṃ pramāṇāntaraviruddhastatra guṇavādena prāśastyalakṣaṇeti lakṣitalakṣaṇā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6581: yatra tu pramāṇāntarasaṃvādastatra pramāṇāntarādivārthavādādapi sor'thaḥ prasidhyati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6584: pramātā hyavyutpannaḥ prathamaṃ yathā pratyakṣādibhyor'thamavagacchati na tathāmnāyataḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6591: atrocyate-lokānusārato dvividho hi viṣayaḥ śabdānām, dvārataśca tātparyataśca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6592: yathaikasminvākye padānāṃ padārthā dvārato vākyārthaśca tātparyato viṣayaḥ evaṃ vākyadvayaikavākyatāyāmapi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6597: yathā viṣaṃ bhakṣayeti vākyaṃ mā asya gṛhe bhuṅkṣveti vākyāntarārthaparaṃ sat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6598: yatra tu tātparyaṃ tatra mānāntaravirodhe pauruṣeyapramāṇameva bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6600: na ca 'ādityo vai yūpaḥ'iti vākyamādityasya yūpatvapratipādanaparamapi tu yūpastutiparam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6604: tatra dvārato 'pi viṣayaḥ pratīyamāno na śakyastyaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6605: naca guṇavādena netuṃ, ko hi mukhye saṃbhavati gauṇamāśrayedatiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6606: tathā satyanadhigataṃ vigrahādi pratipādayat vākyaṃ bhidyeteti cet addhā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6611: naca yasya yatra na tātparyaṃ tasya tatrāprāmāṇyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6613: sati viśiṣṭaparaṃ vākyaṃ viśeṣaṇeṣvapramāṇamiti viśiṣṭaparamapi na syāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6617: tasmādviśiṣṭapratyayaparebhyo 'pi viśeṣaṇāni pratīyamānāni tasyaiva vākyasya viṣayatvenānicchatāpyabhyupeyāni yathā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6618: tadyānyaparebhyo 'pyarthavādavākyebhyo devatāvigrahādayaḥ pratīyamānā asati pramāṇāntaravirodhe na yuktāstyaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6623: tātparyaikye 'pi yadi vākyabhedaḥ, kathaṃ tarhyarthaikatvādekaṃ vākyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6626: sa tu padārthāntaraviśiṣṭaḥ padārtha ekaḥ kvacid dvārabhūtaḥ kvacid dvārītyetāvān viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6627: nanvevaṃ sati odanaṃ bhuktvā grāmaṃ gacchatītyatrāpi vākyabhedaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6628: anyo hi saṃsargaḥ odanaṃ bhuktveti, anyastu grāmaṃ gacchatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6631: bhuktveti hi samānakartṛkatā pūrvakālatā ca pratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6633: tasmādyāvati padasamūhe padāhitāḥ padārthasmṛtayaḥ paryavasanti tāvadekaṃ vākyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6634: arthavādavākye caitāḥ paryavasyanti vinaiva vidhivākyaṃ viśiṣṭārthapratīteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6635: na ca dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ padābhyāṃ viśiṣṭārthapratyayaparyavasānāt pañcaṣaṭpadavati vākye ekasminnānātvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6639: tasmādvidhivākyādarthavādavākyamanyaditi vākyayoreva svasvavākyārthapratyayāvasitavyāpārayoḥ paścātkutaścidapekṣāyāṃ parasparānvaya iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6641: devatāmuddiśya haviravamṛśya ca tadviṣayasvatvatyāga iti yāgaśarīram /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6643: naca rūparahitā cetasi śakyata ālekhitumiti yāgavidhinaiva tadrūpāpekṣiṇā yādṛśamanyaparebhyo 'pi mantrārthavādebhyastadrūpamavagataṃ tadabhyupeyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6646_0: yathā hi 'vrātyo vrātyastomena yajate'iti vrātyasvarūpāpekṣāyāṃ yasya pitā pitāmaho
GSP33brsvbh1u:6646_1: vā somaṃ na pibet sa vrātya iti vrātyasvarūpamavagataṃ vrātyastomavidhyapekṣitaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:6648: iti vidhināpekṣitaṃ sadarthavādato 'vagamyamānaṃ vidhipramāṇakam, tathā devatārūpamapi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6650: devatāyāḥ samāropeṇāpi ca rūpajñānamupapadyata iti samāropitameva rūpaṃ devatāyā mantrārthavādairucyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6653: tasya tu rūpasyāsati bādhake 'nubhavārūḍhaṃ tathābhāvaṃ parityajyānyathātvamananubhūyamānamasāṃprataṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6661: api tu itihāsapurāṇalokasmaraṇebhyo mantrārthavādamūlebhyo vā pratyakṣādamūlebhyo vetyāha-itihāseti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6664: tadevaṃ mantrārthavādādisiddhe devatāvigrahādau gurvādipūjāvaddevatāpūjātmako yāgo devatāprasādādidvāreṇa saphalo 'vakalpate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6666: na caivaṃ yajñakarmaṇo devatāṃ prati guṇabhāvāddevatātaḥ phalotpāde yāgabhāvanāyāḥ śrutaṃ phalavattvaṃ yāgasya ca tāṃ prati tatphalāṃśaṃ vā prati śrutaṃ karaṇatvaṃ hātavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6670: tasmātkarmaṇo 'pūrvāvāntaravyāpārasya vā devatāprasādāvāntaravyāpārasya vā phalavattvāt pradhānatvamubhayasminnapi pakṣe samānaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6671: natu devatāyā vigrahādimatyāḥ prādhānyamiti na dharmamīmāṃsāyāḥ sūtram-'api vā śabdapūrvatvādyajñakarma pradhānaṃ guṇatve devatāśrutiḥ'iti virudhyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6675: śugasya tadanādaraśravaṇāt tadādravaṇāt sūcyate hi | BBs_1,3.34 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:6679: nirmṛṣṭanikhiladuḥkhānuṣaṅge śāśvatika ānande kasya nāma cetanasyārthitā nāsti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6682: dvividhaṃ hi sāmarthyaṃ nijaṃ cāgantukaṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6690: naca tathā brahmavidyāyāmalaukikamasti sādhanaṃ yacchūdrasya na syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6694: tadadhyayanaṃ puruṣārthe vā niyamyet, yathā dhanārjane pratigrahādi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6702: nahi yathā juhvādi avyabhicāritakratusaṃbaddhamevaṃ svādhyāya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6705: puruṣecchādhīnapravṛttirhi puruṣārtho bhavati, yathā phalaṃ tadupāyo vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6706: tadupāye 'pi hi vidhitaḥ prāk sāmānyarūpā pravṛttiḥ puruṣecchānibandhanaiva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6710: kraturiti hi vidhiviṣayeṇa vidhiṃ parāmṛśati viṣayiṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6712: na cādhyayanaṃ vā svādhyāyo vā tadarthajñānaṃ vā prāgvidheḥ puruṣecchādhīnapravṛttiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6717: tathā cādhyayanavidheraniyāmakatvācchūdrasyādhyayanena vā pustakādipāṭhena vā sāmarthyamastīti so 'pi brahmavidyāyāmadhikriyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6718: mā bhūdvādhyayanābhāvātsarvatra brahmavidyāyāmadhikāraḥ, saṃvargavidyāyāṃ tu bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6719: 'aha hāretvā śūdra'iti śūdraṃ saṃbodhya tasyāḥ pravṛtteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6722: tasmādyathānadhīyānasyeṣṭau niṣādasthapateradhikāro vacanasāmarthyādevaṃ saṃvargavidyāyāṃ śūdrasyādhikāro bhaviṣyatīti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6728: suvarṇaṃ bhāryamitivadārthavādikaṃ vā phalaṃ kalpayitvā viniyogabhaṅgena svādhyāyenādhīyītetyevamarthaḥ kalpatāṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6730: na dṛṣṭadvāreṇa paramparayāpyanyato 'pekṣitapratilambhe ca yathāśrutiviniyogopapattau ca saṃbhavantyāṃ śrutiviniyogabhaṅgenādhyayanādevāśrutādṛṣṭaphalakalpanocitā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6734: natu suvarṇadhāraṇādau dṛṣṭadvāreṇa kiñcit paramparayāpyastyapekṣitaṃ puruṣasya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6736_1: iti sthāpitaṃ tadā yasyādhyayanaṃ tasyaiva karmabrahmāvabodho 'bhyudayaniḥśreyasaprayojano nānyasya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6738_1: śūdrāṇāṃ na phalāya kalpata iti śāstrīyasāmarthyābhāvānna śūdro brahmavidyāyāmadhikriyata iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6750: sa cānyataḥ siddhamarthavadyotayati na tu prāpayatītyadhvaramīmāṃsakāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6751: asmākaṃ tu anyaparādapi vākyādasati bādhake pramāṇāntareṇārthāvagamyamāno vidhinā cāpekṣitaḥ svīkriyata eva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6754: vidhyuddeśagatatve tvayaṃ nyāyo 'podyate vacanabalānniṣādasthapativanna tveṣa vidhyuddeśagata ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6756: apica kimarthavādabalādvidyāmātre 'dhikāraḥ śūdrasya kalpate saṃvargavidyāyāṃ vā na tāvadvidyāmātra ityāha-kāmaṃ cāyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6758: astu tarhi saṃvargavidyāyāmeva śūdrasyādhikāra ityata āha-arthavādasthatvāditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6761: tulyaṃ hi sāṃpradāyikamityata āha-śakyate cāyaṃ śūdraśabda iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6762: evaṃ kilātropākhyāyate-jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇo bahudāyī śraddhādeyo bahupākyaḥ priyātithirbabhūva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6763: sa ca teṣu teṣu grāmanagaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu vividhānāmannapānānāṃ pūrṇānatithibhya āvasathān kārayāmāsa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6765: athāsya rājño dānaśauṇḍasya guṇagarimasaṃtoṣitāḥ santo devarṣayo haṃsarūpamāsthāya tadanugrahāya tasya nidādhasamaye doṣā harmyatalasthasyopari mālāmābadhyājagmuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6766: teṣāmagresaraṃ haṃsaṃ saṃbodhya pṛṣṭhataḥ patannekatamo haṃsaḥ sādbhutamabhyuvāda /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6768: jānaśruterasya pautrāyaṇasya dyuniśaṃ dyuloka āyataṃ jyotistanmā prasāṅkṣīrmaitattvā dhākṣīditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6774: yasmādayaṃ varākastasmātkamenaṃ kiṃbhūtametaṃ santaṃ prāṇimātraṃ raikvamiva sayugvānamāttha /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6775: yugvā gantrī śakaṭī tayā saha vartatā iti sa yugvā raikvastamiva kamenaṃ prāṇimātraṃ jānaśrutimāttha /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6777_0: tasya hi bhagavataḥ puṇyajñānasaṃbhārasaṃbhṛtasya raikvasya brahmavido dharme trailokyodaravartiprāṇabhṛnmātradharmo
GSP33brsvbh1u:6778_1: jānaśrutiḥ kitava ivākṣaparājitaḥ paunaḥpunyena niḥśvasannudvelaṃ kathaṃ kathamapi
GSP33brsvbh1u:6779: tato niśāvasānapiśunamanibhṛtavandāruvṛndaprārabdhastutisahasrasaṃvalitaṃ maṅgalatūryanirghoṣamākarṇya talpatalastha eva rājā ekapade yantāramāhūyādideśa,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6781: raikvāhvayaṃ brahmavidamekaratiṃ sayugvānamativivikteṣu teṣu teṣu vepinanaganikuñjanadīpulinādipradeśeṣvanviṣya prayatnato 'smabhyamācakṣveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6782: sa ca tatra tatrānviṣyan kvacidativivekte deśe śakaṭasyādhastāt pāmānaṃ kaṇḍūyamānaṃ brāhmaṇāyanamadrākṣīt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6783: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā raikvo 'yaṃ bhaviteti pratibhāvānupaviśya savinayamaprākṣīt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6786: tasya ca raikvabhāvānumatiṃ ca taistairiṅgitairgārhasthyecchāṃ dhanāyāṃ connīya yantā rājñe nivedayāmāsa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6787: rājā tu taṃ niśamya gavāṃ ṣaṭśatāni niṣkaṃ ca hāraṃ cāśvatarīrathaṃ cādāya satvaraṃ raikvaṃ praticakrame /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6793: tamevamuktavantaṃ prati sāṭopaṃ ca saspṛhaṃ covāca raikvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6794: aha hāretvā śūdra, tavaiva saha gobhirastviti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6796: hāreṇa yuktā itvā gantrī ratho hāretvā sa gobhiḥ saha tavaivāstu,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6797: kimetanmātreṇa mama dhanenākalpavartino gārhasthyasya nirvāhānupayogineti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6798: āharetveti tu pāṭhonarthakatayā ca gobhiḥ sahetyatra pratisaṃbandhyanupādānena cācāryairdūṣitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6799: tadasyāmākhyāyikāyāṃ śakyaḥ śūdraśabdena jānaśrutī rājanyo 'pyavayavavyutpattyā vaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6800: sa hi raikvaḥ parokṣajñatāṃ cikhyāpayiṣurātmano jānaśruteḥ śūdreti śucaṃ sūcayāmāsa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6801: kathaṃ punaḥ śūdraśabdena śugutpannā sūcyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6808: tasmāttadādravaṇāditi tacchabdena śugvā jānaśrutirvā raikvo vā parāmṛśyata ityuktam //34//
GSP33brsvbh1u:6813_0: itaśca na jātiśūdro jānaśrutiḥ yatkāraṇaṃprakaraṇanirūpaṇe kriyamāṇe kṣatriyatvamasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:6813_1: jānaśruteravagamyate caitrarathena liṅgāditi vyācakṣāṇaḥ prakaraṇaṃ nirūpayati-uttaratra
GSP33brsvbh1u:6814: caitrarathenābhipratāriṇā niścitakṣatriyatvena samānāyāṃ saṃvargavidyāyāṃ samabhivyāhārālliṅgātsaṃdigdhakṣatriyabhāvo jānaśrutiḥ kṣatriyo niścīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6815: 'atha ha śaunakaṃ ca kāpeyamabhipratāriṇaṃ ca kākṣaseniṃ sūdena pariviṣyamāṇau brahmacārī bibhikṣe'iti prasiddhayājakatvena kāpeyenābhipratāriṇo yogaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6822: etena vai citrarathaṃ kāpeyā ayājayannitichandogānāṃ dvirātre śrūyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6824: eṣa cābhipratāri citrarathādanyaḥ sanneva kāpeyānāṃ yājyo bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6825: yadi caitrarathiḥ syāt samānānvayānāṃ hi prāyeṇa samānānvayā yājakā bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6829: kṣattṛpreṣaṇe cārthasaṃbhave ca tādṛśasya vadānyapraṣṭhasyaiśvaryaṃ prāyeṇa kṣatriyasya dṛṣṭaṃ yudhiṣṭhirādivaditi //35//
GSP33brsvbh1u:6834: na kevalamupanītādhyayanavidhiparāmarśena na śūdrasyādhikāraḥ kintu teṣu teṣu vidyopadeśeṣūpanayanasaṃskāraparāmarśāt śūdrasya tadabhāvābhidhānādbrahmavidyāyāmanadhikāra iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6838: tacca dvijātīnāmiti dvijātaya eva niṣiddhopanayanā adhikriyante na śūdra iti //36//
GSP33brsvbh1u:6843: satyakāmo ha vai jābālaḥ pramītapitṛkaḥ svāṃ mātaraṃ jabālāṃ papraccha,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6850: sa hovāca, nāvijñātagotra upanīyata iti kiṅgotro 'sīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6851: athovāca satyakāmo nāhaṃ veda svaṃ gotraṃ, svāṃ mātaraṃ jabālāmapṛcchaṃ, sāpi na vedeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6854: tenāsminna śūdratvasaṃbhāvanāstīti tvāṃ dvijātijanmānamupaneṣya ityupanetamanuśāsituṃ ca jābālaṃ gautamaḥ pravṛttaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6868: prāṇavajraśrutibalādvākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ ca bhaṅktvā vāyuḥ pañcavṛttirādhyātmiko bāhyaścātra pratipādyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6871: vāyureva hi bāhyo dhūmajyotiḥsalilasaṃvalitaḥ parjanyabhāvena pariṇato vidyutstanayitnuvṛṣṭyaśanibhāvena vivartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6872: yadyapi ca sarvaṃ jagaditi savāyukaṃ pratīyate tathāpi sarvaśabda āpekṣiko 'pi na svābhidheyaṃ jahāti kintu saṃkucadvṛttirbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6875: amṛtaśabdo 'pi maraṇābhāvavacano na sārvakālikaṃ tadabhāvaṃ brūte, jyotirjīvitayāpi tadupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6879: savāyukasya jagataḥ kampanāt, paramātmaiva śabdātpramita iti maṇḍūkaplutyānuṣajjate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6880: brahmaṇohi bibhyadetajjagatkṛtsnaṃ svavyāpāre niyamena pravartate na tu maryādāmativartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6887: yatkhalu pṛṣṭaṃ tadeva pradhānaṃ prativaktavyamiti tasya prakaraṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6890: 'apapunarmṛtyuṃ jayati'iti śrutyā hyapamṛtyorvijaya ukto natu paramamṛtyuvijaya ityāpekṣikatvaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6892: na kevalamapaśrutyā tadāpekṣikamapi tu paramātmānamabhidhāya 'ato 'nyadārtam'iti vāyvāderārtatvābhidhānāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6906: ādityaścārcirādyapekṣayā paraṃ jyotirbhavatīti tadupasaṃpadya tasya samīpe bhūtvā svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6908: brahmajyotiḥpakṣe tu brahma bhūtvā kā parā svarūpaniṣpattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6910: sā hi brahmabhūyātprācīnā na tu parācīnā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6912: tasmāttisṛbhiḥ śrutibhiḥ prakaraṇabādhanātteja evātra jyotiriti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6920: natu śrutyanurodhamātreṇa prakaraṇādapakraṣṭavyā iti hi lokasthitiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6921: anyathopāṃśuyājavākye jāmitādoṣopakrame tatpratisamādhānopasaṃhāre ca tadantaḥ pātino 'viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ'ityādayo vidhiśrutyanurodhena pṛthagvidhayaḥ prasajyeran /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6923: sa hi kṛtsnavidhānānna kutaścidapi hīyate kratorityahīnaḥ śakyo vaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6925: avayavaprasiddheḥ samudāyaprasiddhirbalīyasīti śrutyā prakaraṇabādhanānna dvādaśopasattāmahīnaguṇayukte jyotiṣṭome śaknoti vidhātum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6929_0: tenānapakṛṣṭenaiva dvādaśāhīnasyetivākyena sāhnasya tisra usapadaḥ kāryā iti vidhiṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:6929_1: stotuṃ dvādaśāhavihitā dvādaśopasattā tatprakṛtitvena ca sarvāhīneṣu prāptā nivītādivadanūdyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6930: tasmādahīnaśrutyā prakaraṇabādhe 'pi na dvādaśāhīnasyeti vākyasya prakaraṇādapakarṣa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6933: iha tvapakṛṣṭasyārcirādimārgopadeśe phalasyopāyamārgapratipādake 'tiviśade 'eṣa saṃprasādaḥ'iti vākyasyāviśadaikadeśamātrapratipādakasya niṣprayojanatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6934: naca dvadaśāhīnasyetivadyathoktātmadhyānasādhanānuṣṭhānaṃ stotumeṣa saṃprasāda iti vacanamarcirādimārgamanuvadatīti yuktam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6941: iha tu svārthasaṃsargatātparye noktadoṣaprasaṅga iti paurvāparyālocanayā prakaraṇānurodhādrūḍhimapi pūrvakālatāmapi parityajya prakaraṇānuguṇyena jyotiḥ paraṃ brahma pratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6944: naca kramamuktyabhiprāyaṃ svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata iti vacanam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6946: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'na tasmāt prāṇā utkrāmanti atraiva samanīyante'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6948: arcirādimārgasya hi kāryabrahmalokaprāpakatvaṃ na tu brahmabhūyahetubhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6951: tasmānna jyotirādityamupasaṃpadya saṃprasādasya jīvasya svena rūpeṇa pāramārthikena brahmaṇābhiniṣpattirāñjasīti śruteratrāpi kleśaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6952: apica paraṃ jyotiḥ sa uttamapuruṣa itihaivopariṣṭādviśeṣaṇāttejaso vyāvartya puruṣaviṣayatvenāvasthāpanājjyotiḥpadasya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6953: parameva brahma jyotiḥ na tu teja iti siddham //40//
GSP33brsvbh1u:6960: nāmarūpe antarā brahmeti ca nākāśasya nāmarūpayornirvahiturantarālatvamāha,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6964: na tu nirvoḍaiva brahma, antarālaṃ vā nirvāḍhṛ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6968: bhūtākāśaṃ ca vikāratvena nāmarūpāntaḥpāti sat kathamātmānamudvahet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6969: nahi suśikṣito 'pi vijñānī svena skandhenātmānaṃ voḍhumutsahate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6970: naca nāmarūpaśrutiraviśeṣataḥ pravṛttā bhūtākāśavarjaṃ nāmarūpāntare saṃkocayituṃ sati saṃbhave yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6971_0: naca nirvāhakatvaṃ niraṅkuśamavagataṃ brahmaliṅgaṃ kathañcitkleśena paratantre netumucitam
GSP33brsvbh1u:6971_1: 'anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi'iti ca sraṣṭṛtvamatisphuṭaṃ brahmaliṅgamatra pratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6972: brahmarūpatayā ca jīvasya vyākartṛtve brahmaṇa eva vyākartṛtvamuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6974: tathā ca te nāmarūpe yadantaretyayamarthāntaravyapadeśa upapanno bhavatyākāśasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6984: tameva ca 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu'ityādiśrutisaṃdarbha ādimadhyāvasāneṣvāmṛśatīti tadanuvādaparo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6987: na tu tadatiriktaḥ kaścidatra nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvaḥ pratipādyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6988: yattu suṣuptyutkrāntyoḥ prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakta iti bhedaṃ manyase,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6990: tena suṣuptyutkrāntyavasthāyāṃ viśeṣaviṣayābhāvātsaṃpiṇḍitaprajñena prājñenātmanā svabhāvenā pariṣvakto na kiñcidvedetyabhede 'pi bhedavadupacāreṇa yojanīyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6992: pratyādayaśca śabdāḥ saṃsāriṇyeva kāryakaraṇasaṃghātātmakasya jagato jīvakarmārjitatayā tadbhogyatayā ca yojanīyāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6993: tasmātsaṃsāryevānūdyate na tu paramātmā pratipādyata iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7001: naca prājñasya paramātmano jīvādbhedena saṃkīrtanaṃ sati saṃbhave rāhoḥ śira itivadaupacārikaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7002: naca prājñaśabdaḥ prajñāprakarṣaśālini nirūḍhavṛttiḥ kathañcidajñaviṣayo vyākhyātumucitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7005: tasmātsuṣuptyutkrāntyorbhedena jīvātprājñasya paramātmano vyapadeśāt 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ'ityādinā jīvātmānaṃ lokasiddhamanūdya tasya paramātmabhāvo 'nanadhigataḥ pratipādyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7007: anadhigatārthāvabodhanaparaṃ hi śābdaṃ pramāṇaṃ, na tvanuvādamātraniṣṭhaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7009: evaṃ ca mahattvaṃ cājatvaṃ ca sarvagatasya nityasyātmanaḥ saṃbhavānnāpekṣikaṃ kalpayiṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7019: vaśaḥ sāmarthyaṃ sarvasya jagataḥ prabhavatyayam, vyūhāvasthānasamartha iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7020: ata eva sarvasyeśānaḥ, sāmarthyena hyayamuktena sarvasyeṣṭe, tadicchānuvidhānājjagataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7023: kiñca sa evaṃbhūto hṛdyantarjyotiḥ puruṣo vijñānamayo na sādhunā karmaṇā bhūyānutkṛṣṭo bhavatītyevamādyāḥ śrutayo 'saṃsāriṇaṃ paramātmānameva pratipādayanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7024: tasmājjīvātmānaṃ mānāntarasiddhamanūdya tasya brahmabhāvapratipādanaparo 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ'ityādivākyasaṃdarbha iti siddham //43//
GSP33brsvbh1u:7032: ānumānikam apy ekeṣām iti cen na śarīra-rūpaka-vinyasta-gṛhīter darśayati ca | BBs_1,4.1 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:7039: gatisāmānyaṃ ca vedāntavākyānāṃ brahmakāraṇavādaṃ prati vidyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7043: nahyete pradhānakāraṇatvaṃ jagata āhuḥ, apitu pradhānasadbhāvamātram /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7045: tasmādanarthaka uttaraḥ saṃdarbha ityata āha-brahmajijñāsāṃ pratijñāyeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7051: evaṃ ca lakṣaṇavyabhicārādavyabhicārāya yukta uttarasaṃdarbhārambha iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7066: laukikī hi prasiddhī rūḍhirvedārthanirṇaye nimittaṃ, tadupāyatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7067: yathāhuḥ-'ya eva laukikāḥ śabdāsta eva vaidikāsta eva caiṣāmarthāḥ'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7068: natu parīkṣakāṇāṃ pāribhāṣikī, pauruṣeyī hi sā na vedārthanirṇayanibandhanasiddhau(yanimittaṃ po?)
GSP33brsvbh1u:7079: pradhānasyākāṅkṣāvato vacanaṃ prakaraṇamiti gantavyaṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ pradhānamiti tadākāṅkṣāmavatārayati-taiścendriyādibhirasaṃyatairiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7082: nanvāntaratvena yadi śreṣṭhatvaṃ tadendriyāṇāmeva bāhyebhyo gandhāhibhyaḥ śreṣṭhatvaṃ syādityata āha-arthā ye śabdādaya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7085: grahebhyaścendriyebhyo 'tigrahatayārthānāṃ prādhānyaṃ śrutyā vivakṣitamitīndriyebhyor'thānāṃ prādhānyātparatvaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7086: ghrāṇajihvāvākcakṣuḥ śrotramanohastatvaco hi indriyāṇi śrutyāṣṭau grahā uktāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7090: ata eva gandhādayo 'ṣṭāvatigrahāḥ, tadupahāreṇa grahāṇāṃ grahatvopapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7092: grahatvenendriyaiḥ sāmye 'pi manasaḥ svagatena viśeṣeṇārthebhyaḥ paratvamāha-viṣayebyaśca manasaḥ paratvamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7100: tadevaṃ sarvāsāṃ buddhīnāṃ prathamajahiraṇyagarbhabuddhyekanīḍatayā hiraṇyagarbhabuddhermahattvaṃ cāpanādā(copādānā?)tmatvaṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7102: nanvetasminpakṣe hiraṇyagarbhabuddherātmatvānna rathina ātmano bhokturatropādānamiti na rathamātraṃ pariśiṣyate 'pi tu rathavānapītyata āha-etasmiṃstu pakṣa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7103: yathā hi samāropitaṃ pratibimbaṃ bimbānna vastuto bhidyate tathā na paramātmano vijñānātmā vastuto bhidyata iti paramātmaiva rathavānihopāttastena rathamātraṃ pariśiṣṭamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7104: atha rathādirūpakakalpanāyāḥ śarīrādiṣu kiṃ prayojanamityata āha-śarīrendriyamanobuddhiviṣayavadenāsaṃyuktasya hīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7107: naca jīvasya brahmatvaṃ mānāntarasiddhaṃ, yenātra nāgamo 'pekṣyetyāha-tathāceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7130: pradhānaṃ hi sāṃkhyānāṃ seśvarāṇāmanīśvarāṇāṃ veśvarāt kṣetrajñebhyo vā vastuto bhinnaṃ śakyaṃ nirvaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7131: brahmaṇastviyamavidyā śaktirmāyādiśabdavācyā na śakyā tattvenānyatvena vā nirvaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7138: yadi brahmaṇo 'vidyāśaktyā saṃsāraḥ pratīyate hanta muktānāmapi punarutpādaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7140: tadvināśe vā samastasaṃsārocchedaḥ tanmūlavidyāśakteḥ samucchedādityata āha-muktānāṃ ca punaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7147: tena yasyaiva jīvasya vidyotpannā tasyaivāvidyāpanīyate na jīvāntarasya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7151: pradhānasyaikatvena taducchede sarvocchedo 'nucchede vā na kasyacidityanirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7155: na cāvidyopādhibhedādhīno jīvabhedo jīvabhedādhīnaścāvidyopādhibheda iti parasparāśrayādubhayāsiddhiriti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7159: nahyacetanaṃ cetanānadhiṣṭhitaṃ kāryāya paryāptamiti svakāryaṃ kartuṃ parameśvaraṃ nimittatayopādānatayā vāśraye,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7161: tena yathāhivibhramo rajjūpādāna evaṃ prapañcavibhrama īśvaropādānaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7165: ata evāha-yasyāṃ svarūpapratibodharahitāḥ śerate saṃsāriṇo jīvā iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7167: jīvānāṃ svarūpaṃ vāstavaṃ brahma, tadbodharahitāḥ śerata iti laya uktaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7170: yadyapi jīvāvyaktayoranāditvenāniyataṃ paurvāparyaṃ tathāpyavyaktasya pūrvatvaṃ vivakṣitvaitaduktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7189: kintu duḥśodhatvātsūkṣmasyaiva śarīrasya, natu ṣāṭkauśikasya sthūlasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7190: etaddhi dṛṣṭabībhatsatayā sukaraṃ vairāgyaviṣayatvena śodhayitumityata āha-na caivaṃ mantavyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7191: viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padamavagamayituṃ paraṃ paramatra pratipādyatvena prastutaṃ na tu vairāgyāya śodhanamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7194: tathāpi na sāṃkhyābhimatamatra pradhānaṃ paramityabhyupetyāha-sarvathāpi tviti //3//
GSP33brsvbh1u:7200: sāṃkhyaiḥ khalu pradhānādvivekena puruṣaṃ niḥśreyasāya jñātuṃ vā vibhūtyai vā pradhānaṃ jñeyatvenopakṣipyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7201: na ceha jānīyāditi copāsīteti vā vidhivibhaktiśrutirasti, api tvavyaktapadamātram /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7206: vadatīti cen na prājño hi prakaraṇāt | BBs_1,4.5 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:7211: trayāṇām eva caivam upanyāsaḥ praśnaś ca | BBs_1,4.6 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:7213: varapradānopakramā hi mṛtyunaciketaḥ saṃvādavākyapravṛttirāsamāpteḥ kaṭhavallīnāṃ lakṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7214: mṛtyuḥ kila na ciketase kupitena pitrā prahitāya tuṣṭastrīnvarān pradadau /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7215: naciketāstu pathamena vareṇa pituḥ saumanasyaṃ vavre, dvitīyenāgnividyām, tṛtīyenātmavidyām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7217: nanu tatra varapradāne pradhānagocare staḥ praśnaprativacane /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7219: 'hantaḥ ta idaṃ pravakṣyāmi guhyaṃ brahma sanātanam'ityanena vyavahitaṃ jīvaviṣayaṃ 'yathā tu maraṇaṃ prāpyātmā bhavati gautama'ityādiprativacanamiti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7221: kiṃ vānyo jīvasya 'yeyaṃ prete'manuṣya iti praśnaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7226: varapradānānantarbhāve praśnasya tadvat pradhānākhyānamapyanantarbhūtaṃ varapradāne 'stu 'mahataḥ paramavyakta'mityākṣepaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7231: vāstavaśca jīvaparamātmanorabhedastatra tatra śrutyupanyāsena bhagavatā bhāṣyakāreṇa darśitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7233_0: 'yeyaṃ prete'iti hi naciketasaḥ praśnamupaśrutya tattatkāmaviṣayamalobhaṃ cāsya pratītya
GSP33brsvbh1u:7233_1: mṛtyuḥ 'vidyābhīpsinaṃ naciketasaṃ manye'ityādinā naciketasaṃ praśasya praśnamapi
GSP33brsvbh1u:7237: apica yadviṣayaṃ praśnamupaśrutya mṛtyunaiṣa praśaṃsito naciketāḥ yadi tameva bhūyaḥ pṛcchettaduttare cāvadadhyāt tataḥ praśaṃsā dṛṣṭārthā syāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7247: puruṣārthakriyākṣamaṃ sattasya bhāvaḥ sattā tanmātraṃ mahattattvamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7248: yā yā puruṣārthakriyā śabdādyupabhogalakṣaṇā ca sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātilakṣaṇā ca sā sarvā mahati buddhau samāpyata iti mahattattvaṃ sattāmātramucyata iti //7//
GSP33brsvbh1u:7253: ajāśabdo yadyapi chāgāyāṃ rūḍhastathāpyadhyātmavidyādhikārānna tatra kartitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7255: tatra kiṃ svatantraṃ pradhānamanena mantravarṇenānūdyatāmuta pārameśvarī māyāśaktistejo 'bannavyākriyākāraṇamucyatām kiṃ tāvatprāptaṃ, pradhānameveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7256: tathāhi-yādṛśaṃ pradhānaṃ sāṃkhyaiḥ smaryate tādṛśamevāsminnanyūnānatiriktaṃ pratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7257: sā hi pradhānalakṣaṇā prakṛtirna jāyata ityajā ca ekā ca lohitaśuklakṛṣṇā ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7258: yadyapi lohitatvādayo varṇā na rajaḥprabhṛtiṣu santi,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7261: evaṃ prasannaṃ pāthaḥ śuklaṃ, sattvamapi prasannamiti śuklam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7266: kāryasārūpyeṇa vā kāraṇe kalpanīyaṃ, tadasmākamapi tulyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7267: 'ajo hyeko juṣamāṇo 'nuśete jahātyenāṃ bhuktabhogāmajo 'nyaḥ'iti tvātmabhedaśravaṇāt sāṃkhyasmṛterevātra mantravarṇe pratyabhijñānaṃ na tvavyākṛtaprakriyāyāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7271: avayavāḥ pradhānasyaikasya sattvarajastamāṃsi teṣāṃ dharmā lohitatvādayastairiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7274: tathāhi-maitradāreṣu narmadāyāṃ maitrasya sukhaṃ, tat kasya hetoḥ, taṃ prati sattvasya samudbhavāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7284: viṣayā hi śabdādayaḥ prakṛtivikārastraiguṇyena sukhaduḥkhamohātmāna indriyamano 'haṅkārapraṇālikayā buddhisattvamupasaṃkrāmanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7285: tena tadbuddhisattvaṃ pradhānavikāraḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakaṃ śabdādirūpeṇa pariṇamate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7286: citiśaktistvapariṇāminyapratisaṃkramāpi buddhisattvādātmano vivekamabudhyamānā buddhivṛttyaiva viparyāsenāvidyayā buddhisthānsukhādīnātmanyabhimanyamānā sukhādimatīva bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7295_0: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate-na tāvat 'ajo hyeko juṣamāṇo 'nuśete jahātyenāṃ bhuktabhogāmajo
GSP33brsvbh1u:7296: sa cānūdito bhedaḥ 'eko devaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ sarvavyāpī sarvabhūtāntarātmā'ityādiśrutibhirātmaikatvapratipādanaparābhirvirodhātkalpaniko 'vatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7297: tathāca na sāṃkhyaprakriyāpratyabhijñānamityajāvākyaṃ camasavākyavatpariplavamānaṃ na svatantrapradhānaniścayāya paryāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7303: jyotirupakramā tu tathā hy adhīyata eke | BBs_1,4.9 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:7305: sarvaśākhāpratyayamekaṃ brahmeti sthitau śākhāntaroktarohitādiguṇayoginī tejo 'bannalakṣaṇā jarāyujāṇḍajasvedajadbhijjacaturvidhabhūtagrāmaprakṛtibhūteyamajā pratipattavyā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7311: ajāpadasya ca samudāyaprasiddhiparityāgena na jāyata ityavayavaprasiddhyāśrayaṇe doṣaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7313: api cāyamapi śrutikalāpo 'smaddarśanānuguṇo na sāṃkhyasmṛtyanuguṇa ityāha-tathehāpīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7316: yathāhuḥ-'puruṣasya tu śuddhasya nāśuddhā vikṛtirbhavet'ityāśayavatīva śrutiḥ pṛcchati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7319: te brahmavido dhyānayogenātmānaṃ gatāḥ prāptā apaśyanniti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7321: avidyā śaktiryoniḥ, sā ca pratijīvaṃ nānetyuktamato vīpsopapannā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7331: nanu kiṃ chāgā lohitaśuklakṛṣṇaivānyādṛśīnāmapi chāgānāmupalambhādityata āha-yadṛcchayeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7336: na saṃkhyopasaṃgrahād api nānābhāvād atirekāc ca | BBs_1,4.11 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:7339: pañcajanā iti hi samāsārthaḥ pañcasaṃkhyayā saṃbadhyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7340: naca 'diksaṃkhye saṃjñāyām'iti samāsavidhānānmanujeṣu nirūḍho 'yaṃ pañcajanaśabda iti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7342: evaṃ cātmani pañcamanujānāmākāśasya ca pratiṣṭhānamiti nistātparyaṃ, sarvasyaiva pratiṣṭhānāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7345: tatrāpi kiṃ pañca prāṇādayo vākyaśeṣagatā vivakṣyante uta tadatiriktā anya eva vā kecit /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7351: tasmātkānicideva tattvānīha pañca pratyekaṃ pañcasaṃkhyāyogīni pañcaviṃśatitattvāni bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7353: pañcaviṃśatitattvāni smaryanta iti tānyevānena mantreṇocyanta iti nāśabdaṃ pradhānādi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7354: na cādhāratvenātmano vyavasthānātsvātmani cādhārādheyabhāvasya virodhāt ākāśasya ca vyatirecanāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7355: trayoviṃśatirjanā iti syānna pañca pañcajanā iti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7357: tathāca satyātmākāśābhyāṃ saptaviṃśatisaṃkhyāyāṃ pañcaviṃśatitattvānīti svasiddhāntavyākopa iti cet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7365: evamahaṅkāratattvaṃ mahato vikṛtiḥ, prakṛtiśca tadeva tāmasaṃ sat pañcatanmātrāṇām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7372: yadyapi pṛthivyādayo goghaṭādīnāṃ prakṛtistathāpi na te pṛthivyādibhyastattvāntaramiti na prakṛtiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7375: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate -na saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādapi pradhānādīnāṃ śrutimattvāśaṅkā kartavyā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7379: na khalu sattvarajastamomahadahaṅkārāṇāmekaḥ kriyā vā guṇo vā dravyaṃ vā jātirvā dharmaḥ pañcatanmātrādibhyo vyāvṛttaḥ sattvādiṣu cānugataḥ kaścidasti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7382: nāpi pāṇipādapāyūpasthamanasāṃ, yenaikenāsādhāraṇenopagṛhītāḥ pañca pañcakā bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7384_0: yadyapi parasyāṃ saṃkhyāyāmavāntarasaṃkhyā dvitvādikā nāsti tathāpi tatpūrvaṃ tasyāḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:7385: naca pañcaśabdo janaśabdena samasto 'samastaḥ śakyo vaktumityāha-paraścātra pañcaśabda iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7387: api ca vīpsāyāṃ pañcakadvayagrahaṇe daśaiva tattvānīti na sāṃkhyasmṛtipratyabhijñānamityasamāsamabhyupetyāha-na ca pañcakadvayagrahaṇaṃ pañca pañceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7388: na caikā pañcasaṃkhyā pañcasaṃkhyāntareṇa śakyā viśeṣṭum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7389: pañcaśabdasya saṃkhyopasarjanadravyavacanatvena saṃkhyāyā upasarjanatayā viśeṣaṇenāsaṃyogādityāha-ekasyāḥ pañcasaṃkhyāyā iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7391: atra tāvadrūḍhau satyāṃ na yogaḥ saṃbhavatīti vakṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7393_1: samudāyino 'vacchinatti na samudāyaṃ samāsapadagamyamatastasmin kati te samudāyā
GSP33brsvbh1u:7394: pañcajanā ityatra tu pañcasaṃkhyayotpattiśiṣṭayā janānāmavacchinnatvātsamudāyasya ca pañcapūlīvadatrāpratīterna padāntarābhihitā saṃkhyā saṃbadhyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7400: nahyupasarjanaṃ viśeṣaṇena yujyate pañcaśabda eva tāvatsaṃkhyeyopasarjanasaṃkhyāmāha viśeṣatastu pañcajanā ityatra samāse /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7401: viśeṣaṇāpekṣāyāṃ tu na samāsaḥ syāt, asāmarthyāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7402: nahi bhavati ṛddhasya rājapuruṣa iti samāso 'pi tu (pada) vṛttireva ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7406: yadi sattvarajastamāṃsi pradhānenaikīkṛtyātmākāśau tattvebhyo vyatiricyete tadā siddhāntavyākopaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7407: atha tu sattvarajastamāṃsi mitho bhedena vivakṣyante tathāpi vastutattvavyavasthāpane ādhāratvenātmā niṣkṛṣyatām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7411: naca rūḍhau satyāmavayavaprasiddhergrahaṇaṃ, sāpekṣatvāt, nirapekṣatvācca rūḍheḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7412: tadyadi rūḍhau mukhyor'thaḥ prāpyate tataḥ sa eva grahītavyo 'tha tvasau na vākye saṃbandhārhaḥ pūrvāparavākyavirodhī vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7414: yathā 'śyenenābhicaran yajeta'iti śyenaśabdaḥ śakuniviśeṣe nirūḍhavṛttistadaparityāgenaiva nipatyādānasādṛśyenārthavādikena kratuviśeṣe vartate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7416: yathā saptarṣiśabdo vasiṣṭha ekasmin saptasu ca vartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7419: rūḍhau satyāṃ pcaviṃśatereva saṃkhyāyā abhāvātkathaṃ tattveṣu vartate //11//
GSP33brsvbh1u:7422: evaṃ ca ke te pañcajanā ityapekṣāyāṃ kiṃ vākyaśeṣagatāḥ prāṇādayo gṛhyantāmuta pañcaviṃśatistattvānīti viśaye tattvānāmaprāmāṇikatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7423: prāṇādīnāṃ ca vākyaśeṣe śravaṇāttatparityāge śrutahānyaśrutakalpanāprasaṅgātprāṇādaya eva pañcajanāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7424: naca kāṇḍavamādhyandinayorvirodhānna prāṇādīnāṃ vākyaśeṣagatānāmapi grahaṇamiti sāṃpratam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7430: tasya kathaṃ prāṇādiṣvajaneṣu prayoga iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7431: anyathā tu pratyastamitāvayavārthe samudāyaśabdārthe janaśabdārtho nāstītyaparyanuyoga eva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7437: samāsabalāccedrūḍhirāsthīyate hanta na dṛṣṭastarhi tasya prayogo 'śvakarṇādivadvṛkṣādiṣu /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7439_0: janeṣu tāvatpañcajanaśabdaśca prathamaḥ prayogo lokeṣu dṛṣṭa ityasati prathamaprayoga
GSP33brsvbh1u:7452: bhavitā hi tasyāḥ sthānamavirodhalakṣaṇamityata āha-pratipāditaṃ brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7453_0: ayamarthaḥ nānekaśākhāgatatattadvākyālocanayā vākyārthāvagame paryavasite sati pramāṇāntaravirodhena
GSP33brsvbh1u:7454: prāsaṅgikaṃ tu tatra sṛṣṭiviṣayāṇāṃ vākyānāṃ parasparamavirodhapratipādanaṃ na tu lakṣaṇārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7456: iha tu-vākyānāṃ sṛṣṭipratipādakānāṃ parasparavirodhe brahmaṇi jagadyonau na samanvayaḥ seddhumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7460: tasmādvākyānāṃ virodhāvirodhābhyāmuktārthākṣepasamādhānābhyāṃ samanvayaḥ evopapādyata iti samanvayalakṣaṇe saṃgatamidamadhikaraṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7468: sṛṣṭyā ca kāryeṇa tatkāraṇatayā brahma lakṣitam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7469: sṛṣṭivipratipattau tatkāraṇatāyāṃ brahmalakṣaṇe vipratipattau satyāṃ bhavati tallakṣye brahmaṇyapi vipratipattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7471: vedāntāstu kartrādipratipādanena karmavidhiparatayopacaritārthā avivakṣitārthā vā japopayogina iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7474: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-'sargakramavivāde 'pi na sa sṛṣṭari vidyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7482: tadasya devadattasya sarvatraitāsmin kartṛtvācchakyaṃ vaktuṃ devadattāccakrādi saṃbhūtaṃ tasmāccakrādeḥ kumbhādīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7484: nahyastyasaṃbhavaḥ sarvatrāsmin kāryajāte kramavatyapi devadattasya sākṣātkarturanusyūtatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7485: tathehāpi yadyapyākāśādikrameṇaiva sṛṣṭistathāpyākāśānalānilādau tatra tatra sākṣāt parameśvarasya kartṛtvācchakyaṃ vaktuṃ parameśvarādākāśaḥ saṃbhūta iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7486: śakyaṃ ca vaktuṃ parameśvarādanalaḥ saṃbhūta ityādi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7487: yadi tvākāśādvāyurvāyosteja ityuktvā tejaso vāyurvāyorākāśa iti brūyādbhavedvirodhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7491: eṣā hi svavyāpāramabhidhānakrameṇa kurvatī nābhidheyānāṃ kramaṃ niruṇaddhi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7492: te tu yathākramāvasthitā evākrameṇocyante-yathā kramavanti jñānāni jānātīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7497: naca sṛṣṭivigānaṃ sraṣṭari tadadhīnanirūpaṇe vigānamāvahatīti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7498: nahyeṣa sraṣṭṛtvamātreṇocyate 'pi tu 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma'ityādinā rūpeṇocyate sraṣṭā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7503: tena 'phalavatsaṃnidhāvaphalaṃ tadaṅgam'iti sṛṣṭivijñānaṃ sraṣṭṛbrahmavijñānāṅgaṃ tadanuguṇaṃ sadbrahmajñānāvatāropāyatayā vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7510: tadapi 'tadapyeṣa śloko bhavati'iti pūrvaprakṛtaṃ sadbrahmaṇākṛṣya 'asadevedamatra āsīt'ityucyamānaṃ tvasato 'bhidhāne 'saṃbaddhaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7513: 'taddhaika āhurasadevedamatra āsīt'iti tu nirākāryatayopanyastamiti na kāraṇe vivāda iti sūtre caśabdastvarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7515: ākāśādiṣu sṛjyamāneṣu kramavigāne 'pi na sraṣṭari vigānam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7517: yathaikasyāṃ śrutau vyapadiṣṭaḥ parameśvaraḥ sarvasya kartā tathaiva śrutyantareṣūkteḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7520: aparaḥ kalpo yathā vyapadiṣṭaḥ krama ākāśādiṣu,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7522: tasyaiva kramasyānapabādhanena 'tattejo 'sṛjata'ityādikāyā api sṛṣṭerukterna sṛṣṭāvapi vigānam //14//
GSP33brsvbh1u:7526: nanvekatrātmana ākāśakāraṇatvenoktiranyatra ca tejaḥ kāraṇatvena, tatkathamavigānamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7531: vyākriyata iti ca karmakartari karmaṇi vā rūpaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7533: nahi lūyate kedāraḥ svayameveti vā lūyate kedāra iti vā lavitāraṃ devadattādiṃ pratikṣipati /
