GSP33brsvbh1u:7541: upasaṃhāre ca 'sarvān pāpmano 'pahatya sarveṣāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svārājyaṃ paryeti ya evaṃ veda'iti niratiśayaphalaśravaṇādbrahmavedanādanyatra tadasaṃbhavāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7542: ādityacandrādigatapuruṣakartṛtvasya ca 'yasya vaitatkarma'iti cāsyāsatyavacchede sarvanāmnā pratyakṣasiddhasya jagataḥ parāmarśena,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7544: ucyate-brahma te bravāṇīti bālākinā gārgyeṇa brahmābhidhānaṃ pratijñāya tattadādityādigatābrahmapuruṣābhidhānena na tāvadbrahmoktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7546: 'yo vai bālāke eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ kartā yasya vaitatkarma'iti vākyaṃ na tena brahmābhidhānaṃ pratijñātam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7550: kārye tu kriyata iti vyutpattyā vartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7553: vākyaśeṣe ca 'athāsmin prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'iti śravaṇātparispandalakṣaṇasya ca karmaṇo yatropapattiḥ sa eva veditavyatayopadiśyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7557: upakramānurodhena copasaṃhāre sarvaśabdaḥ sarvān pāpmana iti ca sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāmiti cāpekṣikavṛttirbahūn pāpmano bahūnāṃ bhūtānāmityevaṃparo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7559: yadi tu dṛptabālākimabrahmaṇi brahmābhidhāyinamapodyājātaśatrorvacanaṃ brahmaviṣayamevānyathā tu taduktādviśeṣaṃ vivakṣorabrahmābhidhānamasaṃbaddhaṃ syāditi manyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7562_0: yatkāraṇaṃ veditavyatayopanyastasya puruṣāṇāṃ karturvedanāyopetaṃ bālakiṃ prati bubodhayiṣurajātaśatruḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:7562_2: yaṣṭighātotthānāt prāṇādivyatiriktaṃ jīvaṃ bhoktāraṃ svāminaṃ pratibodhayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7563: parastādapi 'tadyathā śreṣṭhī svairbhuṅkte yathā vā svāḥ śreṣṭhinaṃ bhuñjantyevamevaiṣa prajñātmaitairātmabhirbhuṅkte evamevaita ātmāna enamātmānaṃ bhuñjanti'iti śravaṇāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7564: yathā śreṣṭhī pradhānaḥ puruṣaḥ svairbhṛtyaiḥ karaṇabhūtairviṣayān bhuṅkte,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7565: yathā vā svā bhṛtyāḥ śreṣṭhinaṃ bhuñjanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7568: te hyādityādaya ālokavṛṣṭyādinā sācivyamācaranto jīvātmānaṃ bhojayanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7577: ye ca praśnaprativacane-'kvaiṣa etad bālāke puruṣo 'śayiṣṭa yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyati'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7580: tasmājjīvaprāṇayoranyatara iha grāhyo na raparameśvara iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7583: 'yathā hi kenacinmaṇilakṣaṇajñamāninā kāce maṇireva veditavya ityukte parasya kāco 'yaṃ maṇirna tallakṣaṇāyogādityabhidhāya ātmano viśeṣaṃ jijñāpayiṣostattvābhidhānamasaṃbaddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7584: amaṇau maṇyabhidhānaṃ na pūrvavādino viśeṣamāpādayati svayamapi mṛṣābhidhānāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7586: evamajātaśatruṇā dṛptabālākerabrahmavādino viśeṣamātmano darśayatā jīvaprāṇābhidhāne asaṃbaddhamuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7592: sarvān pāpmano 'pahatya sarveṣāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svarājyaṃ paryeti ya evaṃ veda'iti ca sati saṃbhave sarvaśruterasaṃkocānniratiśayena phalenopasaṃhārāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7594: ādityādipuruṣakartṛtvasya ca svātantryalakṣaṇasya mukhyasya brahmaṇyeva saṃbhavādanyeṣāṃ hiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ tatpāratantryāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7595_1: na kañcana paśyatyathāsmin prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'ityāderuttarasya ca brahmaṇyevopapatterbrahmaviṣayatvaṃ niścīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7596: atha kasmānna bhavato hiraṇyagarbhagocare eva praśnottare,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7597: tathā ca naitābhyāṃ brahmaviṣayatvasiddhirityetannirācikīrṣuḥ paṭhati-etasmādātmanaḥ prāṇā yathā yathāyatanaṃ pratiṣṭhanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7599: yadyapi ca jīvo nātmano bhidyate tathāpyupādhyavacchinnasya paramātmano jīvatvenopādhibhedādbhedamāropyādhārādheyabhāvo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7600: evaṃ ca jīvabhavanādhāratvamapādānatvaṃ ca paramātmana upapannam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7601: tadevaṃ bālākyajātaśatrusaṃvādavākyasaṃdarbhasya brahmaparatve sthite yasya vaitatkarmaiti vyāpārābhidhāne na saṃgacchata iti karmaśabdaḥ kāryābhidhāyī bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7605: na cādityādipuruṣāḥ saṃnihitā api parāmarśārhāḥ bahutvāt puṃliṅgatvācca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7606: etaditi caikasya napuṃsakasyābhidhānāt 'eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ kartā'ityanenaiva gatārthatvācca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7610: kintu kṛtsnameva jagadyasya kāryamiti vāśabdena sūcyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7621: nirdiśyantāṃ puruṣāḥ kāryāstadviṣayā tu kṛtiranirdiṣṭā tatphalaṃ vā kāryasyotpattisti yasyedaṃ karmeti nirdekṣyete,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7626: nanu yadīdamā jagatparāmṛṣṭaṃ tatastadantarbhūtāḥ puruṣā apīti ya eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāmiti punaruktamityata āha-etaduktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7634: anyārthaṃ tu jaiminiḥ praśnavyākhyānābhyām api caivam eke | BBs_1,4.18 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:7635: nanu 'prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'ityādikādapi vākyājjīvātiriktaḥ kutaḥ pratīyata ityato vākyāntaraṃ paṭhati-etasmādātmanaḥ prāṇā iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7637: vedāntaprakriyāyāmevopapattimupasaṃhāravyājenāha-tasmādyatrāsyaātmano yato niḥsaṃbodho 'taḥ svacchatārūpamiva rūpamasyeti svacchatārūpo na tu svacchataiva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7640_0: etadeva vibhajate-upādhibhiḥ antaḥkaraṇādibhiḥ janitaṃ yadviśeṣavijñānaṃ ghaṭapaṭādivijñānaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:7640_2: sadbrahmaiva syāttacca nityamiti nopādhijanitaṃ nāpi tadrihitaṃ svarūpaṃ brahmasvabhāvasyāprahāṇāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7642: yadā tu layalakṣaṇāvidyopabṛṃhito vikṣepasaṃskāraḥ samudācarati tadā viśeṣavijñānotpādātsvapnajāgarāvasthātaḥ paramātmano rūpādbhraṃśarūpamāgamanamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7645: nanvatrākāśaṃ śayanasthānaṃ tatkutaḥ paramātmapratyaya ityata āha-ākāśaśabdaśceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7650: tatra mandadhiyāṃ nedaṃ prāṇanirākaraṇāyeti buddhirmā bhūdityāśayavānāha-prāṇanirākaraṇasyāpīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7662_1: maitraiyyā bhāryāyāḥ kātyāyanyā sahārthasaṃvibhāgakaraṇa ukte maitreyī yājñavalkyaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:7663: yannu ma iyaṃ bhagoḥ sarvā pṛthvī vittena pūrṇā syātkimahaṃ tanāmṛtā syāmuta neti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7665: yathaivopakaraṇavatāṃ jīvitaṃ tathaiva te jīvitaṃ syādamṛtatvasya tu nāśāsti vittena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7666: evaṃ vittenāmṛtatvāśā bhavedyadi vittasādhyāni karmāṇyamṛtatve upayujyeran /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7668: jñānasādhyatvādamṛtatvasya karmaṇāṃ ca jñānavirodhināṃ tatsahabhāvitvānupapatteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7669: sā hovāca maitreyī yenāhaṃ nāmṛtā syāṃ kimahaṃ tenaṃ kuryāṃ yadeva bhagavān veda tadeva me brūhi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7671_1: patijāyādiṣu vairāgyamutpādayituṃ yājñavalkyo 'na vā are patyuḥ kāmāya'ityādivākyasaṃdarbhamuvāca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7672: ātmaupādhikaṃ hi priyatvameṣāṃ na tu sākṣāt priyāṇyetāni /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7673: tasmādetebhyaḥ patijāyādibhyo virabhya yatra sākṣātprema sa evaātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7676: etatsādhanāni ca śravaṇādīni vihitāni śrotavya ityādinā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7678: ātmano vā are darśanena śravaṇādisādhanenedaṃ jagatsarvaṃviditaṃ bhavatīti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7679: yato nāmarūpātmakasya jagatastattvaṃ pāramārthikaṃ rūpamātmaiva bhujaṅgasyeva samāropitasya tattvaṃ rajjuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7680: tasmādātmani vidite sarvamidaṃ jagattattvaṃ viditaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7681: rajjvāmiva viditāyāṃ samāropitasya bhujaṅgasya tattvaṃ viditaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7682: yatastasmādātmaiva draṣṭavyo na tu tadatiriktaṃ jagat svarūpeṇa draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7688: ātmaiva jagatastattvaṃ na tu tadatiriktaṃ kiñcittaditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7690: yat khalu yadgrahaṃ vinā na śakyate grahītuṃ tattato na vyatiricyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7691: yathā rajataṃ śuktikāyāḥ, bhujaṅgo vā rajjoḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7693: na gṛhyante ca cidrūpagrahaṇaṃ vinā sthitikāle nāmarūpāṇi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7697_1: 'pi tu nāmarūpotpatteḥ prāgapi cidrūpāvasthānāt tadupādānatvācca nāmarūpaprapañcasya tadanatirekaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7698_0: rajjūpādānasyeva bhujaṅgasya rajjoranatireka ityetaddṛṣṭāntena sādhayati bhagavatī
GSP33brsvbh1u:7698_1: śrutiḥ-'sa yathārdraidho 'grerabhyāhitasya pṛthagdhūmā viniścarantyevaṃ vā are 'sya
GSP33brsvbh1u:7698_2: mahato bhūtasya niḥśvasitametadyadṛgvedaḥ'ityādinā caturvidho mantra uktaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7705: yadā ca nāmadheyasyeyaṃ gatistadā tatpūrvakasya rūpadheyasya kaiva katheti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7706: na kevalaṃ tadupādānatvāttato na vyatiricyate nāmarūpaprapañcaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7708: yathā sāmudramevāmbhaḥ pṛthivītejaḥ saṃparkāt kāṭhinyamupagataṃ saindhavaṃ khilyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7709: sa hi svākāre samudre kṣipto 'mbha eva bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7710: evaṃ cidambhodhau līnaṃ jagacchideva bhavati na tu tato 'tiricyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7712: dṛṣṭāntaprabandhamuktvā dārṣṭāntike yojayati-evaṃ vā are idaṃ mahaditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7720: etebhyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvena vyavasthitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya sāmyenotthāya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7724_2: tānyeva bhūtāni naśyantyanu tadupādhiścidātmanaḥ khilyabhāvo vinaśyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7726: na pretya saṃjñāstīti saṃjñāmātraniṣedhādātmā nāstīti manyamānā sā maitreyī hovāca,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7727: atraiva mā bhagavānamūmuhanmohitavān na pretya saṃjñāstīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7728: sa hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ svābhiprāyaṃ, dvaite hi rūpādiviśeṣasaṃjñānibandhano duḥkhitvādyabhimānaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7729: ānandajñānaikarasabrahmādvayānubhave tu tat kena kaṃ paśyet, brahma vā kena vijānīyāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7731: etaduktaṃ bhavati-na saṃjñāmātraṃ mayā vyāsedhi, kintu viśeṣasaṃjñeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7735: dvaitanindayā cādvaitaguṇakīrtanādbrahmaiva maitreyībrāhmaṇe pratipādyaṃ na jīvātmeti nāsti pūrvapakṣa ityanārabhyamevedamadhikaraṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7738: nāpijñānakartṛtvamakartuḥ sākṣācca mahato bhūtasya vijñānātmabhāvena samuttānābhidhānaṃ vijñānātmana eva draṣṭavyatvamāha /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7739: anyathā brahmaṇo draṣṭavyatvapare 'smin brāhmaṇe tasya vijñānātmatvena samutthānābhidhānamanupayuktaṃ syāttasya tu draṣṭavyamupayujyata ityupakramamātraṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7744: tadevaṃ paurvāparyālocanayā maitreyībrāhmaṇasya brahmadarśanaparatve sthite bhoktrā jīvātmanopakramamācāryadeśīyamatena tāvatsamādhatte sūtrakāraḥ-
GSP33brsvbh1u:7747: yathā hi vahnervikārā vyuccaranto visphuliṅgā na vahneratyantaṃ bhidyante,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7751: tathā jīvātmano 'pi brahmavikāra na brahmaṇo 'tyantaṃ bhidyante,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7753: nāpyatyantaṃ na bhidyante, parasparaṃ vyāvṛttyabhāvaprasaṅgāt, sarvajñaṃ pratyupadeśavaiyarthyācca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7755: tatra tadvijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñāsiddhaye vijñānātmaparamātmanorabhedamupādāya paramātmani darśayitavye vijñānātmanopakrama ityāśmaradhya ācāryo mene //20//
GSP33brsvbh1u:7759: utkramiṣyata evaṃ bhāvād ity auḍulomiḥ | BBs_1,4.21 |
GSP33brsvbh1u:7761: jīvo hi paramātmano 'tyantaṃ bhinna eva san dehendriyamanobuddhyupadhānasaṃparkātsarvadā kaluṣaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7764: yathāhuḥ pāñcarātrikāḥ-'āmukterbheda eva syājjīvasya ca parasya ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7769: saṃprati svābhāvikameva jīvasya nāmarūpaprapañcāśrayatvalakṣaṇaṃ kāluṣyaṃ pārthivānāmaṇūnāmiva śyāmatvaṃ kevalaṃ pākeneva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7770: jñānadhyānādinā tadapanīya jīvaḥ parātparataraṃ puruṣamupaitītyāha-kvacicca jīvākṣayamapīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7780: ākāśa iva ghaṭamaṇikādikalpitāvacchedo ghaṭākāśo maṇikākāśo na tu paramākāśādanyastadvikāro vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7784: atha vikāraḥ paramātmano jīvaḥ kasmānna bhavatyākāśādivadityāha-naca tejaḥprabhṛtīnāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7785: nahi yathā tejaḥprabhṛtīnāmātmavikāratvaṃ śrūyate evaṃ jīvasyeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7788: tathāca kathañcidbhedo 'pīti tamāsthāya kāryakāraṇabhāva iti matatrayamuktvā kāśakṛtsnīyamataṃ sādhutvena nirdhārayati-tatra teṣu madhye /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7792: rājaputrasyeva ca mlecchakule vardhamānasyātmani samāropito mlecchabhāvo rājaputro 'sīti āptopadeśena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7793: na tu mṛdvikāraḥ śarāvādiḥ śataśo 'pi mṛnmṛditi cintyamānastajjanmanā mṛdbhāvasākṣātkāreṇa śakyo nivartayituṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7798: api ca jīvasyātmavikāratve tasya jñānadhyānādisādhanānuṣṭhānāt svaprakṛtāvapyaye sati nāmṛtatvasyāśāstītyapuruṣārthatvamamṛtatvaprāptiśrutivirodhaśca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7800: nanu yadi jīvo na vikāraḥ kintu brahmaiva kathaṃ tarhi tasminnāmarūpāśrayatvaśrutiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7802: yataḥ pratipipādayiṣitārthānusāraścāmṛtatvaprāptiśca vikārapakṣe na saṃbhavataḥ, ataśceti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7806: aikāntike hyādvaite ātmano 'nyakarmakaraṇe 'kena kaṃ paśyet'iti ātmanaśca karmatvaṃ 'vijñātāramare kena vijānīyāt'iti śakyaṃ niṣeddhum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7808: na kevalaṃ kāśakṛtsnīyadarśanāśrayaṇena bhūtapūrvagatyā vijñātṛtvamapi tu śrutipaurvāparyaparyālocanayāpyevamevetyāha-api ca yatra hīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7809: kasmāt punaḥ kāśakṛtsnasya matamāsthīyate netareṣāmācāryāṇāmityata āha-darśitaṃ tu purastāditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7810: kāśakṛtsnīyasya matasya śrutiprabandhopanyāsena punaḥ śrutimattvaṃ smṛtimattvaṃ copasaṃhāropakramamāha-ataśceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7817: apica yadi jīvaparamātmanorbhedābhedāvāsthīyeyātāṃ tatastayormitho virodhātsamuccayābhāvādekasya balīyastve nātmani nirapavādaṃ vijñānaṃ jāyeta,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7820: tataḥ saṃśaye sati na suniścitārthamātmani jñānaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7825: kathaṃ tarhi vyapadeśabuddhibhedau kṣetrajñaḥ paramātmeti kathañca nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvasya bhagavataḥ saṃsāritā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7830_1: jīveśvarayorbhedo 'pi bhāvika ityata āha-sthite ca paramātmakṣetrajñātmaikatveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7831: na tāvadbhedābhedāvekātra bhāvikau bhavitumarhata iti viprapañcitaṃ prathame pāde /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7832: dvaitadarśananindayā caikāntikādvaitapratipādanaparāḥ paurvāparyālocanayā sarve vedāntaḥ pratīyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7833: tatra yathā bimbādavadatāttāttvike pratibimbānāmabhede 'pi nīlamaṇikṛpāṇakācādyupadhānabhedātkālpaniko jīvānāṃ bhedo buddhivyapadeśabhedau vartayati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7834: idaṃ bimbamavadātamimāni ca pratibimbāni nīlotpalapalāśaśyāmalāni vṛttadīrghādibhedabhāñji bahūnīti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7835_1: jīvānāṃ bhedo buddhivyapadeśabhedāvayaṃ ca paramātmā śuddhavijñānānandasvabhāva ime
GSP33brsvbh1u:7836: avidyopadhānaṃ ca yadyapi vidyāsvabhāve paramātmani na sākṣādasti tathāpi tatpratibimbakalpajīvadvāreṇa parasminnucyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7837: na caivamanyonyāśrayo jīvavibhāgāśrayāvidyā, avidyāśrayaśca jīvavibhāga iti, bījāṅkuravadanāditvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7840: kathaṃ cātmānaṃ saṃsāriṇaṃ vividhavedanābhājaṃ kuryādityādyanuyogo niravakāśaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7845: hanta jīvaḥ sphuṭa iti brahmāpi tathā syāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7846: tathā ca 'nihitaṃ guhāyām'iti nopapadyata ityata āha-nahi satyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7847: yathāhi bimbasya maṇikṛpāṇādayo guhā evaṃ brahmaṇo 'pi pratijīvaṃ bhinnā avidyā guhā iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7848: yathā pratibimbeṣu bhāsamāneṣu bimbaṃ tadabhinnamapi guhyamevaṃ jīveṣu bhāsamāneṣu tadabhinnamapi brahma guhyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7849: astu tarhi brahmaṇo 'nyadguhyamityata āha-naca brahmaṇo 'nya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7851: brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmanā bhāgaśo vā pariṇāmābhyupagame tasya kāryatvādanityatvācca tadāśrito mokṣo 'pi tathā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7853: evaṃ ye nadīsamudranidarśanenāmukterbhedaṃ muktasya cābhedaṃ jīvasyāsthiṣata teṣāmapi nyāyenāsaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7857: kiṃ pāthaḥ paramāṇava utaiṣāṃ saṃsthānabheda āhosvittadārabdho 'vayavī /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7858: tatra saṃsthānabhedasya vāvayavino vā samudraniveśe vināśāt kasya samudreṇaikatā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7859: nadīpāthaḥ paramāṇūnāṃ tu samudrapāthaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ pūrvavasthitebhyo bheda eva nābhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7861: ye tu kāśakṛtsnīyameva matamāsthāya jīvaṃ paramātmanoṃ'śamācakhyusteṣāṃ kathaṃ 'niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntam'iti na śrutivirodhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7862: niṣkalamiti sāvayavatvaṃ vyāsedhi na tu sāṃśatvam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7863: aṃśaśca jīvaḥ paramātmano nabhasa iva karṇanemimaṇḍalāvacchinnaṃ nabhaḥ śabdaśravaṇayogyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7864: vāyoriva ca śarīrāvacchinnaḥ pañcavṛttiḥ prāṇa iti cet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7867: hanta tarhi prāptāprāptavivekena karṇanemimaṇḍalaṃ vā tatsaṃyogo vetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7868: naca karṇanemimaṇḍalaṃ tasyāṃśaḥ, tasya tato bhedāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7872: nabhodharmatve hi tadanavayavaṃ sarvatrābhinnamiti tatsaṃyogaḥ sarvatrā pratheta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7876: vyāpyaivāsti kevalaṃ pratisaṃbadhyadhīnanirūpaṇatayā na sarvatra nirūpyata iti cet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7878: tatsaṃyuktaṃ tu nabhaḥ śravaṇayogyaṃ sarvatrāstīti sarvatra śravaṇaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7879: naca bhedābhedayoranyatareṇāṃśaḥ śakyo nirvaktum na cobhābhyāṃ, viruddhayorekatrāsamavāyādityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7880: tasmādanirvacanīyānādyavidyāparikalpita evāṃśo nabhaso na bhāvika iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7883: na jātu rajjvāmajñāyamāna urago bhayakampādikāryāya paryāpta iti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7890: api ca bhāvikāṃśavādināṃ mate bhāvikāṃśasya jñānenocchettumaśakyatvānna jñānadhyānasādhano mokṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7892: evaṃ jīvo brahmaṇoṃ'śa iti kāśakṛtsnīyaṃ matamiti siddham //22//
GSP33brsvbh1u:7898: vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi samanvaye darśite samāptaṃ samanvayalakṣaṇamiti kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadarthamidamārabhyata iti śaṅkāṃ nirākartuṃ saṃgatiṃ darśayannavaśeṣamāha-yathābhyudayeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7899: atra ca lakṣaṇasya saṃgatimuktvā lakṣaṇenāsyādhikaraṇasya saṃgatiruktā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7900: etaduktaṃ bhavati-satyaṃ jagatkāraṇe brahmaṇi vedāntānāmuktaḥ samanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7901: tatra kāraṇabhāvasyobhayathā darśanājjagatkāraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ kiṃ nimittatvenaiva, utopādānatvenāpi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7902: tatra yadi prathamaḥ pakṣastata upādānakāraṇānusāraṇe sāṃkhyasmṛtisiddhaṃ pradhānamabhyupeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7903: tathā ca 'janmādyasya yataḥ'iti brahmalakṣaṇamasādhu, ativyāpteḥ pradhāne 'pi gatatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7905: yadi tūttaraḥ pakṣastato nātivyāptirnāpyavyāptiriti sādhu lakṣaṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7910: āgamasya kāraṇamātre paryavasānādanumānasya tadviśeṣaniyamamāgamo na pratikṣipatyapi tvanumanyata evetyāha-pāriśeṣyādbrahmaṇo 'nyaditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7911: brahmopādānatvasya prasaktasya pratiṣedhe 'nyatrāprasaṅgātsāṃkhyasmṛtiprasiddhamānumānikaṃ pradhānaṃ śiṣyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7915: yathā somaśarmaṇaikena jñātena sarve kaṭhā jñātā bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7917: na kevalaṃ brahma nimittakāraṇaṃ, kutaḥ, pratijñādṛṣṭāntayoranuparodhāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7923: 'tadihāpi pratijñādṛṣṭāntau mukhyārthāveva yuktau na tu 'yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ'itivadguṇakalpanayā netavyau,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7926: nimittakāraṇaṃ tu kāryādatyantabhinnamiti na tajjñāne kāryajñānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7930: nahi tadānīṃ brahmaṇi jñāte sarvaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7932: yata iti ca pañcamī na kāraṇamātre smaryate api tu prakṛtau, 'janikartuḥ prakṛtiḥ'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7939: etayā khalu svātantryalakṣaṇena kartṛtvena nimittatvaṃ darśitam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7947: śrutirbrahmaṇo jagadupādānatvamavadhārayantī upādānāntarābhāvaṃ sākṣādeva darśayatītisākṣāditisūtrāvayavena darśitamiti yojanā //25//
GSP33brsvbh1u:7963: kathaṃ ca tadbrahmaṇo rūpaṃ yadi tasya brahmopādānaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7969: etaduktaṃ bhavati-īśvaro jagato nimittakāraṇameva īkṣāpūrvakajagatkartṛtvāt, kumbhakartukulālavat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7973: hanta tarhi yādṛśamīśvaramāgamo gamayati tādṛśo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ sa ca nimittakāraṇaṃ copādānakāraṇaṃ ceśvaramavagamayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7975: iyaṃ copādānapariṇāmādibhāṣā na vikārābhiprāyeṇāpi tu tathā sarpasyopādānaṃ rajjurevaṃ brahma jagadupādānaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7976: na khalu nityasya niṣkalasya brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmanaikadeśena vā pariṇāmaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7978: naca mṛdaḥ śaravādayo bhidyante, na cābhinnāḥ, na vā bhinnābhinnāḥ kintvanirvacanīyā eva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7980: tasmādadvaitopakramādupasaṃhārācca sarva eva vedāntā aikāntikādvaitaparāḥ santaḥ sākṣādeva kvacidadvaitamāhuḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7983: etāvatāpi tāvadbhedo niṣiddho bhavati, na tūpādānatvābhidhānamātreṇa vikāragraha āstheyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7989: mā bhūtpradhānaṃ jagadupādānaṃ tathāpi na brahmopādānatvaṃ sidhyati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7991: teṣāmapi hi kiñcidupodbalakamasti vaidikaṃ liṅgamityāśaṅkāmapanetumāha sūtrakāraḥ-etena sarve vyākhyātā vyākhyātāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7993: 'pratijñālakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyamāṇe padasamanvayaḥ vaidikaḥ sa ca tatraiva nānyatretyatra sādhitam //28//
GSP33brsvbh1u:7994: 'iti śrīmadvācaspatimiśraviracite śrīmacchārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ prathamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4//
